Jackson takes you through the best moments of 100 movies, including Charlie's Angels and Oscar winner Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon. Interviews with martial arts film veterans Sammo Hung, John Woo and Ang Lee round out the video.
results.title: The Art of Action: Martial Arts in the Movies

results.original_title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
results.overview: After a family tragedy, three generations of the Deetz family return home to Winter River. Still haunted by Betelgeuse, Lydia's life is turned upside down when her teenage daughter, Astrid, accidentally opens the portal to the Afterlife.
results.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice

results.original_title: Smile 2
results.overview: About to embark on a new world tour, global pop sensation Skye Riley begins experiencing increasingly terrifying and inexplicable events. Overwhelmed by the escalating horrors and the pressures of fame, Skye is forced to face her dark past to regain control of her life before it spirals out of control.
results.title: Smile 2

results.original_title: Flightplan
results.overview: Flying at 40,000 feet in a state-of-the art aircraft that she helped design, Kyle Pratt's 6-year-old daughter Julia vanishes without a trace. Or did she? No one on the plane believes Julia was ever onboard. And now Kyle, desperate and alone, can only count on her own wits to unravel the mystery and save her daughter.
results.title: Flightplan

results.original_title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Reckless Romeo
results.overview: Sleazy talk show host Ted Mayne writes a tell-all book, which enrages and embarrasses several very prominent women. One of them, actress Roxanne Shield, loses her composure during an interview and winds up making a televised death threat. Of course, when Ted is murdered, she is arrested. Witnesses claim they saw Roxanne outside his apartment that night and police later find the murder weapon in her car. Renowned defence attorney Perry Mason accepts the challenge of defending her in court.
results.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Reckless Romeo

results.original_title: Scotch Mist: A Film with Radiohead in It
results.overview: Radiohead plays songs from their album In Rainbows for a webcast broadcast on New Years Eve. The film was made by Radiohead, Nigel Godrich, Adam Buxton, Garth Jennings, Stanley Donwood, Ric Jerrom, Hugo Nicolson and Dan Grech-Marguerat.
results.title: Scotch Mist: A Film with Radiohead in It

results.original_title: The Man in the Iron Mask
results.overview: Years have passed since the Three Musketeers, Aramis, Athos and Porthos, have fought together with their friend, D'Artagnan. But with the tyrannical King Louis using his power to wreak havoc in the kingdom while his twin brother, Philippe, remains imprisoned, the Musketeers reunite to abduct Louis and replace him with Philippe.
results.title: The Man in the Iron Mask

results.original_title: The Jane Mysteries: Too Much to Lose
results.overview: Jane investigates the disappearance of a journalist after a significant game show win.
results.title: The Jane Mysteries: Too Much to Lose

results.original_title: Pelé: Birth of a Legend
results.overview: The life story of Brazilian football legend, Pele.
results.title: Pelé: Birth of a Legend

results.original_title: The Man in the Iron Mask
results.overview: Years have passed since the Three Musketeers, Aramis, Athos and Porthos, have fought together with their friend, D'Artagnan. But with the tyrannical King Louis using his power to wreak havoc in the kingdom while his twin brother, Philippe, remains imprisoned, the Musketeers reunite to abduct Louis and replace him with Philippe.
results.title: The Man in the Iron Mask

results.original_title: The Jane Mysteries: Too Much to Lose
results.overview: Jane investigates the disappearance of a journalist after a significant game show win.
results.title: The Jane Mysteries: Too Much to Lose

results.original_title: Pelé: Birth of a Legend
results.overview: The life story of Brazilian football legend, Pele.
results.title: Pelé: Birth of a Legend

results.original_title: Return to Peyton Place
results.overview: Residents of the small town of Peyton Place aren't pleased when they realize they're the characters in local writer Allison MacKenzie's controversial first novel. A sequel to the hit 1957 film.
results.title: Return to Peyton Place

results.original_title: Bruce Lee: A Warrior's Journey
results.overview: Documentary on the legendary martial artist Bruce Lee, with a focus on the production of his unfinished film Game of Death. Using interviews and behind-the-scenes footage, Lee aficionado John Little paints a portrait of the world's most famous action hero, concluding with a new cut of Game of Death's action finale, reconstructed from Lee's notes and recently-recovered footage.
results.title: Bruce Lee: A Warrior's Journey

results.original_title: I Don't Want to Set the World on Fire
results.overview: A college girl (Bonnie Kildare) dreams of her boyfriend (Johnny Downs) as he sings her a love song. The song begins at graduation ceremony and eventually moves to a soda fountain. A mixed double quartet contributes a lovely chorus.
results.title: I Don't Want to Set the World on Fire

results.original_title: Making of One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
results.overview: Documentary on the film "One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest"
results.title: Making of One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest

results.original_title: X-Men: The Mutant Watch
results.overview: While Senator Kelly addresses a senate committee about the supposed mutant menace, we learn about the making of the movie, X-Men.
results.title: X-Men: The Mutant Watch

results.original_title: Constantine
results.overview: John Constantine has literally been to Hell and back. When he teams up with a policewoman to solve the mysterious suicide of her twin sister, their investigation takes them through the world of demons and angels that exists beneath the landscape of contemporary Los Angeles.
results.title: Constantine

results.original_title: Auf der anderen Seite ist das Gras viel Grüner
results.overview: Kati has had her dream man at home for five years: attractive, loyal and professionally successful as a doctor. Unfortunately, "her" Felix now spends so much time at work in the hospital that Kati too often feels alone. When she met the good-looking, charming artist Mathias, it hit her like Felix did back then. Shortly before her last inhibitions fall, fate shuffles the cards in an unbelievable way: after a car accident, Kati wakes up in the past - exactly on the day five years ago when she accidentally met Felix
results.title: Auf der anderen Seite ist das Gras viel Grüner

results.original_title: Mais qu'est-ce que j'ai fait au bon Dieu pour avoir une femme qui boit dans les cafés avec les hommes ?
results.overview: Gaby is happy. After eighteen years of work, he is a flourishing mechanist. But one day, the mechanic of his life is out of order. He discovers that his assistant is in love with his wife. This one runs away with her daughter in law. So, Gaby's friends imagine a gambit to find them, at the moment where father and son enjoy pleasures of single life.
results.title: What Did I Ever Do to the Good Lord to Deserve a Wife Who Drinks in Cafes with Men?

results.original_title: A Big Bold Beautiful Journey
results.overview: Sarah and David are single strangers who meet at a mutual friend’s wedding and soon, through a surprising twist of fate, find themselves on a funny, fantastical, sweeping adventure together where they get to re-live important moments from their respective pasts, illuminating how they got to where they are in the present... and possibly getting a chance to alter their futures.
results.title: A Big Bold Beautiful Journey

results.original_title: Celebrating the Man in Black: The Making of Walk the Line
results.overview: A documentary about the life of Johnny Cash and the making of Walk the Line (2005).
results.title: Celebrating the Man in Black: The Making of Walk the Line

results.original_title: Sœur Sourire : Qui a tué la voix de Dieu ?
results.overview: 1962. A crystalline voice becomes a planetary tube. A Belgian nun jostles Elvis and the Beatles on the world charts. Her name: Sister Smile. A popstar with the trajectory of a comet who understands her success no more than the double meaning of her words… The harder the fall will be. Even God does not protect sharks' appetites or pretenses of success! Who killed the little voice of God? Here is the tragic story of an innocent voice, of an extraordinary fate, almost of a curse ...
results.title: Sœur Sourire: Who Killed the Voice of God?

results.original_title: Terza ipotesi su un caso di perfetta strategia criminale
results.overview: Carlo, a young photographer, is making love with his girlfriend at the beach when he witnesses a murder being feebly staged to look like a car accident.  Carlo takes incriminating shots of the murderers (the victim turns out to be the local public prosecutor) and attempts to sell them to various interested parties, including a gangster and a newspaper owner.  One of the murderers' accomplices, a lowlife criminal, is gunned down by a black-gloved assassin, while another is stabbed to death...
results.title: Who Killed the Prosecutor and Why?

results.original_title: The Maggie dela Riva Story (God... Why Me?)
results.overview: The 1967 story of young rising actress Maggie De La Riva's abduction and rape, and the trial against her 4 abductors.
results.title: The Maggie dela Riva Story (God... Why Me?)

results.original_title: ReMastered: Who Shot the Sheriff
results.overview: In 1976, reggae icon Bob Marley survived an assassination attempt as rival political groups battled in Jamaica. But who exactly was responsible?
results.title: ReMastered: Who Shot the Sheriff

results.original_title: Cosas que hacen que la vida valga la pena
results.overview: Hortensia is a mature officer of the INEM office. She has been abandoned by her husband so she doesn't believe in love anymore. One day Eduardo Fernandez goes to the employment office because after overcoming a deep depression, he has decided that his life has to get better.
results.title: Cosas que hacen que la vida valga la pena

results.original_title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
results.overview: Sue Ellen Crandell is a teenager eagerly awaiting her mother's summer-long absence. While the babysitter looks after her rambunctious younger siblings, Sue Ellen can party and have fun. But then the babysitter abruptly dies, leaving the Crandells short on cash. Sue Ellen finds a sweet job in fashion by lying about her age and experience on her résumé. But, while her siblings run wild, she discovers the downside of adulthood
results.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead

results.original_title: The Proposal
results.overview: When she learns she's in danger of losing her visa status and being deported, overbearing book editor Margaret Tate forces her put-upon assistant, Andrew Paxton, to marry her.
results.title: The Proposal

results.original_title: Judge Horton and the Scottsboro Boys
results.overview: In 1930s Alabama, nine young black men are accused of raping two white women. The judge in the case, unlike the rest of the town, comes to believe that the boys are innocent and, against all advice from his friends and family, sets them free, which turns the entire community against him.
results.title: Judge Horton and the Scottsboro Boys

results.original_title: Der Zürich-Krimi: Borchert und der Mord ohne Sühne
results.overview: Hans Siegenthaler is firmly convinced that Bernadette Schanz stabbed his daughter to death out of jealousy. However, the woman was acquitted in a criminal trial. When Schanz and her husband Beat are shot with Siegenthaler's rifle, the man comes under suspicion. Instead of trusting the justice system, he goes into hiding, making himself even more suspicious. Borchert and Dominique believe in his innocence and want to help him.
results.title: Der Zürich-Krimi: Borchert und der Mord ohne Sühne

results.original_title: Ben-Hur: The Making of an Epic
results.overview: The story of how the classic epic "Ben-Hur" was made.
results.title: Ben-Hur: The Making of an Epic

results.original_title: Das ist keine Figur, das ist Verrat
results.overview: Melanie, a hairdresser, drives her son Stefan, a young author, to the first reading of his autobiographical debut novel DER SALON.
results.title: This Is Not a Character, This Is Betrayal

results.original_title: Liebe und Tod auf Java
results.overview: Hans and Fridel are a marriage that come to Java fleeing of the pursuit Nazi just before the Second World war comes untied. In this paradise Hans finds an employment as municipal police, but his wife, always unsatisfied, turns into one addicted to the opium. One day Hans knows Helen, the daughter of an important businessman, with whom he falls in love almost to the instant. But Fridel is his major worry, and can´t leave her, though it will not be able to forget Helen either.
results.title: A World Beyond

results.original_title: Peter Steiners Theaterstadl - Das rotseidene Hoserl
results.title: Peter Steiners Theaterstadl - Das rotseidene Hoserl

results.original_title: Entre Pancho Villa y una mujer desnuda
results.overview: Gina, a modern business woman in her late forties, has a lover named Adrian, a journalist, who she sees once in a while just to have sex. They are both attracted to the historic figure of Pancho Villa: he admires his power while she admires his virility. As Gina helps Adrian to write a book about Villa, she discovers the similarity between Villa's relation to women to that of Adrian and hers, and that Villa's revolution never included her, nor the rest of the female half of the human species. Can the love of a woman and a man survive machismo?
results.title: Between Pancho Villa and a Naked Woman

results.original_title: Terang Bulan di Tengah Hari
results.overview: Sora has to work really hard to support her family, by giving swimming lessons and being a model, as her husband Sony is unreliable. But with the help of an idealist young lawyer, Singgih, and a loyal friend, Devina, Sora manages to survive.
results.title: Full Moon at Mid-Day

results.original_title: It Takes a Village: The Making of Village of the Damned
results.overview: Featuring interviews with Director John Carpenter, Producer Sandy King, Actors Michael Paré, Peter Jason, Karen Kahn, Meredith Salenger, Thomas Dekker, Cody Dorkin, Lindsey Haun, Danielle Wiener-Keaton and Make-up Effects Artist Greg Nicotero.
results.title: It Takes a Village: The Making of Village of the Damned

results.original_title: Neutrón contra el criminal sádico
results.overview: Neutron, a wrestler/superhero, investigates a series of murders at a sanitarium.
results.title: Neutron vs. the Maniac

results.original_title: Page One: Inside the New York Times
results.overview: Unprecedented access to the New York Times newsroom yields a complex view of the transformation of a media landscape fraught with both peril and opportunity.
results.title: Page One: Inside the New York Times

results.original_title: Le Fabuleux Destin d'Amélie Poulain
results.overview: At a tiny Parisian café, the adorable yet painfully shy Amélie accidentally discovers a gift for helping others. Soon Amelie is spending her days as a matchmaker, guardian angel, and all-around do-gooder. But when she bumps into a handsome stranger, will she find the courage to become the star of her very own love story?
results.title: Amélie

results.original_title: Le Cinquième Élément
results.overview: In 2257, a taxi driver is unintentionally given the task of saving a young girl who is part of the key that will ensure the survival of humanity.
results.title: The Fifth Element

results.original_title: Shelter
results.overview: Mason is a reclusive man living in a remote setting by the sea. When he chooses to rescue a young girl from drowning in a terrible storm, he unwittingly sets off a chain reaction that soon brings violence his way, forcing him to confront choices from his past.
results.title: Shelter

results.original_title: ലോകഃ Chapter 1: ചന്ദ്ര
results.overview: The story follows Chandra , a mysterious, goth-influenced woman who has just moved to Bangalore and begins working night shifts at a café. Across the road from her apartment live Sunny and Venu, two aimless bachelors. Sunny becomes infatuated with Chandra, observing her odd routines, strange visitors, and reclusive nature. Their dynamic changes when Sunny gets a glimpse of Chandra in her act.
results.title: Lokah Chapter 1: Chandra

results.original_title: From A to Z-Z-Z-Z
results.overview: Ralph is a daydreamer... and he is quick to adapt his current surroundings into new, adventurous dreams.
results.title: From A to Z-Z-Z-Z

results.original_title: Behind the Scenes with 'Thunderball'
results.overview: A behind the scenes look at the James Bond film "Thunderball".
results.title: Behind the Scenes with 'Thunderball'

results.original_title: Vacation
results.overview: Hoping to bring his family closer together and to recreate his childhood vacation for his own kids, a grown up Rusty Griswold takes his wife and their two sons on a cross-country road trip to the coolest theme park in America, Walley World. Needless to say, things don't go quite as planned.
results.title: Vacation

results.original_title: Tödliches Rendezvous - Die Spur führt nach Palma
results.overview: Star photographer Mike Hansen doesn't just want to shoot glamour photos. On Mallorca, he thinks he's on the trail of a criminal gang who is selling girls
results.title: Tödliches Rendezvous - Die Spur führt nach Palma

results.original_title: Wenn du groß bist, lieber Adam
results.overview: Adam receives a flashlight with special powers: every liar it shines on flies into the air. Production was cancelled in 1965/66 due to the film's political content. Only in 1989/90 could the director reconstruct the film, where missing sounds and images are replaced with script inserts.
results.title: When You’re Grown Up, Dear Adam

results.original_title: File VL-624
results.overview: Restored footage from Robbie Zagorac’s camera. Property of Mojave County Police Department.
results.title: File VL-624

results.original_title: The Cases of Mystery Lane: Death is Listening
results.overview: As Birdie and Alden's relationship grows, they share a love of true crime podcasts. But when their favorite host dies, they help Officer Newton investigate sinister suspects.
results.title: The Cases of Mystery Lane: Death is Listening

results.original_title: The Strange Case of the End of Civilization as We Know It
results.overview: John Cleese is hilarious as the descendant of Sherlock Holmes in this modern detective drama of international power politics and intrigue. Unlike his illustrious grandfather however, he only succeeds in bungling every job he organizes. Also stars Arthur Lowe as the "bionic" grandson of Dr. Watson, Stratford Johns as the Commissioner of Police, and Connie Booth as Mrs. Hudson.
results.title: The Strange Case of the End of Civilization as We Know It

results.original_title: Indagine su un cittadino di nome Volonté
results.overview: Indagine su un cittadino di nome Volonté is a documentary exploring the life and career of Italian actor Gian Maria Volonté. Known for his roles in films with significant political and social impact, this documentary offers an intimate look through interviews and archival footage, highlighting his commitment to cinema as a form of artistic expression and a tool for social change.
results.title: Investigation of a Citizen Named Volonté

results.original_title: Grand Hotel...!
results.overview: German adaptation of Béla Balázs's Grand Hotel, which was later remade by MGM in 1932.
results.title: Grand Hotel...!

results.original_title: ¡El que no corre... vuela!
results.overview: After mistakenly going to jail, Maria makes friends with a woman whose kids live in the streets and Maria gets the idea to help them.
results.title: ¡El que no corre... vuela!

results.original_title: Million Dollar Legs
results.overview: A small country on the verge of bankruptcy is persuaded to enter the 1932 Los Angeles Olympics as a means of raising money.
results.title: Million Dollar Legs

results.original_title: Un'ora prima di Amleto, più Pinocchio
results.overview: Backstage short documentary on Carmelo Bene’s theatre works Amleto and Pinocchio.
results.title: Un'ora prima di Amleto, più Pinocchio

results.original_title: Jumanji: The Next Level
results.overview: As the gang return to Jumanji to rescue one of their own, they discover that nothing is as they expect. The players will have to brave parts unknown and unexplored in order to escape the world’s most dangerous game.
results.title: Jumanji: The Next Level

results.original_title: 功夫
results.overview: It's the 1940s, and the notorious Axe Gang terrorizes Shanghai. Small-time criminals Sing and Bone hope to join, but they only manage to make lots of very dangerous enemies. Fortunately for them, kung fu masters and hidden strength can be found in unlikely places. Now they just have to take on the entire Axe Gang.
results.title: Kung Fu Hustle

results.original_title: Kunt U Mij de Weg naar Hamelen Vertellen, Meneer?
results.overview: Registration of the stage musical, based on the Dutch children's television series from the 1970s. Based on the fairy tale "The Pied Piper of Hamelin", it tells what happened with the children after they disappeared from this German town. When The Piedpiper solves the rat problem in the town of Hamelin The Mayor refuses to pay him his gold so out of revenge he disappears with all the children of the town and 4 adults (Bertram Bierenbroodspot, his fiancé and the daughter of the Mayor Lidwientje Walg, Gatekeeper Aernout Koffij and Town Crier Hildebrandt Brom), the alternate reality they find themselves in is an adventure.
results.title: Kunt U Mij de Weg naar Hamelen Vertellen, Meneer?

results.original_title: Drugs, Skate & Violence: Filmmaker Harmony Korine
results.overview: Harmony Korine has spent his life disrupting traditional cinema with his provocative films. What most people don’t know is that first and foremost he's a skater.
results.title: Drugs, Skate & Violence: Filmmaker Harmony Korine

results.original_title: Les Trois Mousquetaires, 1ère époque : Les Ferrets de la Reine
results.overview: D'Artagnan is back from England with a message for the queen. Buckingham has declared that he was ready to attack France to deliver Anne of Austria. D'Artagnan ends up arrested and thrown into prison. Musketeers wonder how to rescue their friend.
results.title: The Fighting Musketeers

results.original_title: A Filmmaker's Journey: Making 'The Return of the King'
results.overview: A documentary about the making of 'The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'.
results.title: A Filmmaker's Journey: Making 'The Return of the King'

results.original_title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Killer Kiss
results.overview: On the set of a popular daytime soap opera 'Mile High', actress Kris Buckner is being forced off by co-star Mark Stratton. When she says that she'll 'kill him before she leaves the show', she makes herself the prime suspect when Stratton is murdered by someone poisoning him. As an old friend, Perry Mason comes to the help of Kris and agrees to defend her. Meanwhile Ken goes in search of information with the help of fan of the show.
results.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Killer Kiss

results.original_title: The Man Who Could Not Dream
results.overview: Samuel is 9 years old, he will be remembered as a thief, an arsonist and a murderer.
results.title: The Man Who Could Not Dream

results.original_title: Hurricane Bianca: From Russia with Hate
results.overview: After winning over the staff and students of Milford High School, chemistry teacher Richard Martinez aka Bianca Del Rio sent her nemesis Vice Principal Deborah “Debbie” Ward to jail in a flawlessly executed plan. When Debbie is released from jail, she conjures up a scheme to do away with Bianca Del Rio once and for all, by luring her on a dangerous journey to Russia to accept a teaching award and cash prize.
results.title: Hurricane Bianca: From Russia with Hate

results.original_title: Falls the Shadow:  The Life and Times of Athol Fugard
results.overview: Director Tony Palmer tells the incredible life story of Athol Fugard, the prolific playwright, novelist, and director who exposed the horrors of South Africa's apartheid system for the entire world to see. Interviews with Desmond Tutu, Nelson Mandela, Yvonne Bryceland and others help to illuminate Fugard's remarkable legacy.
results.title: Falls the Shadow:  The Life and Times of Athol Fugard

results.original_title: Die Toten Hosen Live -  Der Krach der Republik - Das Tourfinale
results.title: Die Toten Hosen Live -  Der Krach der Republik - Das Tourfinale

results.original_title: Snoopy Presents: For Auld Lang Syne
results.overview: After finding out her grandmother won't be visiting for Christmas, Lucy decides to cheer herself up by throwing the ultimate New Year's Eve party. Meanwhile, Charlie Brown tries to fulfill one of his resolutions before the clock strikes midnight.
results.title: Snoopy Presents: For Auld Lang Syne

results.original_title: Snoopy Presents: For Auld Lang Syne
results.overview: After finding out her grandmother won't be visiting for Christmas, Lucy decides to cheer herself up by throwing the ultimate New Year's Eve party. Meanwhile, Charlie Brown tries to fulfill one of his resolutions before the clock strikes midnight.
results.title: Snoopy Presents: For Auld Lang Syne

results.original_title: Pretty Woman
results.overview: While on a business trip in Los Angeles, Edward Lewis, a millionaire entrepreneur who makes a living buying and breaking up companies, picks up a prostitute, Vivian, while asking for directions; after, Edward hires Vivian to stay with him for the weekend to accompany him to a few social events, and the two get closer only to discover there are significant hurdles to overcome as they try to bridge the gap between their very different worlds.
results.title: Pretty Woman

results.original_title: Jazz Voice 2021 - from the EFG London Jazz Festival
results.overview: Always a highlight of the EFG London Jazz Festival, Jazz Voice returns this year with a host of special guests and a celebration of some of the classic jazz scores written for the silver screen.  English jazz trumpeter and composer Guy Barker is once again at the helm of this musical extravaganza, conducting a specially formed 45-piece orchestra, who take centre stage at London’s Royal Festival Hall.  Hosted by Jumoké Fashola, this year’s guest performers include cellist and vocalist Ayanna Witter-Johnson, Kurdish singer Aynur, neo-soul and contemporary jazz singer Ego Ella May, vocalist and composer Georgia Cécile, singer Sachal Vasandani and saxophonist and spoken word artist Lakecia Benjamin.
results.title: Jazz Voice 2021 - from the EFG London Jazz Festival

results.original_title: Padre no hay más que uno 4: Campanas de boda
results.overview: The eldest of the family, Sara, comes of age and brings chaos to the family by announcing her intention to marry Ocho. Javier and Marisa try to avoid it at all costs. At the same time Dani has an existential crisis, Paulita feels jealous of Cris, Carlota announces that she has found a boyfriend from a high society family and Rocio has finally managed to be cast in her first film.
results.title: Father There is Only One 4

results.original_title: Tin Soldier
results.overview: An ex-special forces operative seeks revenge against a cult leader who has corrupted his former comrades, the Shinjas. This leader, known as The Bokushi, promises veterans a purpose and protection, but is revealed to be a destructive influence. The ex-soldier, Nash Cavanaugh, joins forces with military operative Emmanuel Ashburn to infiltrate the Bokushi's fortress and expose his reign of terror
results.title: Tin Soldier

results.original_title: After Death - Oltre la morte
results.overview: A woman goes back to the island where her parents were killed. They had been working on a cure for cancer and accidentally raised the dead by angering a voodoo priest. With the woman is a group of mercenaries and they meet up with some other researchers. They raise the dead again and all hell breaks loose
results.title: After Death

results.original_title: Marga Engel gibt nicht auf
results.overview: Marga Engel, the likeable and self-confident cook, has built up a new life for herself with a lot of energy and love: she works as a cook and "financial manager" in a children's home, whose little residents have taken the shrewd woman very much to their hearts. However, Marga's "favorite enemy", the slick building contractor Ohrmann, has his eye on the picturesque villa in which the home is housed. His plan: he wants to transform the magnificent building into an elegant anti-ageing clinic for a wealthy group of investors.
results.title: Marga Engel gibt nicht auf

results.original_title: RE:BORN
results.overview: A former special forces operative struggling to contain the destructive impulses of his past goes on a rampage against a squad of ruthless assassins.
results.title: RE:BORN

results.original_title: Un branco di vigliacchi
results.overview: A group of traveling persons end up as prisoners of a German sergeant and his squad, in an isolated and precarious cabin in the country.
results.title: No Man's Land

results.original_title: From Dogma to Dogville: Don't Try This at Home
results.overview: A documentary with the three cinematographers known for breaking away cinema away from celluloid with the introduction of digital video.
results.title: From Dogma to Dogville: Don't Try This at Home

results.original_title: Wie werde ich reich und glücklich?
results.overview: The permanent lack of money is giving Kibis a real headache. The rent has been overdue for seven months and now he is threatened with eviction. Then one day he comes across the brochure "How to become rich and happy"...
results.title: Wie werde ich reich und glücklich?

results.original_title: Flash Gordon's Trip to Mars
results.overview: When a deadly Nitron ray strikes Earth, Flash Gordon and his friends travel to Mars to battle Ming the Merciless and his new ally Queen Azura.
results.title: Flash Gordon's Trip to Mars

results.original_title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Telltale Talk Show Host
results.overview: Dr Sheila Carlin is good friends with Della who calls Perry in when she is being pestered by someone. On the theory that it could be somebody that she works with at a radio stations she arranges Perry to be interviewed by Winslow Keene who is also the station's owner. Winslow enrages the rest of the talk show hosts on the station by informing them of changes that he is making to their time slots. That night, Winslow is shot by a hit man hired by someone at the station and Sheila is set up for the murder. She calls in Perry and as usual Perry, Della and Ken swing into action to find out who really did it.
results.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Telltale Talk Show Host

results.original_title: Wenn Du noch eine Heimat hast
results.title: Wenn Du noch eine Heimat hast

results.original_title: Dois é Demais em Orlando
results.overview: João is an adult passionate about films and superheroes who is about to fulfill his childhood dream: spend his holidays in Orlando and visit the Universal parks. On the eve of the trip, his boss asks him for a small favor: to take his son Cacá, a ten-year-old boy who behaves like a middle-aged executive, on the same flight and hand him over to his father. What was supposed to be just a ride to Orlando turns into a problem when Cacá's father doesn't show up to pick him up. Now, João will have to play babysitter and learn to live with differences to save his job and also overcome his great childhood trauma: the roller coaster.executive, on the same flight and hand him over to his father. What was supposed to be just a ride to Orlando turns into a problem when Cacá's father doesn't show up to pick him up. Now, João will have to play babysitter and learn to live with differences to save his job and also overcome his great childhood trauma: the roller coaster.
results.title: Dois é Demais em Orlando

results.original_title: Circle Jerks: My Career as a Jerk
results.overview: From the beginning, LA punk band the Circle Jerks were rooted in controversy. Formed by ex members of Black Flag and Red Cross (now Redd Kross) in late 1979, the band came to encapsulate the image, sound and energy of California Hardcore Punk. Filmmaker David Markey (1991: The Year Punk Broke, The Slog Movie) mixes in-depth interviews, rare live footage and historical perspective to illustrate the story of one of the most influential bands in the American underground. My Career as a Jerk follows the band from their early days and classic debut to navigating the independent label and touring scene of the 80s to the addictions, fights and injuries that forced their break up. Of course the story doesn't quite end there.
results.title: Circle Jerks: My Career as a Jerk

results.original_title: C'mon C'mon
results.overview: Johnny and his young nephew forge a tenuous but transformational relationship when they embark on a cross-country trip to see life away from Los Angeles.
results.title: C'mon C'mon

results.original_title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
results.overview: One day, Fox and Hare find that Owl has disappeared. Together with their friends, they search the forest to find him, but instead they discover a big lake that was not there before. Could the sudden appearance of the lake have anything to do with Owl’s disappearance? They must go and find Owl, who is somewhere out there on the rapidly rising water... It is the start of an exciting and fun adventure.
results.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest

results.original_title: Si può fare l'amore vestiti?
results.title: Si può fare l'amore vestiti?

results.original_title: 설국열차
results.overview: In a future where a failed global-warming experiment kills off most life on the planet, a class system evolves aboard the Snowpiercer; a train that travels around the globe via a perpetual-motion engine.
results.title: Snowpiercer

results.original_title: Sven Melander - Ta hand om er och glöm inte att skratta
results.overview: In the spring of 2022, the comedian, actor and journalist Sven Melander passed away after a long illness. He then had a long career behind him in stage, film and television. With his unique combination of warmth, intelligence and mischievousness, he not only won the audience's love, but also made a clear mark in Swedish entertainment history. In this portrait, the story of Sven's career is told, but we also meet him on a more personal level when he talks about his alcoholism, outlook on life, childhood and where he got his sense of humour.
results.title: Sven Melander - Ta hand om er och glöm inte att skratta

results.original_title: The Last Kids on Earth: Happy Apocalypse to You
results.overview: Help Jack and his monster-battling friends make choices to stay alive -- and have some fun -- in this interactive "Last Kids on Earth" adventure!
results.title: The Last Kids on Earth: Happy Apocalypse to You

results.original_title: Böseckendorf - Die Nacht, in der ein Dorf verschwand
results.overview: Autumn 1961: The GDR regime secures the border between the workers' and peasants' state and the class enemy in the West. To ensure this, the leadership also orders the use of firearms against those fleeing the republic. In Böseckendorf, close to the border, people are not prepared to accept this development. When one of the residents accidentally learns of a secret plan from the SED district leadership, which reveals that all unruly residents are to be forcibly relocated in just a few days, the people of Böseckendorf spontaneously decide to flee en masse. But can an entire village escape the GDR state power unnoticed overnight?
results.title: Böseckendorf - Die Nacht, in der ein Dorf verschwand

results.original_title: Un bonheur n'arrive jamais seul
results.overview: Sacha is a real seducer, a man with no ties or emotional or professional. Charlotte is a modern and independent woman, but barely has time to care for their three children. While Sacha and Charlotte are, at first glance, two incompatible beings, when they meet soon discover that they are quite complementary and need each other.
results.title: Happiness Never Comes Alone

results.original_title: Horas Amang: Tiga Bulan untuk Selamanya
results.overview: The story of a family that is not harmonious: Amang or father (Cok Simbara) and his three unfilial children. Out of love for her children, Amang uses an unusual way to change their lives forever.
results.title: Horas Amang: Tiga Bulan untuk Selamanya

results.original_title: Tu vas rire, mais je te quitte
results.overview: The complicated life of a wannabe actress who meets an older writer in the midst of a crisis.
results.title: Tu vas rire, mais je te quitte

results.original_title: Lo'Waist Gang at si Og sa Mindoro
results.title: Lo'Waist Gang at si Og sa Mindoro

results.original_title: Look at Life: Jumping to Aintree
results.overview: A look at the Grand National horse race at held at Aintree Racecourse near Liverpool, where we see the winning horse, jockey and trainer.
results.title: Look at Life: Jumping to Aintree

results.original_title: How to Get Ahead in Advertising
results.overview: Pressure from his boss and a skin-cream client produces a talking boil on a British adman's neck.
results.title: How to Get Ahead in Advertising

results.original_title: Making of Godzilla vs. Mothra
results.overview: A look into the production of the nineteenth Godzilla film. Includes filmmaker and actor interviews with behind the scenes footage of the film's visual effects. Includes an interview with Akira Ifukube and a brief discussion of the late Ishiro Honda.
results.title: Making of Godzilla vs. Mothra

results.original_title: Toy Story 4
results.overview: Woody has always been confident about his place in the world and that his priority is taking care of his kid, whether that's Andy or Bonnie. But when Bonnie adds a reluctant new toy called "Forky" to her room, a road trip adventure alongside old and new friends will show Woody how big the world can be for a toy.
results.title: Toy Story 4

results.original_title: Kally's Mashup: Un cumpleaños muy Kally
results.overview: Days before her birthday, Kally meets the latest pop icon, who is as successful as he is seductive, but ex-boyfriend Dante still has feelings for her and doesn't want to lose her. While she's having the time of her life, Kally must decide what to do with her career and her heart.
results.title: Kally’s Mashup: A Very Kally's Birthday

results.original_title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
results.overview: David, a robotic boy—the first of his kind programmed to love—is adopted as a test case by a Cybertronics employee and his wife. Though he gradually becomes their child, a series of unexpected circumstances make this life impossible for David.
results.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence

results.original_title: Green Book
results.overview: Tony Lip, a bouncer in 1962, is hired to drive pianist Don Shirley on a tour through the Deep South in the days when African Americans, forced to find alternate accommodations and services due to segregation laws below the Mason-Dixon Line, relied on a guide called The Negro Motorist Green Book.
results.title: Green Book

results.original_title: Bob the Builder: Built to be Wild
results.overview: Bob the Builder and his friends are back with a charming musical special. This time, Bob and his friends head out to the wild west and are hot on the trail of a secret treasure, though they are always able to take time out for a song or two.
results.title: Bob the Builder: Built to be Wild

results.original_title: Fixing Up Christmas
results.overview: Known as a “fixer” for difficult clients, a talented party planner must help a young CEO plan the Christmas party of the year to dazzle the mayor and save his company. Wil the “fixer” fix something more than just the company?
results.title: Fixing Up Christmas

results.original_title: Russie, Chine, Iran : La revanche des empires
results.overview: Russia, China and Iran: three former empires are determined to take their revenge and reassert their power after centuries of humiliation. Since the start of the war in Ukraine, they have never been so aligned on the international stage. Their common goal: to put an end to Western hegemony, restore their zone of influence and propose a new model of society. To achieve this, they are waging a hybrid war against the democracies: military, technological, economic, informational and ideological. Are they on the verge of joining forces to create a new world order?
results.title: Russia, China, Iran: The Axis of Revenge

results.original_title: The Croods
results.overview: The prehistoric Croods family live in a particularly dangerous moment in time. Patriarch Grug, his mate Ugga, teenage daughter Eep, son Thunk, and feisty Gran gather food by day and huddle together in a cave at night. When a more evolved caveman named Guy arrives on the scene, Grug is distrustful, but it soon becomes apparent that Guy is correct about the impending destruction of their world.
results.title: The Croods

results.original_title: Reunión 10 años – No se aceptan devoluciones
results.title: Reunión 10 años – No se aceptan devoluciones

results.original_title: Der Amsterdam-Krimi: Der Tote aus dem Eis
results.title: Amsterdam Undercover: The Dead Man from the Ice

results.original_title: Reunión 10 años – No se aceptan devoluciones
results.title: Reunión 10 años – No se aceptan devoluciones

results.original_title: Der Amsterdam-Krimi: Der Tote aus dem Eis
results.title: Amsterdam Undercover: The Dead Man from the Ice

results.original_title: Spiel mir das Lied und du bist tot!
results.overview: The two brothers Bobby-John-Joe and Billy-Bob-Earl St. John live with their alcoholic mother on a farm in the Wild West. Suddenly, their missing father Jerry-Lee-Larry reappears. He disappeared twenty years ago with his daughter Jill-Sarah-Mae-Jennifer. He claims that Jill was abducted. But as it turns out, Pa is a wanted crook. Ma St. John sends her sons to town to have him picked up by the sheriff.
results.title: Spiel mir das Lied und du bist tot!

results.original_title: Super/Man: The Christopher Reeve Story
results.overview: Christopher Reeve portrayed the Man of Steel in four Superman films and played dozens of other roles that displayed his talent and range as an actor, before being injured in a near-fatal horse-riding accident in 1995 that left him paralyzed from the neck down. After becoming a quadriplegic, he became a charismatic leader and activist in the quest to find a cure for spinal cord injuries, as well as a passionate advocate for disability rights and care.
results.title: Super/Man: The Christopher Reeve Story

results.original_title: Go Kart Go
results.overview: Jimpy leads a gang of kids as they attempt to beat another gang, no matter how underhanded their tactics are.
results.title: Go Kart Go

results.original_title: Mi vida por Sharon, ¿o qué te pasa a ti?
results.overview: Carlitos López tries to recover her robbed car named Sharon, even if that risks his relationships with his ex-wife, girlfriend, and family.
results.title: Mi vida por Sharon, ¿o qué te pasa a ti?

results.original_title: The Last Man on Earth Sat Alone in a Room
results.overview: "The last man on Earth sat alone in a room. There was a knock on the door ..."
results.title: The Last Man on Earth Sat Alone in a Room

results.original_title: Les pépées au service secret
results.overview: Elvire, Nathalie and Christine, three young ladies with a proven track record, are called in by the Secret Service to retrieve coveted papers concerning a new explosive. Introduced to a fearsome environment thanks to a female helper, they face kidnappings, play a double game, toil endlessly, lend helicopters and finally triumph, smiling, after a breathtaking fight.
results.title: Les pépées au service secret

results.original_title: Scary Movie
results.overview: A familiar-looking group of teenagers find themselves being stalked by a more-than-vaguely recognizable masked killer! As the victims begin to pile up and the laughs pile on, none of your favorite scary movies escape the razor-sharp satire of this outrageously funny parody!
results.title: Scary Movie

results.original_title: Meet Joe Black
results.overview: Bill Parrish has it all - success, wealth and power. Days before his 65th birthday, he receives a visit from a mysterious stranger, Joe Black, who soon reveals himself as Death. In exchange for extra time, Bill agrees to serve as Joe's earthly guide. But will he regret his choice when Joe unexpectedly falls in love with Bill's beautiful daughter Susan?
results.title: Meet Joe Black

results.original_title: No Country for Old Men: Josh Brolin's Unauthorized Behind the Scenes
results.overview: A piece featuring additional cast and crew interview snippets and behind-the-scenes footage. We find comments from Joel and Ethan Coen, Jones, Bardem, Graf, Brolin, Macdonald, production supervisor Karen Getchell, associate producer Dave Diliberto and actor Woody Harrelson.
results.title: No Country for Old Men: Josh Brolin's Unauthorized Behind the Scenes

results.original_title: The Spy Who Brought Down Mary, Queen of Scots
results.title: The Spy Who Brought Down Mary, Queen of Scots

results.original_title: Lorenzaccio, al di là di de Musset e Benedetto Varchi
results.overview: Video registration of Carmelo Bene's play 'Lorenzaccio, al di là di de Musset e Benedetto Varchi', performed in Florence in 1986.
results.title: Lorenzaccio, al di là di de Musset e Benedetto Varchi

results.original_title: Tony Hawk: Until the Wheels Fall Off
results.overview: A wide-ranging, definitive look at Hawk’s life and iconic career, and his relationship with the sport with which he’s been synonymous for decades, featuring unprecedented access, never-before-seen footage, and interviews with Hawk and prominent figures in the sport including Stacy Peralta, Rodney Mullen, Mike McGill, Lance Mountain, Steve Caballero, Neil Blender, Andy MacDonald, Duane Peters, Sean Mortimer, and Christian Hosoi.
results.title: Tony Hawk: Until the Wheels Fall Off

results.original_title: Scotty and the Secret History of Hollywood
results.overview: A deliciously scandalous portrait of unsung Hollywood legend Scotty Bowers, whose bestselling memoir chronicled his decades spent as sexual procurer to the stars.
results.title: Scotty and the Secret History of Hollywood

results.original_title: With Buffalo Bill on the U. P. Trail
results.overview: When Buffalo Bill Cody learns that the Union Pacific railroad is making its way through Kansas, he and other heroes of the Wild West join forces to build a town along the route.
results.title: With Buffalo Bill on the U. P. Trail

results.original_title: The Newspaperman: The Life and Times of Ben Bradlee
results.overview: An intimate portrait of Washington Post executive editor Ben Bradlee, tracing his remarkable ascent from a young Boston boy stricken with polio to the one of the most pioneering and consequential journalistic figures of the 20th century.
results.title: The Newspaperman: The Life and Times of Ben Bradlee

results.original_title: Jim Knopf und die Wilde 13
results.overview: A year has gone by since Jim Button and his best friend, the engine driver Luke, returned from their dangerous adventure in Dragon City. Life on Morrowland goes its leisurely way again. Suddenly, dark clouds are gathering over the tranquil island of Morrowland: the notorious pirate gang "The Wild 13" has learned that the dragon Mrs Grindtooth has been conquered by Jim and Luke and now swears revenge.  To protect Morrowland from another threat, the two of them set off with their steam engines Emma and Molly on a dangerous journey where they meet old friends like princess Li Si, Mr. Tur Tur and Nepomuk and make new friends with Sursulapichi, a real mermaid. On their adventure, Jim's most fervent wish might also come true: to find out the truth about his mysterious origins.
results.title: Jim Button and the Wild 13

results.original_title: Nymphomaniac: Vol. II
results.overview: The continuation of Joe's sexually dictated life delves into the darker aspects of her adult life and what led to her being in Seligman's care.
results.title: Nymphomaniac: Vol. II

results.original_title: Skeletons in the Closet
results.overview: Skeletons in the Closet is a late-night, horror anthology television series featuring The Widow and her dead husband, Charlie. Each episode finds them providing hilarious commentary on a variety of B-movie horror films - some of which are terrifying! Their number one fan, a precocious 11-year-old named Jamie, never misses an episode. With her parents out for the evening, Jamie sits down in front of the tube to devour the delectable terror, but her favorite Friday night freak show is constantly interrupted by her annoying new babysitter, Tina. If they can survive each other, they may be able to survive the night!
results.title: Skeletons in the Closet

results.original_title: Johanna und der Buschpilot - Die Legende der Kraniche
results.title: Johanna und der Buschpilot - Die Legende der Kraniche

results.original_title: Final Destination 3
results.overview: High school senior Wendy's premonition of a deadly rollercoaster ride saves her life and a lucky few, but not from death itself — which seeks out those who escaped their fate.
results.title: Final Destination 3

results.original_title: 악인전
results.overview: After barely surviving a brutal attack by a sadistic serial killer, crime boss Jang Dong-su is left humiliated. Determined to catch the killer known as K, he forms an uneasy alliance with Jung Tae-seok, a relentless and incorruptible detective who often disrupts his illegal business. However, while Jang Dong-su wants K dead, Jung Tae-suk is determined to bring him to justice. With a deal in place—whoever finds K first will decide his fate—the hunt begins, blurring the lines between crime and law.
results.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil

results.original_title: The Purge
results.overview: Given the country's overcrowded prisons, the U.S. government begins to allow 12-hour periods of time in which all illegal activity is legal. During one of these free-for-alls, a family must protect themselves from a home invasion.
results.title: The Purge

results.original_title: Source of Pride: The Making of "Pride and Glory"
results.overview: Documentary about the chaotic film shooting of "Pride and Glory"
results.title: Source of Pride: The Making of "Pride and Glory"

results.original_title: Worlds of Ursula K. Le Guin
results.overview: The extraordinary life story of science fiction and fantasy writer Ursula K. Le Guin (1929-2018) who, in spite of remaining for many years on the sidelines of the mainstream literature, managed to be recognized as one of the most remarkable US writers of all time, due to the relevance of her work and her commitment to the human condition.
results.title: Worlds of Ursula K. Le Guin

results.original_title: 少林足球
results.overview: A young Shaolin follower reunites with his discouraged brothers to form a soccer team using their martial art skills to their advantage.
results.title: Shaolin Soccer

results.original_title: Das seltsame Ende eines Frühstücks in der Ewigkeit
results.overview: During the Sunday-picnic of the Smoker's Club Horatio, six eggs are stolen. Indignant, the gentlemen of the club set out recover the stolen goods.
results.title: Das seltsame Ende eines Frühstücks in der Ewigkeit

results.original_title: Elle ne pleure pas, elle chante
results.overview: Laura, in her thirties, lives alone on the outskirts of a big city. She learns that her father is in a coma, following a serious traffic accident. She decides to visit him regularly at the hospital: the opportunity finally presents itself to settle accounts, perhaps even to take revenge... But life is unpredictable and Laura's desire for revenge will lead to a reunion troubling with her family and her past. She will come out of it reconciled, with herself and with life.
results.title: She Is Not Crying, She Is Singing

results.original_title: Go Johnny Go
results.overview: A 1997 Filipino comedy film starring Johnny Abarrientos, Rochelle Barrameda, and Willie Revillame.
results.title: Go Johnny Go

results.original_title: Shaquille O'Neal Presents: All Star Comedy Jam: I'm Still Laughing
results.overview: Comedian and actor Bill Bellamy hosts this installment of Shaquille O'Neal's comedy franchise. Featuring comedy veteran Bruce Bruce who teams up with Huggy Lowdown, Aida Rodriguez, and Brian "Da Wildcat" Smith.
results.title: Shaquille O'Neal Presents: All Star Comedy Jam: I'm Still Laughing

results.original_title: The Trail of the Silver Spurs
results.overview: The Range Busters are investigating a gold robbery from the Denver Mint in a supposedly deserted ghost town, but they soon find they're not the only town resident with a nose for gold.
results.title: The Trail of the Silver Spurs

results.original_title: The History of White People in America
results.overview: In this parody of documentaries, host Martin Mull discusses the contributions that white people have made to the USA, visits the Institute of White Studies, and follows a typical white family as they go about their everyday lives.
results.title: The History of White People in America

results.original_title: 1974: On the Road With The Beach Boys
results.overview: In 1974, The Beach Boys were at a low ebb. Their record sales bottoming out and desperate for income, The Beach Boys hit the road. Family friend and musician Billy Hinsche conned UCLA into letting him film a documentary about the tour on grainy, black-and-white videotape with a cumbersome Camcorder for his master’s thesis. The result is a fascinating time capsule that had been buried for 37 years.
results.title: 1974: On the Road With The Beach Boys

results.original_title: Valiant Is the Word for Carrie
results.overview: Carrie Snyder is a prostitute, who is forced out of the fictional southern town of Crebillon, after forming a friendship with a young boy named Paul, whose dying mother is unable to protest against her son visiting such a woman. After Carrie has left town Paul runs away from his abusive father, and meets a girl named Lady who has run away from a burning trainwreck, not wanting to go back to the people she was with. Carrie comes back for Paul and ends up taking Paul and Lady to New York with her.
results.title: Valiant Is the Word for Carrie

results.original_title: C'est plus facile de garder la bouche ouverte
results.title: C'est plus facile de garder la bouche ouverte

results.original_title: La mazurka del barone, della santa e del fico fiorone
results.overview: A fig tree growing in the estates of Baron Anteo Pellacani has been worshipped since the Middle Ages, after a Saint was supposedly martyred there. The Baron, who was crippled in a fig tree-related accident and has since become a raging atheist, vows to tear it down—until he mistakes a beautiful prostitute momentarily lying on the tree for the Saint herself, falling in love with her. Her pimp, his relatives and the clergy try to take advantage of his newfound faith.
results.title: The Baron's Mazurka

results.original_title: Al di là del bene e del male
results.overview: The German philosopher Friedrich Nietzsche and his Jewish companion Paul Ree meet a beautiful young Russian intellectual and draw her into a ménage-à-trois.
results.title: Beyond Good and Evil

results.original_title: Return to the Blue Lagoon
results.overview: In this sequel to the 1980 classic, two children are stranded on a beautiful island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together and eventually become tanned teenagers in love.
results.title: Return to the Blue Lagoon

results.original_title: Alle mal herhören, auch die, die schwerhören..!
results.title: Alle mal herhören, auch die, die schwerhören..!

results.original_title: Schulmädchen-Report 5. Teil: Was Eltern wirklich wissen sollten
results.overview: Seven more first-hand accounts of sexual awakening amongst school girls in the early Seventies.
results.title: Schoolgirl Report Part 5: What All Parents Should Know

results.original_title: Der Ring des Nibelungen: Die Tetralogie an einem Abend mit Marionetten und Menschen
results.overview: Staged by the Salzburger Marionettentheater. Wagner's great epic condensed into two hours — compact, humorous and very exciting! Marionettes encounter actors and take us into a time tunnel of mythological entanglements.
results.title: Der Ring des Nibelungen: Die Tetralogie an einem Abend mit Marionetten und Menschen

results.original_title: Die Alpenklinik - Eine Frage des Herzens
results.overview: Daniel Guth is a passionate doctor and is confronted with difficult decisions every day. The fate of little Tessa is particularly close to his heart. The young patient is diagnosed with an insidious arterial disease. She has to have an operation. Shortly before the procedure, Tessa loses her nerve and escapes after her parents argue. Daniel is forced to work with his closest competitor if he wants to save the child's life and find Tessa in time.
results.title: Die Alpenklinik - Eine Frage des Herzens

results.original_title: The Wiggles: Go Santa Go
results.overview: Ring the bells, it's Christmas time! The happiest band in the land, The Wiggles, have joined with the happiest man in the land, Santa Claus (played by entertainment legend Bert Newton with dazzling Patti Newton as Mrs Claus), to deliver The Wiggles' best every Christmas songs and story. "Go Santa Go!" has The Wiggles helping Santa get the presents ready for Christmas Eve, but Lachy's invention turns Santa's elves from tiny helpers to football player-sized helpers (Jay Laga'aia and real football stars Lote Tuqiri and Joel Reddy)! With traditional Christmas carols and fun new songs, "Go Santa Go!" is the most fun you'll have since Santa first grew his beard!
results.title: The Wiggles: Go Santa Go

results.original_title: The Man Who Could Cheat Death
results.overview: Dr. Bonner plans to live forever through periodic gland transplants from younger, healthier human victims. Bonner looks about 40; he's really 104 years old. But people are starting to get suspicious, and he may not make 200.
results.title: The Man Who Could Cheat Death

results.original_title: The Matrix Reloaded
results.overview: The Resistance builds in numbers as humans are freed from the Matrix and brought to the city of Zion. Neo discovers his superpowers, including the ability to see the code inside the Matrix. With machine sentinels digging to Zion in 72 hours, Neo, Morpheus and Trinity must find the Keymaker to ultimately reach the Source.
results.title: The Matrix Reloaded

results.original_title: Je suis à vous tout de suite
results.overview: Charming thirty-year-old Hanna Belkacem has inherited the gene from her parents: she is unable to say no. And as she is the Director of Human resources of a big firm such infirmity is not without its problems, particularly when she has to fire someone. The only solution she has found to be forgiven is to... get l* with the men she lays off!
results.title: I'm All Yours

results.original_title: Behind the Camera: The Unauthorized Story of Charlie's Angels
results.overview: A candid and campy portrayal of life behind the scenes of the original Charlies Angels.
results.title: Behind the Camera: The Unauthorized Story of Charlie's Angels

results.original_title: 蜜桃成熟時33D
results.overview: A young woman named Future is sent from the year 2046 to the year 2011 in Hong Kong. Future was sent by the United Nations in order to get pregnant, where she can then extract her genes and repopulate the earth as 99% of males have become infertile in the future due to attacks from Planet Xucker. Two assassins from Xuckler are sent after her to stop her. Future meets three University students: Felix, Dan-san and Sing. The men are obsessed with female students next door: Chin-chin, Chen-chen and Sai-sai. The students agree to help Future find a mate at the university.
results.title: The 33D Invader

results.original_title: Bury Me When I'm Dead
results.overview: After failing to fulfill his wife's dying wish, a series of unexplainable, horrific events leads a man to believe she's returned to get revenge on him and his pregnant mistress.
results.title: Bury Me When I'm Dead

results.original_title: Billy Martin: The Man, the Myth, the Manager
results.overview: An emotional tribute to Billy Martin -- a five-time manager of the New York Yankees in the 1970s and '80s -- this program combines game clips and on-camera interviews, including one with Martin recorded shortly before his untimely death in 1989. Footage features an all-star lineup of Major League Baseball personalities, including Mickey Mantle, George Steinbrenner, Rickey Henderson, Whitey Ford, Willie Randolph and Rod Carew.
results.title: Billy Martin: The Man, the Myth, the Manager

results.original_title: Drei Frauen, ein Plan und die ganz große Kohle
results.overview: Three friends who have lost their jobs and are not exactly living in blessed family circumstances come into possession of a map and two flight tickets to Cuba. They combine the fact that one of their husbands was involved in the robbery of a money transport and hid the loot in a mine shaft. The women decide to start a new life, but are unaware that they are embarking on a dangerous game of cat and mouse underground.
results.title: Drei Frauen, ein Plan und die ganz große Kohle

results.original_title: Cabbage Patch Kids: First Christmas
results.overview: The Cabbage Patch Kids have their first Christmas adventure!
results.title: Cabbage Patch Kids: First Christmas

results.original_title: Movie Hoarders: From VHS to DVD and Beyond!
results.overview: Filmmakers and collectors lift the curtain on their manic media obsession that is not only a huge part of their lives, but the lifeblood of their existence!
results.title: Movie Hoarders: From VHS to DVD and Beyond!

results.original_title: Dear America: Letters Home from Vietnam
results.overview: Real-life letters written by American soldiers, sailors, airmen, and Marines during the Vietnam War to their families and friends back home. Archive footage of the war and news coverage thereof augment the first-person "narrative" by men and women who were in the war, some of whom did not survive it.
results.title: Dear America: Letters Home from Vietnam

results.original_title: La nana
results.overview: Raquel has been the live-in housekeeper for a kind, reasonably wealthy family for half her life, and the joyless repetition of the job has begun to take its toll. Increasingly dependent on painkillers, Raquel resorts to pranks and childish avoidance to antagonize the family’s college-age daughter and a procession of new servants, all in the hopes of protecting her precarious power within the home. Her antics successfully push everyone away, until new maid Lucy actually pushes back.
results.title: The Maid

results.original_title: Kojak: The Price of Justice
results.overview: When the bodies of two young boys are discovered in the Harlem River, their mother is the obvious suspect, particularly with her scandalous past. But what appears to be an open-and-shut case soon becomes something much more sinister.
results.title: Kojak: The Price of Justice

results.original_title: American Pie Presents: Band Camp
results.overview: Everyone has 'moved on', except for Sherman and Jim Levenstein's still understanding father. Little Matt Stiffler wants to join his older brother Steve's business and, after everything Matt has heard from Jim's band-geek wife, he plans to go back to band camp and make a video of his own.
results.title: American Pie Presents: Band Camp

results.original_title: Return to Jurassic Park
results.overview: A multi-part documentary about the making of the Jurassic Park trilogy. Each part walks through the making of part of one of the films, including the hurricane during the shooting of the first film, and how advances in CGI for Jurassic Park helped change the world of special effects forever. All interviews for these retrospective documentaries come with comments from Spielberg, Johnston, Neill, Dern, Goldblum, the effects crews, the child actors, and Peter Stormare. This documentary is broken into six parts: Dawn of a New Era (25 min), Making Prehistory (20 min), The Next Step in Evolution (15 min), Finding the Lost World (28 min), Something Survived (16 min), and The Third Adventure (25 min).
results.title: Return to Jurassic Park

results.original_title: Köyde Bir Kız Sevdim
results.overview: Ali, who is in love with his step-sister whom he grew up with, wants to take over the farm where they work with three bad guys.
results.title: Köyde Bir Kız Sevdim

results.original_title: As If It's True
results.overview: A fading social media influencer and a struggling musician exploit each other in a not-so-fake relationship.
results.title: As If It's True

results.original_title: Michael Kael contre la World News Company
results.overview: A naive French reporter is sent to an African town to cover a sensational news story, unaware that it has been faked by an international news giant in the hopes of getting the US president re-elected for a third term.
results.title: Michael Kael vs. the World News Company

results.original_title: Die Jagd nach dem Tode - 4. Teil: Die Goldmine von Sar-Khin
results.overview: Malatti's father has unexpectedly survived the fall from the train and now vows to take cruel revenge on McAllan. In Lhasa, the old capital of Tibet, seat of the Dalai Lama and at the same time a "forbidden city" for all foreigners, there is another dramatic encounter between the engineer and Badhama. In a dark dungeon, he thinks he recognizes McAllan and tries to stab the man he holds responsible for all the misfortune. He does not realize who he is stabbing, killing his own daughter in the process. The Dalai Lama's servants arrest Badhama and throw him in the dungeon. Malatti's father is sentenced to death, while McAllan sees the light of day again and is released.
results.title: Die Jagd nach dem Tode - 4. Teil: Die Goldmine von Sar-Khin

results.original_title: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back
results.overview: When Jay and Silent Bob learn that their comic-book alter egos, Bluntman and Chronic, have been sold to Hollywood as part of a big-screen movie that leaves them out of any royalties, the pair travels to Tinseltown to sabotage the production.
results.title: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back

results.original_title: Two Heads Are Better Than None
results.overview: The Rockmores set out on a family road trip with an uninvited Kel stashed in the trunk. While camping out in the woods, Kenan has a scary encounter with a mysterious, shadowy figure...
results.title: Two Heads Are Better Than None

results.original_title: Babenco - Alguém Tem que Ouvir o Coração e Dizer: Parou
results.overview: Besieged by cancer and nearing the end, the genius Argentine-Brazilian filmmaker Héctor Babenco (1946-2016) asks Bárbara Paz, his wife, for one last wish: to be the protagonist of his own death.
results.title: Babenco: Tell Me When I Die

results.original_title: La fine dei Greene
results.title: La fine dei Greene

results.original_title: Max Pinlig 3 - på Roskilde
results.overview: Max has finished school and is becoming an adult. He is on his way to find a life outside his mother's overprotective wings. When he meets Kaya, she gives him the final push to become independent and finally to move out. He moves over to his father but ends up as a lodger at the neighbour Steen Kold. Max would like to go to the Roskilde Festival with Kaya and gets help with the tickets from Steen Kold who is also coming along. Mom is afraid of what will happen to Max, so she decides to follow him and Steen Kold. This leads to many poignant and incredibly embarrassing episodes deeply rooted in her great love for her son, but also in her desire to still be in the centre of his attention.
results.title: Max Embarrassment at Roskilde

results.original_title: Véronique Sanson aux Francofolies de la Rochelle
results.title: Véronique Sanson aux Francofolies de la Rochelle

results.original_title: Di que sí
results.overview: An unlikely couple fake a relationship to win a TV game show prize. Wannabe actress Estrella dreams of becoming a hostess on a romance reality-TV show presented by Amador Rosales. Meanwhile, movie usher and film buff Victor, who hates such reality shows, is being pressured by his mother to be a contestant.
results.title: Say I Do

results.original_title: The Day the Music Died: The Story of Don McLean's "American Pie"
results.overview: With a narrative running deeper than a catchy tune and cryptic verses, “American Pie” is a musical phenomenon woven deep into the history of American culture, entertaining audiences around the world for over 50 years. This documentary tells the stories of the people who were a part of this moment from the beginning, shows the point of view of a new generation of artists who are motivated by the same values and ideas that inspired the song’s creation, and highlights cultural moments in America’s history that are as relevant now as they were in 1971, when the song was released.
results.title: The Day the Music Died: The Story of Don McLean's "American Pie"

results.original_title: Giuni Russo: La sua figura
results.title: Giuni Russo: La sua figura

results.original_title: Amleto di Carmelo Bene (da Shakespeare a Laforgue)
results.overview: An experimental video variation on Shakespeare's Hamlet.
results.title: Amleto di Carmelo Bene (da Shakespeare a Laforgue)

results.original_title: That Christmas
results.overview: It's an unforgettable Christmas for the townsfolk of Wellington-on-Sea when the worst snowstorm in history alters everyone's plans — including Santa's.
results.title: That Christmas

results.original_title: Rango
results.overview: When Rango, a lost family pet, accidentally winds up in the gritty, gun-slinging town of Dirt, the less-than-courageous lizard suddenly finds he stands out. Welcomed as the last hope the town has been waiting for, new Sheriff Rango is forced to play his new role to the hilt.
results.title: Rango

results.original_title: Balle perdue 3
results.overview: Car genius Lino returns to conclude his vendetta against Areski and the corrupt commander who ruined their lives in this turbo-charged trilogy finale.
results.title: Last Bullet

results.original_title: Adolf Hitler - Ein Volk, ein Reich, ein Führer: Dokumente der Zeitgeschichte
results.overview: The film begins with the First World War and ends in 1945. Without exception, recordings from this period were used, which came from weekly news reports from different countries. Previously unpublished scenes about the private life of Adolf Hitler and Eva Braun were also shown for the first time. The film was originally built into a frame story. The Off Commentary begins with the words: "This film [...] is a document of delusion that on the way to power tore an entire people and a whole world into disaster. This film portrays the suffering of a generation that only ended five to twelve. " The film premiered in Cologne on November 20, 1953, but was immediately banned by Federal Interior Minister Gerhard Schröder in agreement with the interior ministers of the federal states of the Federal Republic of Germany.
results.title: Adolf Hitler - Ein Volk, ein Reich, ein Führer: Dokumente der Zeitgeschichte

results.original_title: Insidious: Chapter 2
results.overview: The haunted Lambert family seeks to uncover the mysterious childhood secret that has left them dangerously connected to the spirit world.
results.title: Insidious: Chapter 2

results.original_title: ¿De qué se ríen las mujeres?
results.overview: Luci, Graci and Mar­, three sisters that make a comedy trio, go to the wedding of their father with a woman who is 45 years younger than him. During the feast Luci's husband dies in an accident. Despite the tragedy, the trio have to fulfill their commitment acting during August in Benidorm. The widow discovers thanks to a notebook that her husband cheated on her, so she decides to flirt with everyone.
results.title: What Makes Women Laugh?

results.original_title: Some Do It for Money, Some Do It for Fun
results.overview: Strippers around the world.
results.title: Some Do It for Money, Some Do It for Fun

results.original_title: Shooter
results.overview: A top Marine sniper, Bob Lee Swagger, leaves the military after a mission goes horribly awry and disappears, living in seclusion. He is coaxed back into service after a high-profile government official convinces him to help thwart a plot to kill the President of the United States. Ultimately double-crossed and framed for the attempt, Swagger becomes the target of a nationwide manhunt. He goes on the run to track the real killer and find out who exactly set him up, and why, eventually seeking revenge against some of the most powerful and corrupt leaders in the free world.
results.title: Shooter

results.original_title: LEGO DC Comics Super Heroes: The Flash
results.overview: Reverse-Flash manipulates the Speed Force to put the Flash into a time loop that forces him to relive the same day over and over again—with progressively disastrous results, including losing his powers and being fired by the Justice League. The Flash must find a way to restore time to its original path and finally apprehend his worst enemy before all is lost for the Flash…and the world!
results.title: LEGO DC Comics Super Heroes: The Flash

results.original_title: Ce qui se voit et ce qui ne se voit pas
results.title: Ce qui se voit et ce qui ne se voit pas

results.original_title: Wie lernt man Reisen?
results.title: Wie lernt man Reisen?

results.original_title: C'est arrivé près de chez vous
results.overview: The activities of rampaging, indiscriminate serial killer Ben are recorded by a willingly complicit documentary team, who eventually become his accomplices and active participants. Ben provides casual commentary on the nature of his work and arbitrary musings on topics of interest to him, such as music or the conditions of low-income housing, and even goes so far as to introduce the documentary crew to his family. But their reckless indulgences soon get the better of them.
results.title: Man Bites Dog

results.original_title: Treasure Planet
results.overview: When space galleon cabin boy Jim Hawkins discovers a map to an intergalactic "loot of a thousand worlds," a cyborg cook named John Silver teaches him to battle supernovas and space storms on their journey to find treasure.
results.title: Treasure Planet

results.original_title: Die Vermessung der Welt
results.overview: Germany in the early 19th century. "Die Vermessung der Welt" follows the two brilliant and eccentric scientists Alexander von Humboldt and Carl Friedrich Gauss on their life paths.
results.title: Measuring the World

results.original_title: Kolejne 365 dni
results.overview: Laura and Massimo's relationship hangs in the balance as they try to overcome trust issues while a tenacious Nacho works to push them apart.
results.title: The Next 365 Days

results.original_title: The Year of Living Dangerously
results.overview: A young Australian reporter tries to navigate the political turmoil of Indonesia during the rule of President Sukarno with the help of a diminutive photographer.
results.title: The Year of Living Dangerously

results.original_title: Forky Asks a Question: What Is Time?
results.overview: Rex uses the age of dinosaurs as an example to give Forky an understanding of the concept of time.
results.title: Forky Asks a Question: What Is Time?

results.original_title: De Prinses Op De Erwt: Een Modern Sprookje
results.title: De Prinses Op De Erwt: Een Modern Sprookje

results.original_title: The Card Counter
results.overview: William Tell just wants to play cards. His spartan existence on the casino trail is shattered when he is approached by Cirk, a vulnerable and angry young man seeking help to execute his plan for revenge on a military colonel. Tell sees a chance at redemption through his relationship with Cirk. But keeping Cirk on the straight-and-narrow proves impossible, dragging Tell back into the darkness of his past.
results.title: The Card Counter

results.original_title: The Wild World of Ted V. Mikels
results.overview: THE WILD WORLD OF TED V. MIKELS, a new documentary by Kevin Sean Michaels (no blood relation to Ted, but the same spirit), is a rollicking look at the independent cinema and film pioneering of Ted V. Mikels, who has been producing films for over 60 years. Way before limited-budget action films became termed as "grindhouse," Ted was wowing audiences with his own special brand of guts, gore, humor, violence and most of all -- style. THE CORPSE GRINDERS 1 + 2, THE ASTRO-ZOMBIES, 10 VIOLENT WOMEN, MISSION: KILLFAST, THE BLACK KLANSMAN, THE DOLL SQUAD, THE WORM EATERS and GIRL IN GOLD BOOTS are some of Ted's films that have made their cinematic mark.
results.title: The Wild World of Ted V. Mikels

results.original_title: Ce soir, c'est Palmashow
results.title: Ce soir, c'est Palmashow

results.original_title: Ronin
results.overview: A briefcase with undisclosed contents – sought by Irish terrorists and the Russian mob – makes its way into criminals' hands. An Irish liaison assembles a squad of mercenaries, or 'ronin', and gives them the thorny task of recovering the case.
results.title: Ronin

results.original_title: Milli Vanilli: From Fame to Shame
results.overview: The crazy story of two fancy boys, a French and a German, models and dancers, who won a Grammy award in 1990 just by moving their lips: the rise and fall of the Milli Vanilli duo. Playback singers, lies and video clips.
results.title: Milli Vanilli: From Fame to Shame

results.original_title: The Green Hornet Strikes Again!
results.overview: Second serial featuring The Green Hornet and Kato.
results.title: The Green Hornet Strikes Again!

results.original_title: The State's 43rd Annual All-Star Halloween Special
results.overview: Comedy troupe The State hosts a Halloween special on CBS.
results.title: The State's 43rd Annual All-Star Halloween Special

results.original_title: Wir hau'n die Pauker in die Pfanne
results.overview: Principal Gottlieb Taft's twin brother Gotthold Taft partakes in the most recent prank by faking his death and promising a large inheritance to the Mommsen-Gymnasium and the principal. Of course, the inheritance is tied to many embarrassing conditions.
results.title: Wir hau'n die Pauker in die Pfanne

results.original_title: La morte accarezza a mezzanotte
results.overview: Valentina, a beautiful fashion model, takes an experimental drug as part of a scientific experiment. While influenced by the drug, Valentina has a vision of a young woman being brutally murdered with a viciously spiked glove. It turns out that a woman was killed in exactly the same way not long ago and soon Valentina finds herself stalked by the same killer.
