results.title: Death Walks at Midnight

results.original_title: Ron Briley on 'A Face in the Crowd'
results.overview: In this interview, shot by the Criterion Collection in 2018, Ron Briley, author of 'The Ambivalent Legacy of Elia Kazan: The Politics of the Post-HUAC Films', discusses the origins of the Lonesome Rhodes character in the biographies of populist celebrities such as Will Rogers and Arthur Godfrey. He also addresses the political implications of 'A Face in the Crowd' (1957) within the context of Kazan's career.
results.title: Ron Briley on 'A Face in the Crowd'

results.original_title: Psycho
results.overview: A young female embezzler arrives at the Bates Motel, which has terrible secrets of its own.
results.title: Psycho

results.original_title: When Every Day Was the Fourth of July
results.overview: A little girl convinces her attorney father to defend a mute war veteran accused of murdering a store owner.
results.title: When Every Day Was the Fourth of July

results.original_title: First Blood
results.overview: When former Green Beret John Rambo is harassed by local law enforcement and arrested for vagrancy, he is forced to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.
results.title: First Blood

results.original_title: Sugapa
results.overview: Young lovers chase their big city dreams but get tested by lust, addiction, and the hunger for money. Will their love survive, or will reaching for their dreams tear them apart?
results.title: Sugapa

results.original_title: Nach dem Tod von Volker Figge
results.overview: A mockumentary about german actor Volker Figge.
results.title: After the Death of Volker Figge

results.original_title: Bulan Terbelah di Langit Amerika 2
results.overview: Hanum and Rangga decided to return to Vienna after fulfilling their duties. But Hanum's boss gave her a new mission, to track the mysterious treasure of Chinese Muslim sailors, who sailed to America before Columbus.
results.title: Bulan Terbelah di Langit Amerika 2

results.original_title: Siate pronti - Le chiavi di Papa Celestino V
results.title: Siate pronti - Le chiavi di Papa Celestino V

results.original_title: About Time
results.overview: The night after another unsatisfactory New Year's party, Tim's father tells his son that the men in his family have always had the ability to travel through time. They can't change history, but they can change what happens and has happened in their own lives. Thus begins the start of a lesson in learning to appreciate life itself as it is, as it comes, and most importantly, the people living alongside us.
results.title: About Time

results.original_title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
results.overview: Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, 1991. High school freshman Charlie is a wallflower, always watching life from the sidelines, until two senior students, Sam and her stepbrother Patrick, become his mentors, helping him discover the joys of friendship, music and love.
results.title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower

results.original_title: All's Fair in Love & Work
results.overview: John has been defeated by his endless, fruitless job search.
results.title: All's Fair in Love & Work

results.original_title: Down the Road: The Making of Drive My Car
results.overview: Spanning locations in Tokyo, Hiroshima, and Hokkaido and featuring interviews with cast members and rare behind-the-scenes footage, it captures the creative collective journey of the filmmaking team.
results.title: Down the Road: The Making of Drive My Car

results.original_title: Fang Shi Yu da po mei hua zhuang
results.overview: Legendary Chinese rebel Fong Sai Yuk (Fei Meng) takes on the Manchu dynasty in this high-octane martial arts actioner. After killing one of the governor's thugs, Fong must not only elude authorities, but also face a deadly assassin. Discovering the governor has murdered his two kung fu brothers, Fong vows to take on the corrupt leader. The film includes a slew of awe-inspiring battles using lethal Shaolin poles.
results.title: Secret of the Shaolin Poles

results.original_title: Wie ein Stern am Himmel
results.overview: Medical-technical assistant Marlen and her husband Henning are happily married, but are unable to have children. They decide to adopt a Chilean girl and hopefully set off for Puerto Montt, where the child lives in an orphanage. After some time, when the ice finally breaks between them, a dramatic incident shocks the parents.
results.title: Wie ein Stern am Himmel

results.original_title: Iron Lung
results.overview: An ocean of blood. The only hope left after The Quiet Rapture. In the rusting halls of crumbling space stations, the last remnants of humanity craft a submarine to explore the bleeding depths... and weld one soul inside to pilot it. But hope in this void is as illusionary as the starlight. This is not an expedition. It's an execution.
results.title: Iron Lung

results.original_title: After Death
results.overview: Based on real near-death experiences, the afterlife is explored with the guidance of New York Times bestselling authors, medical experts, scientists and survivors who shed a light on what awaits us.
results.title: After Death

results.original_title: Hast du Lust, mit mir einen Kaffee zu trinken?
results.overview: A man, alone in Berlin. He sleeps and watches TV, walks through the city. A woman approaches him. Does he feel like having coffee with her? No.
results.title: Hast du Lust, mit mir einen Kaffee zu trinken?

results.original_title: The Jungle Book
results.overview: A man-cub named Mowgli fostered by wolves. After a threat from the tiger Shere Khan, Mowgli is forced to flee the jungle, by which he embarks on a journey of self discovery with the help of the panther, Bagheera and the free-spirited bear, Baloo.
results.title: The Jungle Book

results.original_title: Il sommergibile più pazzo del mondo
results.title: Il sommergibile più pazzo del mondo

results.original_title: 엄마친구 2020
results.overview: Tae-hee, can't live without her dead husband, and is living alone without being remarried. Her neighborhood friends, Yeong-ju and Cheol-min still feels sorry for her. However, Yeong-ju's son, Min-ho, secretly takes pictures of Tae-hee, admiring her. One day, Tae-hee and Yeong-ju goes to the grocery when she heads back home, after forgetting her cellphone in Yeong-ju's house. Just in time, Min-ho comes out of the shower and hugs Tae-hee...
results.title: Mom's Friend 2020

results.original_title: The Jungle Book
results.overview: A man-cub named Mowgli fostered by wolves. After a threat from the tiger Shere Khan, Mowgli is forced to flee the jungle, by which he embarks on a journey of self discovery with the help of the panther, Bagheera and the free-spirited bear, Baloo.

results.overview: Tae-hee, can't live without her dead husband, and is living alone without being remarried. Her neighborhood friends, Yeong-ju and Cheol-min still feels sorry for her. However, Yeong-ju's son, Min-ho, secretly takes pictures of Tae-hee, admiring her. results.original_title: Duro y Parejo en La Casita del Pecado
results.overview: Inheriting the mansion of a forgotten aunt, José Luis, a simple apothecary leaves the countryside for the capital. When he arrives, he discovers that it is a brothel, inhabited by a bunch of beautiful girls.
results.title: Duro y Parejo en La Casita del Pecado

results.original_title: No es nada, mamá, sólo un juego
results.overview: A young Hacienda-owner abuses women due to his traumatic youth while his mother covers for his sadistic actions.
results.title: It's Nothing Mama, Just a Game

results.original_title: Ana Belén y Víctor Manuel: mucho más que dos
results.title: Ana Belén y Víctor Manuel: mucho más que dos

results.original_title: The Return of the Six-Million-Dollar Man and the Bionic Woman
results.overview: Ten years after his retirement from the government, Colonel Steve Austin must again team up with Jaime Sommers to stop a terrorist group. Complicating matters for Austin are his estranged son Michael, who struggles for his father's acceptance as he graduates from flight school, and Jaime, who must cope with her and Steve's past. When Michael is severely injured in a crash, Steve must make the same decision about fitting him with bionics that he had to make with Jaime years ago after her accident.
results.title: The Return of the Six-Million-Dollar Man and the Bionic Woman

results.original_title: Appunti per un film sull'India
results.overview: A 1968 short documentary film by Pier Paolo Pasolini where he visits India in the search of a king who could give up his body to feed a starving tiger.
results.title: Notes for a Film in India

results.original_title: Maria R. e gli angeli del Trastevere
results.overview: A young widow becomes a prostitute in order to provide a better life for her son.
results.title: Maria R. e gli angeli del Trastevere

results.original_title: Y’a pas de réseau
results.overview: It is about two young step-siblings spending the weekend with their parents in a lodge in a remote forest who accidentally film two bumbling criminals in the middle of a robbery.
results.title: No Signal!

results.original_title: Raymond Roussel : le jour de gloire
results.overview: A tortuous journey, in the company of the Spanish painter Salvador Dalí, around the figure of the enigmatic and visionary French poet Raymond Roussel (1877-1933).
results.title: Raymond Roussel: The Day of Glory

results.original_title: Portugaru San - O Sr. Portugal em Tokushima
results.overview: Theatrical dramatization of Island of Loves.
results.title: Portugaru San - O Sr. Portugal em Tokushima

results.original_title: The King of Kong: A Fistful of Quarters
results.overview: In this hilarious arcade showdown, a humble novice goes head-to-head against the reigning Donkey Kong champ in a confrontation that rocks the gaming world to its processors! For over 20 years, Billy Mitchell has owned the throne of the Donkey Kong world. No one could beat his top score until now. Newcomer Steve Wiebe claims to have beaten the unbeatable, but Mitchell isn't ready to relinquish his crown without a fight. Go behind the barrels as the two battle it out in a vicious war to earn the title of the true King of Kong.
results.title: The King of Kong: A Fistful of Quarters

results.original_title: The School for Good and Evil
results.overview: Best friends Sophie and Agatha navigate an enchanted school for young heroes and villains — and find themselves on opposing sides of the battle between good and evil.
results.title: The School for Good and Evil

results.original_title: Is This Thing On?
results.overview: As their marriage quietly unravels, Alex faces middle age and an impending divorce, seeking new purpose in the New York comedy scene while Tess confronts the sacrifices she made for their family—forcing them to navigate co-parenting, identity, and whether love can take a new form.
results.title: Is This Thing On?

results.original_title: Za duży na bajki 2
results.overview: Your favourite gamer trio is back! This time, Waldek, Staszek and Delfina will spend an adventure-packed summer in the Tatra Mountains. During the trip, Waldek accidentally finds out that his father – the man he has heard so much about from his mum, the person who abandoned his family a long time ago – lives nearby. The boy is determined to find him and ask him about the reasons for his decision. Together with Staszek, under the cover of night, they set out on their mission. The hazards of the mountain trail, however, are nothing compared to what Delfina will have to do. The creative teenager has to hide the truth about the boys’ disappearance from her aunt, the mother of Waldek and… her new partner. How will this secret mission affect the lives of all the characters?  Will Waldek find an answer to the questions that haunt him and understand the actions of his father?
results.title: Too Old for Fairy Tales 2

results.original_title: Miguel Wants to Fight
results.overview: In a neighborhood where fighting is stitched into the fabric of everyday life, Miguel has never found himself in one. However, when a combination of events turn his life upside down, Miguel and his friends enter into a series of misadventures.
results.title: Miguel Wants to Fight

results.original_title: Ein blinder Held – Die Liebe des Otto Weidt
results.overview: A Blind Hero depicts Otto Weidt's story as told by award-winning journalist and author Inge Deutschkron, who tells the incredible tale of Weidt's efforts to save her and the rest of his employees from the Nazis, including Alice Licht, the love of Otto Weidt's life.
results.title: A Blind Hero: The Love of Otto Weidt

results.original_title: Se O Rei Zulu Já Não Pode Andar Nu
results.overview: Video documentary on prejudice against black people in Brazil, featuring statements and interviews about racist episodes, and a poll on the importance of Benedita da Silva’s presence in the Constituent Assembly.  Footage of the South African bishop Desmond Tutu’s visit to Rio de Janeiro, at a time when Apartheid was still in effect in his country and Nelson Mandela was in prison.
results.title: Se O Rei Zulu Já Não Pode Andar Nu

results.original_title: The Importance of Being Earnest
results.overview: Two young gentlemen living in 1890s England use the same pseudonym ('Ernest') on the sly, which is fine until they both fall in love with women using that name, which leads to a comedy of mistaken identities.
results.title: The Importance of Being Earnest

results.original_title: The Nun
results.overview: A priest with a dark past and a novice nearing her final vows are sent by the Vatican to Romania to investigate a nun's death and face a demonic force.
results.title: The Nun

results.original_title: Interesting Ball
results.overview: A red ball bounces past a cafe and a couple folks’ houses and then goes to the beach.
results.title: Interesting Ball

results.original_title: दिलवाले दुल्हनिया ले जायेंगे
results.overview: Raj is a rich, carefree, happy-go-lucky second generation NRI. Simran is the daughter of Chaudhary Baldev Singh, who in spite of being an NRI is very strict about adherence to Indian values. Simran has left for India to be married to her childhood fiancé. Raj leaves for India with a mission at his hands, to claim his lady love under the noses of her whole family. Thus begins a saga.
results.title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge

results.original_title: Neutrón contra el Dr. Caronte
results.overview: Neutron, a superhero/wrestler, goes up against a mad scientist and his army of monsters.
results.title: Neutron vs. Dr. Caronte

results.original_title: Das schönste Fest der Welt
results.title: Das schönste Fest der Welt

results.original_title: Most Famous Murder: The O.J. Simpson Trial
results.overview: In the wake of O.J. Simpson's passing, revisit one of the most famous murders and trials in U.S. history that split America across racial lines.
results.title: Most Famous Murder: The O.J. Simpson Trial

results.original_title: The Equalizer 2
results.overview: Robert McCall, who serves an unflinching justice for the exploited and oppressed, embarks on a relentless, globe-trotting quest for vengeance when his former partner is murdered.
results.title: The Equalizer 2

results.original_title: All God's Children Can Dance
results.overview: In Koreatown, Los Angeles, a young man, Kengo, believes he's the son of God - that's what his mother told him since he was a young boy. He spends his days working his dead-end job and figuring out his complex feelings for his girlfriend until, one day, he sees a one-eared man who could be his father and decides to follow him around Los Angeles.
results.title: All God's Children Can Dance

results.original_title: Shark E. Shark in "Which Way To The Ocean?
results.overview: The short follows a baby Shark who tries make it's way back the Ocean after getting shot out of Garmadon's Shark cannon. The short is animated in the style of the artwork seen in Lego instruction booklets.
results.title: Shark E. Shark in "Which Way To The Ocean?

results.original_title: C.H.U.D. II: Bud the Chud
results.overview: A military experiment to create a race of super-warriors goes awry, as legions of murderous zombies are unleashed upon a suburban neighborhood.
results.title: C.H.U.D. II: Bud the Chud

results.original_title: Trolls Band Together
results.overview: When Branch's brother, Floyd, is kidnapped for his musical talents by a pair of nefarious pop-star villains, Branch and Poppy embark on a harrowing and emotional journey to reunite the other brothers and rescue Floyd from a fate even worse than pop-culture obscurity.
results.title: Trolls Band Together

results.original_title: Cleopatra Jones and the Casino of Gold
results.overview: When fellow operatives and friends disappear during a mission in Hong Kong, Cleopatra Jones comes to help. She discovers the disappearance involves The Dragon Lady, a feared lipstick lesbian who runs a casino and the local drug trade.
results.title: Cleopatra Jones and the Casino of Gold

results.original_title: The Metropolitan Opera: La Rondine
results.overview: Puccini’s bittersweet love story returns to cinemas, with soprano Angel Blue starring as the French courtesan Magda, opposite tenor Jonathan Tetelman as Ruggero, an idealistic young man who offers her an alternative to her life of excess. Maestro Speranza Scappucci conducts Nicolas Joël’s Art Deco–inspired staging, which transports audiences from the heart of Parisian nightlife to a dreamy vision of the French Riviera. Soprano Emily Pogorelc and tenor Bekhzod Davronov complete the sterling cast as Lisette and Prunier.
results.title: The Metropolitan Opera: La Rondine

results.original_title: Una voce, una chitarra, un po' di luna
results.overview: A musician loses his job after he is seriously injured in a car crash. After his wife leaves him to pursuit an acting career, he is forced to take care of his mother and his daughter by himself.
results.title: Una voce, una chitarra, un po' di luna

results.original_title: Inmate #1: The Rise of Danny Trejo
results.overview: 71 years in the making, this feature documentary experience reveals the extraordinary life journey of Hollywood's most unlikely hero, Danny Trejo.
results.title: Inmate #1: The Rise of Danny Trejo

results.original_title: On n'est pas là pour s'aimer
results.overview: Frédérique Letheil, who heads the research department of the Emmerson oil group, has sacrificed her private and sentimental life to her experiments. The management, which sees her work as a financial drain, has her unjustly dismissed by the group's general manager, Maxime Vergnaud. When the company realizes its mistake and the economic and ecological potential of Frédérique's research, it asks Maxime to bring her back at all costs.
results.title: On n'est pas là pour s'aimer

results.original_title: An Epic At Sea: The Making of Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
results.overview: Behind the scenes documentary of the making of Pirates of the Caribbean: Curse of the Black Pearl, featuring behind the scenes footage, interviews with Cast and crew and revives some previously unknown background information.
results.title: An Epic At Sea: The Making of Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl

results.original_title: Ready or Not 2: Here I Come
results.overview: Moments after surviving an all-out attack from the Le Domas family, Grace discovers she’s reached the next level of the nightmarish game — and this time with her estranged sister Faith at her side. Grace has one chance to survive, keep her sister alive, and claim the High Seat of the Council that controls the world. Four rival families are hunting her for the throne, and whoever wins rules it all.
results.title: Ready or Not 2: Here I Come

results.original_title: The Pursuit of Happyness
results.overview: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.
results.title: The Pursuit of Happyness

results.original_title: Vincent mit l'âne dans un pré (et s'en vint dans l'autre)
results.overview: This is the tale of a father-son duo who are unable to leave each other. The trouble begins when the son decides to destroy his father's image.
results.title: Vincent mit l'âne dans un pré (et s'en vint dans l'autre)

results.original_title: The Pursuit of Happyness
results.overview: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.

results.overview: This is the tale of a father-son duo who are unable to leave each other. The trouble begins when the son decides to destroy his father's image.

results.original_title: Tempi duri per i vampiri
results.overview: Baron Osvaldo Lambertenghi is forced to sell his ancestral castle, staying on as a bellboy when it's converted into a hotel. However he becomes vampirized when his mysterious uncle comes to stay.
results.title: Uncle Was a Vampire

results.original_title: A Place Among the Dead
results.overview: An exploration of our cultural obsession with vampires and what they reveal about the human psyche.
results.title: A Place Among the Dead

results.original_title: Cast Away
results.overview: Chuck Noland, a top international manager for FedEx, and Kelly, a Ph.D. student, are in love and heading towards marriage. Then Chuck's plane to Malaysia crashes at sea during a terrible storm. He's the only survivor, and finds himself marooned on a desolate island. With no way to escape, Chuck must find ways to survive in his new home.
results.title: Cast Away

results.original_title: Si Malakas, Si Maganda, at Si Mahinhin
results.overview: An unusual love triangle involving a gay, a lesbian, and a heterosexual female provides the exciting romantic complication to this sex-comedy film.
results.title: Si Malakas, Si Maganda, at Si Mahinhin

results.original_title: Sandheden om mænd
results.overview: Mads moves into a house with his lovely girlfriend Marie when a sudden pang of doubt strikes him. Is this the meaning of life? Has he lived out all his dreams? He drops everything, moves away from his girlfriend and throws himself into a desperate quest to live out his greatest dreams; a quest to find the meaning of life and the one and only.
results.title: Truth About Men

results.original_title: Seven Ways from Sundown
results.overview: A Texas Ranger must capture an outlaw and take him-in, while tangling with savage Apaches and greedy bounty-hunters on the way back to jail.
results.title: Seven Ways from Sundown

results.original_title: Taken 3
results.overview: Ex-government operative Bryan Mills finds his life is shattered when he's falsely accused of a murder that hits close to home. As he's pursued by a savvy police inspector, Mills employs his particular set of skills to track the real killer and exact his unique brand of justice.
results.title: Taken 3

results.original_title: Love Story
results.overview: Harvard Law student Oliver Barrett IV and music student Jennifer Cavilleri share a chemistry they cannot deny - and a love they cannot ignore. Despite their opposite backgrounds, the young couple put their hearts on the line for each other. When they marry, Oliver's wealthy father threatens to disown him. Jenny tries to reconcile the Barrett men, but to no avail.
results.title: Love Story

results.original_title: As Dez Vantagens de Morrer Depois de Você
results.title: As Dez Vantagens de Morrer Depois de Você

results.original_title: An Amazing Time: A Conversation About End of the Road
results.overview: In the summer of 1968, a group of people assembled in Great Barrington, Massachusetts. They were making a film of John Barth's 1958 novel The End of the Road.
results.title: An Amazing Time: A Conversation About End of the Road

results.original_title: My Oxford Year
results.overview: An ambitious American fulfilling her dream of studying at Oxford falls for a charming Brit hiding a secret that may upend her perfectly planned life.
results.title: My Oxford Year

results.original_title: Salò o le 120 giornate di Sodoma
results.overview: Four corrupted fascist libertines round up 9 teenage boys and girls and subject them to 120 days of sadistic physical, mental and sexual torture.
results.title: Salò, or the 120 Days of Sodom

results.original_title: Ein Leben als Extravaganza - Das Genie Frank Zappa
results.overview: The documentary examines Frank Zappa and his music through archive footage, including unique video excerpts from Austrian television archives featuring interviews with Zappa and backstage scenes from the 1970s and 1980s. The entire film is divided into chapters discussing the most important themes in Zappa's life and work.
results.title: A Life of Extravaganza - The Genius Frank Zappa

results.original_title: El planeta de las mujeres invasoras
results.overview: A group of sexy space vixens flies down to Earth, sets up a shop at a carnival (disguising their ship as a ride), and kidnap some earthlings in their scheme to conquer our planet. The humans, including Marcos, a crooked boxer and our hero, Silvia, his love interest, and a gang of comical mobsters out to kill Marcos, are taken to the women’s home planet. There they are held prisoner by the evil queen Adastrea and aided by her selfless twin Alburnia. Meanwhile, a standard issue hunky scientist back on Earth, who happens to be Silvia’s boss, tries to rescue them.
results.title: Planet of the Female Invaders

results.original_title: How Bruce Lee Changed the World
results.overview: More than just a biography, this film explores Bruce Lee's global impact to see how he has influenced all areas of popular culture including fitness, cinema, music, sport, dance, video games and philosophy. A journey across the United States, Asia and Europe, takes Shannon Lee on a trip back to her father's roots in Hong Kong and China. With unique access to the family's photographic archive, home movies and all material owned by the Bruce Lee Foundation.
results.title: How Bruce Lee Changed the World

results.original_title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Shooting Star
results.overview: An actor rigs a fake shooting on TV with the connivance of his friend, the show's host, but the practical joke goes wrong when the gun turns out to contain a live round.
results.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Shooting Star

results.original_title: A Family in Crisis: The Elian Gonzales Story
results.overview: Based on the true headline-generating story of the five-year-old Cuban boy who is the sole survivor of a refugee boat that sunk in a storm on its way to the U.S.
results.title: A Family in Crisis: The Elian Gonzales Story

results.original_title: 7 Faces of Dr. Lao
results.overview: An old Chinese man rides into the town of Abalone, Arizona and changes it forever, as the citizens see themselves reflected in the mirror of Lao's mysterious circus of mythical beasts.
results.title: 7 Faces of Dr. Lao

results.original_title: Joan Lui - ma un giorno nel paese arrivo io di lunedì
results.overview: In a world ravaged by violence, and other serious social problems, Joan - a character that alludes to Christ (which represents the return to Earth) arrives to Italy by train and preaching for the salvation of mankind, condemning the hypocrisy and hedonism.
results.title: Joan Lui

results.original_title: Return to Two Moon Junction
results.overview: There's a special place in Georgia called Two Moon Junction. It's known for its power of seduction and for awakening the sense with an unquenchable sexual passion. It's no wonder overworked supermodel Savannah Delongpre longs to retun to her home town. She's at the height of her success, with fame, fortune, and everything the fast lane has to offer, including a lover who's sleeping with her best friend. Disillusioned with the high life, Savannah retreats to the estate of her grandmother, and the sanctuary of the family's riverfront hideaway - Two Moon Junction. There, Savannah meets her match, a handsome local sculptor named Jake GIlbert who unleashes her passion. However, Jake and Savannah's future is marred by the past. Her torrid affair is further complicated by her manipulative boyfriend who tries to seduce her back to New York. Savannah has to choose between all that Two Moon Junction can offer and her body and soul, and the rich and glamorous New York life she left behind.
results.title: Return to Two Moon Junction

results.original_title: The Passion of the Christ
results.overview: A graphic portrayal of the last twelve hours of Jesus of Nazareth's life.
results.title: The Passion of the Christ

results.original_title: The Caine Mutiny Court-Martial
results.overview: A full-length adaptation, originally staged as a play, of the court-martial segment from the novel "The Caine Mutiny".
results.title: The Caine Mutiny Court-Martial

results.original_title: Pillion
results.overview: A timid man is swept off his feet when an enigmatic, impossibly handsome biker takes him on as his submissive.
results.title: Pillion

results.original_title: God's Not Dead: In God We Trust
results.overview: In a time of profound political, civil, and spiritual turmoil, Reverend David Hill grapples with the crucial question: Does God still have a place in politics? Compelled to enter a congressional race after the sudden death of a favored incumbent, David faces off against state senator Peter Kane, a formidable opponent determined to push religion out of the public square and cause greater divide.
results.title: God's Not Dead: In God We Trust

results.original_title: Aristotle and Dante Discover the Secrets of the Universe
results.overview: Two teenage Mexican-American loners in 1987 El Paso explore a new, unusual friendship and the difficult road to self-discovery.
results.title: Aristotle and Dante Discover the Secrets of the Universe

results.original_title: Flug in die Nacht - Das Unglück von Überlingen
results.overview: Air traffic controller Johann Lenders has just taken over the night shift in the tower at Zurich Airport when he notices an irregularity on the radar screen: two planes on a collision course. His efforts to avert the impending collision fail. A Russian passenger plane and a German cargo plane collide, killing 71 people. Meanwhile, Yuri Balkayev waits at Barcelona airport for his wife and two children to arrive - in vain. His family are among the victims of the Überlingen accident. Unable to comprehend the news of his loss, he sets off in search of those responsible. Johann Lenders is also completely distraught, he can hardly believe the disaster. He feels compelled to apologize to the relatives of the victims - but Katharina Rohl, a lawyer at air traffic control, forbids him to do so on behalf of the company boss.
results.title: Flug in die Nacht - Das Unglück von Überlingen

results.original_title: Kali Yug, il mistero del tempio indiano
results.overview: Doctor Palmer, wrongly accused of the murder of a British officer, is a prisoner of the Maharajah of Hasnabad. Doctor Palmer and Gopal, his devoted assistant, escape with the complicity of Amrita
results.title: The Mystery of the Indian Temple

results.original_title: Veuillez nous excuser pour la gêne occasionnée
results.overview: Sébastien, a conscientious and professional train inspector, dreams of being transferred to the South of France. To validate his transfer, he has to make one last routine run under the supervision of Madeleine, a slightly sociopathic inspector who won't let him go. That's when everything goes wrong: between a driver who thinks he's driving a fighter jet, a jealous colleague and passengers who are each crazier than the last, what was supposed to be a formality turns into the worst trip of his life.
results.title: The Madness Express

results.original_title: Ganovenehre. Ein Film aus der Berliner Unterwelt
results.title: Crook's Honor

results.original_title: Berlinger
results.overview: A fictional, non-chronological account of the life of the scientist, adventurer and industrialist Lukas Berlinger. The key dates and central events include Berlinger's birth in 1914, his friendship with Johannes Roeder, who was the same age, his marriage to Marlit in the early 1930s and Roeder's joining the NSDAP in 1936. As a chemist and "scientist important to the war effort", Berlinger was not required to go to the front during the Second World War, but it was slowly discovered that he was helping persecuted people to escape to Switzerland. Pressure from the Gestapo cost Marlit her life, and Berlinger fled to South America. It was not until 1968 that he returned to the western part of Germany. He meets Roeder again, who is now a senator and has become rich as a "building tycoon", and meets Maria, a teacher almost 30 years his junior, who looks strikingly similar to Marlit.
results.title: Berlinger

results.original_title: Mission Galactica: The Cylon Attack
results.overview: A compilation of Battlestar Galactica episodes 10–12 and 21, with alternate footage. Running low on fuel, the Battlestar Galactica receives the help of the supposedly lost Battlestar Pegasus which is taking the offensive with the Cylons.
results.title: Mission Galactica: The Cylon Attack

results.original_title: Vedove inconsolabili in cerca di... distrazioni
results.overview: In the wake of the black comedy episodes in vogue in the mid 60s, the film consists of three episodes that tell of husbands and wives who die happy
results.title: Inconsolable Widows Are Looking For Distractions

results.original_title: The Last Day of Summer
results.overview: Luke Malloy is freaking out. He doesn't want tomorrow to come because tomorrow means starting Middle School...saying goodbye to summer break and hello to homework. And even worse, hello to getting picked on by Meat, the terrible torturer of new kids. Luke's dread of tomorrow is casting a shadow on his enjoyment of his last day of summer, so he makes a wish that the Last Day of Summer would last forever... that his one last perfect day of fun and freedom would never end. But when his wish comes true, he discovers that he's stuck repeating the day over and over again, which, as Luke quickly learns, isn't any better. What do you do when the "ultimate do-over" isn't all it's cracked up to be?
results.title: The Last Day of Summer

results.original_title: El maestro que prometió el mar
results.overview: Ariadna discovers that her grandfather has been searching for the remains of his father, who disappeared during the Civil War. Determined to help him, she travels to Burgos, where a mass grave is being excavated, and where he could be buried. During her stay there, she will learn the story of Antoni Benaiges, a young teacher from Tarragona who was her grandfather's teacher before the war. Through an innovative pedagogical method, Antoni inspired his students and made them a promise: to take them to see the sea.
results.title: The Teacher Who Promised the Sea

results.original_title: Night of Too Many Stars: America Unites for Autism Programs
results.overview: Jon Stewart returns to television to host a live show presented from The Theater at Madison Square Garden in New York. Benefiting NEXT for Autism, the special features stand-up performances, sketches and short films.
results.title: Night of Too Many Stars: America Unites for Autism Programs

results.original_title: Ogni volta che te ne vai
results.overview: Orpheus was a child with a dream: to become a singer of smooth. Twenty years later, his dream becomes more complicated: to become a smooth singer with Pamela. And while she, free and elusive, continues to come and go in her life, music and dreams mark the rhythm of this bizarre love story.
results.title: Ogni volta che te ne vai

results.original_title: El cayo de la muerte
results.overview: Cuba, 1958. Rodolfo is 20 years old and dreams of becoming a movie director. His father is a persecuted member of the revolutionary movement and the family is obliged to flee Havana, taking refuge in a boring village.
results.title: The Isle of Death

results.original_title: The Roll of a Lifetime: How Dimension 20 Sold Out Madison Square Garden
results.overview: The cast and crew of Dimension 20 reflect on their journey from The Dome to Madison Square Garden.
results.title: The Roll of a Lifetime: How Dimension 20 Sold Out Madison Square Garden

results.original_title: Timelapse of the Future: A Journey to the End of Time
results.overview: How's it all gonna end? This experience takes us on a journey to the end of time, trillions of years into the future, to discover what the fate of our planet and our universe may ultimately be. We start in 2019 and travel exponentially through time, witnessing the future of Earth, the death of the sun, the end of all stars, proton decay, zombie galaxies, possible future civilizations, exploding black holes, the effects of dark energy, alternate universes, the final fate of the cosmos - to name a few.
results.title: Timelapse of the Future: A Journey to the End of Time

results.original_title: El ángel está en la cumbre
results.title: El ángel está en la cumbre

results.original_title: The Making of Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence
results.overview: This making of segment offers a lot of interview comments with the crew behind it, although does so in a rather rapid fashion. The most interesting element of this is probably learning a bit more behind how the movie was created from an animation standpoint, in particular the insight around animating the robots.
results.title: The Making of Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence

results.original_title: Belén
results.overview: In the conservative northwestern region of Argentina, Julieta finds herself accused of infanticide after a medical emergency. Facing a miscarriage of justice that lands her in prison for a crime she didn’t commit, her only hope is getting the chance to challenge her conviction in a courtroom battle with the help of Soledad, a fearless lawyer who risks everything to defend her. Their fight for justice will slowly begin to fuel a growing movement for solidarity and women’s rights.
results.title: Belén

results.original_title: Les Nuits de la pleine lune
results.overview: Feeling suffocated by a possessive boyfriend, work and suburban life, a young woman starts spending the weekends in her Paris apartment in order to reclaim some of her lost freedom.
results.title: Full Moon in Paris

results.original_title: 色‧戒
results.overview: During World War II, a secret agent must seduce and assassinate an official who works for the Japanese puppet government in Shanghai.
results.title: Lust, Caution

results.original_title: La face cachée de la lune
results.overview: After the death of his mother, a man tries to discover a meaning to his life, to the universe and to rebuild a relationship with the only family he has left: his gay brother.
results.title: Far Side of the Moon

results.original_title: Ein Sommer in Portugal
results.overview: Their 20th wedding anniversary is coming up and Liane and Ben want to celebrate it together in Lisbon. In the years of their marriage, the two have had little of each other. While Liane took care of the children and the household, architect Ben jetted around the world building luxury hotels. Now the children are out of the house and the couple want to spend more time together again. So much for the theory. In reality, Ben is stuck on a project in Morocco and can't pick up his wife at the airport in Lisbon. He has sent his friend, the Portuguese João, as a replacement. He takes his role very seriously and Liane obviously takes a liking to the new man at her side.
results.title: Ein Sommer in Portugal

results.original_title: Winnie-the-Pooh: Blood and Honey 2
results.overview: Five months following the murders, Christopher Robin struggles to maintain a regular life while dealing with PTSD. However, deep within the 100-Acre-Wood, a destructive rage grows as Pooh, Piglet, Owl, and Tigger find their home and their lives endangered after their existence is revealed.
results.title: Winnie-the-Pooh: Blood and Honey 2

results.original_title: Ill Manors
results.overview: Ensemble film revolving around characters living in Forest Gate, London. Over the course of a few days, six inter-linking stories explore issues of drug use, prostitution and urban poverty.
results.title: Ill Manors

results.original_title: If These Walls Could Sing
results.overview: The untold story of the Abbey Road studio, all-star interviews and intimate access to the premises.
results.title: If These Walls Could Sing

results.original_title: Tokyo melody, un film sur Ryuichi Sakamoto
results.overview: Documentary about the eclectic Japanese composer Ryuichi Sakamoto during the recording sessions for his 1984 album "Illustrated Musical Encyclopedia".
results.title: Tokyo Melody: A Film About Ryuichi Sakamoto

results.original_title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Lady in the Lake
results.overview: A woman suddenly disappears after an early morning walk, and her husband is accused of murder.
results.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Lady in the Lake

results.original_title: All Quiet on the Western Front
results.overview: At the start of World War I, Paul Baumer is a young German patriot, eager to fight. Indoctrinated with propaganda at school, he and his friends eagerly sign up for the army soon after graduation. But when the horrors of war soon become too much to bear, and as his friends die or become gravely wounded, Paul questions the sanity of fighting over a few hundreds yards of war-torn countryside.
results.title: All Quiet on the Western Front

results.original_title: The Ties That Bind Us
results.overview: A look at the subtle (and not so subtle!) links to the show's past and future contained within the story of The Five Doctors.
results.title: The Ties That Bind Us

results.original_title: Mrs. Wiggs of the Cabbage Patch
results.overview: The Wiggs family plan to celebrate Thanksgiving in their rundown shack with leftover stew, without Mr. Wiggs who wandered off long ago an has never been heard from. Do-gooder Miss Lucy brings them a real feast. Her boyfriend Bob arranges to take Wiggs' sick boy to a hospital. Their other boy makes some money peddling kindling and takes the family to a show. Mrs. Wiggs is called to the hopsital just in time to see her boy die. Her neighbor Miss Mazy wants to marry Mr. Stubbins who insists on tasting her cooking. Mrs. Wiggs sneaks her dishes past Stubbins who agrees to marriage. Mr. Wiggs appears suddenly, in tatters, with just the amount of money (twenty dollars) needed to save the family from foreclosure. Miss Lucy and Bob get married.
results.title: Mrs. Wiggs of the Cabbage Patch

results.original_title: Se incontri Sartana prega per la tua morte
results.overview: After a stagecoach is robbed and the passengers murdered, a long and tangled series of surprise attacks and murderous double-crosses, leaves the coach's strongbox in the hands of the killer Lasky. It is up to the legendary hero Sartana to track down the missing money and determine just who is ultimately behind the grisly robberies and killings.
results.title: If You Meet Sartana Pray for Your Death

results.original_title: The Positively True Adventures of the Alleged Texas Cheerleader-Murdering Mom
results.overview: A Texas housewife plots hire a hit man to kill the girl who beat out her daughter for a place on the cheerleading squad.
results.title: The Positively True Adventures of the Alleged Texas Cheerleader-Murdering Mom

results.original_title: All a Bir-r-r-d
results.overview: Tweety Bird is on a train with Sylvester.
results.title: All a Bir-r-r-d

results.original_title: Der Mann für alle Fälle: Ein ganz gewöhnlicher Totschlag
results.title: Der Mann für alle Fälle: Ein ganz gewöhnlicher Totschlag

results.original_title: 3D 豪情
results.overview: An honors graduate in literature, Wyman is stuck writing cheap erotic fiction, but somehow ends up starring in an AV film. Suddenly a porn superstar in Japan, he discovers a whole new world fraught with pleasure, pain and more twists and turns than he or the audience expects.
results.title: Naked Ambition 3D

results.original_title: Time Flies When You Are Having Fun! A Look Back at a Most "Excellent Adventure"
results.overview: A look back on the making of Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure with the creators of the film, featuring Interviews With Actors Alex Winter And Keanu Reeves, Producer Scott Kroopf, Composer David Newman, Supporting Actors Dan Shor, Rod Loomis, Clifford David, Al Leong, Terry Camilleri, And Jane Wiedlin, Special Make-Up Effects Designer Kevin Yagher And More!
results.title: Time Flies When You Are Having Fun! A Look Back at a Most "Excellent Adventure"

results.original_title: Judgment: The Court Martial of Lt. William Calley
results.overview: This docudrama follows the court-martial of the title character, the man held responsible for the My Lai massacre during the Vietnam War.
results.title: Judgment: The Court Martial of Lt. William Calley

results.original_title: Peter O'Toole: Along the Sky Road to Aqaba
results.overview: Reflecting Peter O'Toole's theatrical legacy, this feature documentary is structured into four acts, each introduced by a quote about O'Toole that encapsulates his life during a specific period.
results.title: Peter O'Toole: Along the Sky Road to Aqaba

results.original_title: Unforgivable Blackness: The Rise and Fall of Jack Johnson
results.overview: The story of Jack Johnson, the first African American Heavyweight boxing champion.
results.title: Unforgivable Blackness: The Rise and Fall of Jack Johnson

results.original_title: Atomik Circus - Le Retour de James Bataille
results.overview: James Bataille is in love. He attempts to stage an elaborate motorcycle stunt to impress the girl, but when it goes sour, he ends up in prison with a 133-year sentence. Bataille escapes from behind bars to make an appointment to fix the car of music biz tycoon, as well as watch the love of his life take part in the town's annual talent show.
results.title: The Return of James Battle

results.original_title: Black Swan
results.overview: The story of a ballerina in a New York City ballet company whose life is completely consumed with dance. Nina lives with her retired ballerina mother who zealously supports her daughter's professional ambition. When the artistic director decides to replace the prima ballerina for the opening production of their new season, Nina is his first choice.
results.title: Black Swan

results.original_title: ¡Qué tía la C.I.A.!
results.title: ¡Qué tía la C.I.A.!

results.original_title: Angel, Angel, Down We Go
results.overview: The overweight debutante daughter of the world's wealthiest couple falls in with a gang of tripped out, skydiving pseudo-reactionary pop stars, who take their beliefs of the American ideal to profoundly impossible heights.
results.title: Angel, Angel, Down We Go

results.original_title: On n'engraisse pas les cochons à l'eau claire
results.overview: The true identity of an undercover RCMP narcotics agent is discovered by the criminals he is investigating and his family pays the price.
results.title: Pigs Are Seldom Clean

results.original_title: The Cutting Edge: Going for the Gold
results.overview: Two ice skaters develop a love-hate relationship while dreaming of Olympic glory.
results.title: The Cutting Edge: Going for the Gold

results.original_title: Ahí está el detalle
results.overview: Cantinflas, the boyfriend of the servant of a rich industrial man, gets into the house in order to kill a mad dog. Suddenly this man appears so the servant tells him that Cantinflas is his wife's brother (Leonardo), who had been lost for years. The rich man then remembers that his father in law's testament could only be paid when all brothers get together, so treats Cantinflas, a real bum, as a king.
results.title: You’re Missing the Point

results.original_title: You Had to Be There: How the Toronto Godspell Ignited the Comedy Revolution...
results.overview: A documentary about the legendary 1972 Toronto production of the musical about the life of Jesus, which launched many illustrious careers and ignited a comedy revolution.
results.title: You Had to Be There: How the Toronto Godspell Ignited the Comedy Revolution...

results.original_title: Eames: The Architect and the Painter
results.overview: Interviews with the junior designers swept into the 24-7 world of "The Eamery" are the heart of this complex picture of a husband-and-wife creative team that define the era of Mid-Century Modernism. Narrated by James Franco, the film draws from a trove of archival material, primarily the stunning films and photographs produced in mind-boggling volume by Charles, Ray, and their staff during the hyper-creative forty years of the Eames Office.
results.title: Eames: The Architect and the Painter

results.original_title: Return to Sender
results.overview: While fighting for a woman who sits on death row, a lawyer happens upon new information which brings into question the motives of a man associated with her client
results.title: Return to Sender

results.original_title: A Shoe Addict's Christmas
results.overview: As Christmas approaches, a department store worker whose life lacks fulfillment meets her guardian angel, who offers her a chance to change her circumstances by magically transporting her to Christmases past whenever she tries on a new pair of shoes.
results.title: A Shoe Addict's Christmas

results.original_title: The Ex
results.overview: When his lawyer wife, Sofia, becomes pregnant, chronic underachiever Tom Reilly must take a job at his father-in-law's advertising firm. Tom has to adjust to the demands of a very high-powered job, and he finds himself in an increasingly hostile office rivalry with Chip, Sofia's paraplegic former lover.
results.title: The Ex

results.original_title: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
results.overview: Times are changing for Manny the moody mammoth, Sid the motor mouthed sloth and Diego the crafty saber-toothed tiger. Life heats up for our heroes when they meet some new and none-too-friendly neighbors – the mighty dinosaurs.
results.title: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs

results.original_title: Agatha and the Truth of Murder
results.overview: England, December 1926. Although her personal life is in tatters, the famous writer Agatha Christie decides to leave everything behind to help unravel an unsolved murder committed on a train six years ago, unable to imagine the disproportionate consequences that such a selfless act will cause.
results.title: Agatha and the Truth of Murder

results.original_title: The Somme: From Defeat to Victory
results.overview: Based on diaries, records and eyewitness accounts, this is the story of the two Battles of the Somme from the perspective of British and German soldiers. It shows how the major lessons learned by the British Army leadership after the disastrous first attacks of July 1916 were turned into victory at the second attempt in September 1916, arguably the turning point for the First World War.
results.title: The Somme: From Defeat to Victory

results.original_title: Yogi Bear's All-Star Comedy Christmas Caper
results.overview: Yogi escapes from Jellystone and hides out in a department store - posing as the Store's Santa. Along the way, he helps a little girl to rediscover her faith in Christmas.
results.title: Yogi Bear's All-Star Comedy Christmas Caper

results.original_title: Jak utopit dr. Mráčka aneb Konec vodníků v Čechách
results.overview: There are still water spirits among us. One group lives in Prague, led by Mr. Wassermann, who is using his wife's family as a servants. All they need is their old house near the river. But the house is to be demolished. They have to stop it. And the only way is to drown Dr. Mrácek, who is responsible for the demolition. But he falls in love with Wassermann's niece Jana. He changes to fish, is mistaken for water spirit from Germany, is drowned and revived again. The other problem is the flour with ears... and so on...
results.title: How to Drown Dr. Mracek, the Lawyer

results.original_title: Stories on the Next Page
results.overview: Three stories explore different relationships, their respective conflicts and how closure brings an end to a chapter while also ushering in a new one.
results.title: Stories on the Next Page

results.original_title: Sicario
results.overview: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the border area between the U.S. and Mexico.
results.title: Sicario

results.original_title: Katja Mann: Ein Leben mit Thomas Mann
results.title: Katja Mann: A Life with Thomas Mann

results.original_title: La montagna del dio cannibale
results.overview: A woman and her brother fly to New Guinea to look for a lost expedition, led by her husband, which has vanished in the great jungle.
results.title: Slave of the Cannibal God

results.original_title: Trolljegeren
results.overview: A group of students investigates a series of mysterious bear killings, but learns that there are much more dangerous things going on. They start to follow a mysterious hunter, learning that he is actually a troll hunter.
results.title: Troll Hunter

results.original_title: How to Kill Your Coworkers and Get Away with it
results.overview: Abbys world crumbles around her she becomes unhinged eventually convinces her coworkers to help her kill her former crooked boss
results.title: How to Kill Your Coworkers and Get Away with it

results.original_title: Homer and Eddie
results.overview: A mentally disabled man gets help from a sociopath when he tries to reunite with his dying father, who years earlier disowned him.
results.title: Homer and Eddie

results.original_title: Napoleon
results.overview: An epic that details the checkered rise and fall of French Emperor Napoleon Bonaparte and his relentless journey to power through the prism of his addictive, volatile relationship with his wife, Josephine.
results.title: Napoleon

results.original_title: ¿Por qué ya no me quieres?
results.overview: Tired of struggling, Lilia, played by Sara Montiel, moves to the city to live with her aunt, a former actress. There she strives to become a singer and meets Raul a singer, played by Agustin Lara, who helps her succeed.
results.title: ¿Por qué ya no me quieres?

results.original_title: Night at the Museum
results.overview: Chaos reigns at the natural history museum when night watchman Larry Daley accidentally stirs up an ancient curse, awakening Attila the Hun, an army of gladiators, a Tyrannosaurus rex and other exhibits.
results.title: Night at the Museum

results.original_title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs: Lobster Claus Is Coming to Town
results.overview: It’s Christmas time in Swallow Falls and to Sam’s surprise there’s not a single Santa Claus decoration! Until Flint introduces her to their version of Santa, Lobster Claus! Frustrated, Sam writes to Santa to tell him about Lobster Claus taking credit for all of Santa’s work. Santa unexpectedly arrives in Swallow Falls to challenge Lobster Claus. The town blames Sam for ruining Christmas, and she and Flint must find a way to make peace between the two Clauses.
results.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs: Lobster Claus Is Coming to Town

results.original_title: Escape from the Newsroom
results.overview: It's a strange movie that you have to watch beginning to end, or you'll find yourself completely lost. Based on the Toronto-made TV series "Newsroom," this made-for-TV movie has many well-recognized Canadian actors and comedians. It's a modest comedy that has its "short chuckle of laughter" moments, but the real highlight is similar to the highlight of 12 Angry Men. They obviously endeavoured to make the acting look as real and natural as possible when making this show, and most of the entertainment comes from listening in on their conversations and being convinced by the good acting. This is the similarity to 12 Angry Men.
results.title: Escape from the Newsroom

results.original_title: Voor een verloren soldaat
results.overview: In the occupied Netherlands near the end of WWII, a young teenager, Jeroen Boman (Maarten Smit) is sent to the Dutch countryside to avoid the war in Amsterdam. While living with his adopted family, Jeroen meets and becomes friends with a Canadian soldier named Walt Cook, who is stationed at the same town he is staying at. Joroen and Walt spend a lot of time playing around and eventually a romantic relationship develops between them. The boy’s sexual curiosity leads him to have a sexual experience with Walt, an encounter that is shown with some vague detail but without actually showing any nudity, even though sexual intimacy between the two of them is implied. Overall, the movie handles this difficult subject with an elegant style and feeling, without having the adult-child relationship overwhelm the viewer and thus allowing the movie to be seen as just a wartime relationship between two people that marks an important time in a young boy’s life.
results.title: For a Lost Soldier

results.original_title: Ik Kudi Punjab Di
results.overview: Ik Kudi Punjab Di tells a richly textured tale from a keenly female perspective set against the backdrop of male-dominated Punjabi society. It does so with a Shakespearean credo of “all the world’s a stage” and a lively cast.
results.title: Ik Kudi Punjab Di

results.original_title: Terreur et glamour : montée et déclin du studio Hammer
results.overview: The greatness, fall and renaissance of Hammer, the flagship company of British popular cinema, mainly from 1955 to 1968. Tortured women and sadistic monsters populated oppressive scenarios in provocative productions that shocked censorship and disgusted critics but fascinated the public. Movies in which horror was shown in offensive colors: dreadful stories, told without prejudices, that offered fear, blood, sex and stunning performances.
results.title: Dark Glamour: The Blood and Guts of Hammer Productions

results.original_title: Was man von hier aus sehen kann
results.overview: On a beautiful spring day, a small village full of eccentric characters wake up to hear Selma has had a premonition: she dreamt of a rare animal again – an okapi. All the village knows this means someone is about to die. Selma’s granddaughter, 11-year-old Luise, and her best friend Martin look on as fears of being the victim of the prophecy throw the village into a frenzy of confusion. But when the premonition comes true, it is young Luise’s world that is suddenly turned upside down. Ten years on from the event that changed her life, Luise lives a quiet life working in a bookstore, until the arrival of an unexpected guest enables her to rediscover how powerful and life-giving love can be.
results.title: What You Can See from Here

results.original_title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
results.overview: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a group of mutated turtle warriors must emerge from the shadows to protect their home.
results.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

results.original_title: The Age of Disclosure
results.overview: Director Dan Farah got 34 senior members of the U.S. Government, military, and intelligence community to come on camera. He says they reveal an 80 year cover-up of the existence of non-human intelligent life and a secret war amongst major nations to reverse engineer technology of non-human origin. The film explores the profound impact the situation has on the future of humanity, while providing a look behind-the-scenes with those at the forefront of the bi-partisan disclosure effort.
results.title: The Age of Disclosure

results.original_title: The Age of Disclosure
results.overview: Director Dan Farah got 34 senior members of the U.S. Government, military, and intelligence community to come on camera. He says they reveal an 80 year cover-up of the existence of non-human intelligent life and a secret war amongst major nations to reverse engineer technology of non-human origin. The film explores the profound impact the situation has on the future of humanity, while providing a look behind-the-scenes with those at the forefront of the bi-partisan disclosure effort.
results.title: The Age of Disclosure

results.original_title: Elevation
results.overview: Post-apocalyptic survivors find refuge in the Rocky Mountains to hide from giant, insect-like creatures that can't live above 8,000 feet. However, when one of them needs life-saving supplies, they risk it all to venture into the danger zone.
results.title: Elevation

results.original_title: Credo in un solo padre
results.overview: Falcino, a small town in the south of Italy. No one sees. No one hears. Nobody talks. But everyone knows. And so they all become accomplices of a tragedy against women, against kids, against a family. A story of violence and slavery. Indifference is stronger than their conscience. Maria, a young mother of a family, lives with her husband Gerardo and her two children, Rocco e Carmela, on her father-in-law's farm: "grandpà" Giuseppe. Gerardo decides to emigrate to Austria to earn more money so as to allow a more comfortable life for the family. This absence will be the beginning of a nightmare that will lead Maria and her daughter to be victims of abuse of an unscrupulous ogre (monster).
results.title: Credo in un solo padre

results.original_title: Highest 2 Lowest
results.overview: When a titan music mogul, widely known as having the "best ears in the business", is targeted with a ransom plot, he is jammed up in a life-or-death moral dilemma.
results.title: Highest 2 Lowest

results.original_title: Ice Age: Continental Drift
results.overview: Manny, Diego, and Sid embark upon another adventure after their continent is set adrift. Using an iceberg as a ship, they encounter sea creatures and battle pirates as they explore a new world.
results.title: Ice Age: Continental Drift

results.original_title: The Good Guys and the Bad Guys
results.overview: An aging lawman and an aging outlaw join forces when their respective positions in society are usurped by a younger, but incompetent Marshal, and a younger, but vicious gang leader.
results.title: The Good Guys and the Bad Guys

results.original_title: Dìdi (弟弟)
results.overview: In 2008, during the last month of summer before high school begins, an impressionable 13-year-old Taiwanese American boy learns what his family can't teach him: how to skate, how to flirt, and how to love your mom.
results.title: Dìdi (弟弟)

results.original_title: 엄마친구 2
results.overview: An art student named Gwang-ho gets dumped by his girlfriend because she was only his source of comfort, and that he's a Mama's boy and a premature ejaculator. He tries to avoid seeing her by going to a different academy and that's when his mother introduces him to her friend Soo-yeon, a sophisticated and intelligent looking woman. Gwang-ho falls for her.  Gwang-ho's mother suddenly leaves for Australia because his father is sick and Gwang-ho gets to stay in Soo-yeon's house for a few days. Looking at her, he thinks of all the things he would like to do with her and Soo-yeon's niece Ha-kyeong stimulates him to do something about his feelings.
results.title: Mom's Friend 2

results.original_title: Raw Justice
results.overview: The mayor of a small town hires a bounty hunter to find his daughter's killer, but it turns out to be a very dangerous job.
results.title: Raw Justice

results.original_title: Con la grazia di un Dio
results.overview: Back in Genoa for the first time in twenty-five years, to attend the funeral of his best friend from when he was growing up, Luca reunites with the old gang of yore. All of them are sure that the late lamented had brought it on himself, with his dissipated lifestyle. Not Luca: he wants to know, investigate, understand. He searches his memory, in a city as changed as he is, as characters and situations reemerge ghost-like from a buried past, along with Luca’s own true nature, which he thought he had definitively tamed.
results.title: With the Grace of a God

results.title: Un tropezón cualquiera da en la vida

results.overview: Teenagers in a small town are dropping like flies, apparently in the grip of mass hysteria causing their suicides. A cop's daughter, Nancy Thompson, traces the cause to child molester Fred Krueger, who was burned alive by angry parents many years before. Krueger has now come back in the dreams of his killers' children, claiming their lives as his revenge. Nancy and her boyfriend, Glen, must devise a plan to lure the monster out of the realm of nightmares and into the real world...

They must now go on a new journey across the wilderness to find Runt before the winter festivities begin at home.

results.title: Die menschliche Pyramide oder Wohl dem, der eine Bleibe hat

results.original_title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
results.overview: Ethan Hunt and his team are racing against time to track down a dangerous terrorist named Hendricks, who has gained access to Russian nuclear launch codes and is planning a strike on the United States. An attempt to stop him ends in an explosion causing severe destruction to the Kremlin and the IMF to be implicated in the bombing, forcing the President to disavow them. No longer being aided by the government, Ethan and his team chase Hendricks around the globe, although they might still be too late to stop a disaster.

results.original_title: 9 Songs
results.overview: Matt, a young glaciologist, soars across the vast, silent, icebound immensities of the South Pole as he recalls his love affair with Lisa. They meet at a mobbed rock concert in a vast music hall - London's Brixton Academy. They are in bed at night's end. Together, over a period of several months, they pursue a mutual sexual passion whose inevitable stages unfold in counterpoint to nine live-concert songs.
results.title: 9 Songs

results.original_title: Ce sera tout pour aujourd'hui
results.title: Ce sera tout pour aujourd'hui

results.original_title: La Joya y los guerreros de la niebla
results.overview: A people who lived on the brink of the abyss and buried their dead on sheer cliffs, defying all logic. The Chachapoya culture flourished between 800 and 1500 AD in northern Peru, at an altitude of more than 3,000 meters. No one knows for sure whether the Chachapoyas came out of the jungles or the mountains, but they settled in a place that seems impossibly difficult to live in: the mountainous fringes of the Peruvian jungle.
results.title: La Joya and the Warriors in the Mist

results.original_title: No Crossover: The Trial of Allen Iverson
results.overview: Director Steve James returns to his home town of Hampton, Virginia to tell the story of how the trial of a young basketball star left a city divided.
results.title: No Crossover: The Trial of Allen Iverson

results.original_title: Going Clear: Scientology and the Prison of Belief
results.overview: GOING CLEAR intimately profiles eight former members of the Church of Scientology, shining a light on how they attract true believers and the things they do in the name of religion.
results.title: Going Clear: Scientology and the Prison of Belief

results.original_title: How to Beat a Bully
results.overview: When a new kid named Cory moves to town, he's picked on by the school bullies. To protect himself, he doesn't use his fists-he uses his brain instead! He scares the bullies off by fibbing that his father is a hit man for the mob. Word quickly spreads around and gets the attention of the REAL mobsters in town, too. Now his dad has the problem! As shenanigans between the family and the mobsters ensue, Cory must find a way to make things right.
results.title: How to Beat a Bully

results.original_title: La vida inmoral de la pareja ideal

results.title: Tales of an Immoral Couple

results.original_title: Garage Sale Mystery: The Art of Murder
results.overview: Jennifer Shannon is a garage sale shopping expert whose sharp observation skills allow her to uncover valuable antiques, as well as help her local police department investigate crimes. While arranging a charity garage sale event, Jennifer finds a body in the attic of a local residence. While working to crack the case, Jennifer offers support to her loving husband, Jason, whose upcoming birthday has sparked a mid-life crisis. As Jennifer prepares to buy him the perfect gift, she receives an urgent voicemail from Tina, pleading for her immediate assistance. When she responds, the garage sale-expert-turned-sleuth finds herself standing face-to-face with a killer.
results.title: Garage Sale Mystery: The Art of Murder

results.original_title: It's Yours: A Film on Hip-Hop and the Internet
results.overview: By the dawn of the 21st century, hip-hop sales had reached an all-time high, but one thing has remained the same. The doors were still locked, and the music industry held the keys. Young artists began to self-market on the Internet, ultimately helping to collapse the music industry as we knew it. It’s Yours explores how it became possible to become a rap star through a Twitter account, YouTube site or Myspace page.  It tells this story through the unique perspectives of numerous artists, producers, record industry insiders, and music and cultural critics.
results.title: It's Yours: A Film on Hip-Hop and the Internet

results.original_title: La calle de la amargura

results.original_title: Malèna

results.original_title: (500) Days of Summer
results.overview: Tom, greeting-card writer and hopeless romantic, is caught completely off-guard when his girlfriend, Summer, suddenly dumps him. He reflects on their 500 days together to try to figure out where their love affair went sour, and in doing so, Tom rediscovers his true passions in life.
results.title: (500) Days of Summer

results.original_title: Brille und Bombe - Bei uns liegen Sie richtig!

results.overview: Despite his best intentions, billionaire Jason Stevens can’t find enough time to keep his beloved Alexia a priority. But when he discovers his late grandfather’s journal, he is transported back to Red Stevens’ incredible world. With everything he loves hanging in the balance, Jason Stevens hopes the past will prepare him well for the future.
results.title: The Ultimate Life

results.original_title: Almuth und Rita - Zwei wie Pech und Schwefel
results.overview: Rita still cleans Almuth's house and the two ladies occasionally have tea together - they have actually become pretty good friends. When Rita's husband Werner suddenly passes away, Almuth has to help her. This is not easy for her and she is also struggling with her own problems. Klaus expects Almuth to finally make a decision about their relationship and then her daughter Kathrin moves in with her after separating from her husband. When Rita then interferes in Almuth's life, the women really start to quarrel. The cleaning lady has little understanding for Frau Doktor's throwaway mentality. In the end, Rita terminates Almuth's extraordinary friendship. Can the two opposing women find their way back to each other?
results.title: Almuth und Rita - Zwei wie Pech und Schwefel

results.original_title: Played

results.title: El mas valiente del mundo

results.original_title: Irgendwann ist auch mal gut
results.overview: The life of Karsten, a mortician, isn’t going that well at the moment. Just in time for Christmas, his parents inform him during the festive dinner that they want to commit suicide together. In ﬁve days. Usually used to death, he tries everything to convince the dear mother Marion and the father Theodor, suﬀering from Parkinson’s disease, not to pursue their plan. But the conﬂict about the self-determined death opens up old wounds – and as Karsten’s own health deteriorates rapidly, it is no longer clear who needs to be saved.
results.title: Irgendwann ist auch mal gut

results.original_title: Marvel One-Shot: Item 47
results.overview: Benny and Claire, a down-on-their-luck couple, find a discarded Chitauri weapon referred to as 'Item 47'.
results.title: Marvel One-Shot: Item 47

results.title: The Hazing

results.original_title: Too Funny to Fail: The Life & Death of The Dana Carvey Show
results.overview: It had all the makings of a huge television success:  a white-hot comic at the helm, a coveted primetime slot, and a pantheon of future comedy legends in the cast and crew. So why did The Dana Carvey Show—with a writers room and cast including then unknowns Steve Carell, Stephen Colbert, Louis C.K., Robert Smigel, Charlie Kaufman, and more— crash and burn so spectacularly? TOO FUNNY TO FAIL tells the hilarious true story of a crew of genius misfits who set out to make comedy history… and succeeded in a way they never intended.
results.title: Too Funny to Fail: The Life & Death of The Dana Carvey Show

And finally, seven incredible ladies compete in the "Hefty Honey" division representing the large breasted women. Each division creates a special look as these sensuous ladies go the distance to impress the judges with their special assets. You won't believe it as the crowd goes crazy as we crown three winners for the Best Chest in the U.S. Celebrity Judges Are: Ron Smith, Bill Gazzarri & Dan Haggarty. Hosted by comic Garret Adkins

Although Celine quickly frees herself, she stays with Robert for thrills. O'Reilly and Jackson pursue, hoping to unite the prospective lovers.

results.overview: In the late sixties, Spanish cinema began to produce a huge amount of horror genre films: international markets were opened, the production was continuous, a small star-system was created, as well as a solid group of specialized directors. Although foreign trends were imitated, Spanish horror offered a particular approach to sex, blood and violence. It was an extremely unusual artistic movement in Franco's Spain.
results.title: Clawing! A Journey Through the Spanish Horror

results.original_title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
results.overview: Forks, Washington resident Bella Swan is reeling from the departure of her vampire love, Edward Cullen, and finds comfort in her friendship with Jacob Black, a werewolf. But before she knows it, she's thrust into a centuries-old conflict, and her desire to be with Edward at any cost leads her to take greater and greater risks.

results.original_title: El lugar de las tres cascadas. Pequeñas historias de Hiroshima
results.overview: The Buddhist temple Mitaki, located a few kilometers from Hiroshima, epicenter of the 1945 atomic explosion, was protected by the surrounding mountains from the radiation that caused the bomb. The film presents the experience of three characters from the city: a young artist, an adult artist and a monk.
results.title: The Place Of The Three Waterfalls. Little Stories Of Hiroshima

results.original_title: सितारे ज़मीन पर
results.overview: A disgraced basketball coach is given the chance to coach a team of players who are intellectually disabled as part of community services. Gulshan has apprehensions at first and feels out of place but soon realizes they just might have what it takes to make it to the national championships.

results.original_title: 탐하다: 욕망의 섬

In the uninhabited desert of endless desire, it turns out that somebody is found as a body and another person is on the island.  Can they escape safely from the island of desire?

results.original_title: Return to Paradise
results.overview: Lewis, Sheriff and Tony are three friends vacationing in Malaysia. Sheriff and Tony eventually leave to pursue careers in New York, but Lewis stays behind to work with orangutans. Two years later, Sheriff and Tony learn that, because of their past actions, Lewis has been arrested for drug possession. With Lewis facing a death sentence, the friends are left with a difficult decision: return to Malaysia and split Lewis' sentence, or let him die.
results.title: Return to Paradise

results.original_title: Virus: 32

results.overview: Five years have passed and Jake has turned his back on his family. He's still up to his usual tricks in McClutchy's Bar, unaware, as he downs his latest opponent, that his eldest son, Nig, has died in a gang fight. The uncomfortable family reunion at Nig's funeral sparks a confrontation with second son, Sonny, and sets Jake and Sonny on a downward spiral.

results.original_title: A Place for Us: West Side Story's Legacy

results.overview: When a serial killer of women is on the loose in Sparta, all the clues lead Sheriff Gillespie and Forbes to the home of the wealthy Judge Walker.

results.overview: When a serial killer of women is on the loose in Sparta, all the clues lead Sheriff Gillespie and Forbes to the home of the wealthy Judge Walker.
results.title: In the Heat of the Night: A Matter of Justice

results.overview: A white water rafting vacation turns into a nightmare when divorced mother Maggie Keene must confront the deadly and charismatic killer who is stalking her. The hunt is on, and Maggie's desperation to stay alive proves to be a worthy match for her killer, the river, and the dangerous elements she is forced to survive.
results.title: River of Rage: The Taking of Maggie Keene

results.original_title: Gin & Juice by Dre and Snoop
results.overview: Short film for Dr. Dre and Snoop Dogg 's 'Gin and Juice' beverage.
results.title: Gin & Juice by Dre and Snoop
