results.overview: A celebration of the Irish punk/poet Shane MacGowan, lead singer and songwriter of The Pogues, that combines unseen archive footage from the band and MacGowan’s family with original animations.
results.title: Crock of Gold: A Few Rounds with Shane MacGowan

results.original_title: Jerry Seinfeld: I'm Telling You for the Last Time
results.overview: Taped for HBO in August 1998, on the final date of Jerry Seinfeld's tour appearances at New York City's Broadhurst Theater, I'm Telling You for the Last Time presents the standup comedian's so-called "final" standup, or at least his final tour with the standup material that made him famous.
results.title: Jerry Seinfeld: I'm Telling You for the Last Time

results.original_title: Heidi Kabel - Zwei neue Stücke zum 80. Geburtstag und ein bißchen mehr
results.title: Heidi Kabel - Zwei neue Stücke zum 80. Geburtstag und ein bißchen mehr

results.original_title: Megamind
results.overview: After Megamind, a highly intelligent alien supervillain, defeats his long-time nemesis Metro Man, Megamind creates a new hero to fight, but must act to save the city when his "creation" becomes an even worse villain than he was.
results.title: Megamind

results.original_title: La vera vita di Antonio H.
results.overview: This film depicts a series of landmark events in the life of hapless thespian Antonio Hutter (Alessandro Haber), the unfortunate fictional alter-ego of legendary actor Alessandro Haber. This surreal faux-biography begins with Hutter's birth in Bologna, Italy, and his early life in the Middle East and follows him through the highs and lows of his acting career, using a combination of interviews with real-life colleagues, archival footage and improvised scenes along the way.
results.title: The True Life of Antonio H.

results.original_title: The Over-the-Hill Gang Rides Again
results.overview: Walter Brennan is back as the clever and funny over the hill Texas Ranger Nash Crawford. This time the gang must face corruption in their own home town. The gang put their heads together to clean up their town, take back the rule of law and rehabilitate the town lush (played by Fred Astaire) along with way.
results.title: The Over-the-Hill Gang Rides Again

results.original_title: Vice President Kamala Harris: Chase the Dream
results.overview: Follow the journey of Vice President Kamala Harris, the first black woman and South Asian American to serve as the Vice President. Now she takes on her most crucial role, as the potential President of the United States.
results.title: Vice President Kamala Harris: Chase the Dream

results.original_title: Black Hawk Down
results.overview: When U.S. Rangers and an elite Delta Force team attempt to kidnap two underlings of a Somali warlord, their Black Hawk helicopters are shot down, and the Americans suffer heavy casualties, facing intense fighting from the militia on the ground.
results.title: Black Hawk Down

results.original_title: Die Ungewollten – Die Irrfahrt der St. Louis
results.overview: Hamburg, Germany, 1939. Getting a passage aboard the passenger liner St. Louis seems to be the last hope of salvation for more than nine hundred German Jews who, desperate to escape the atrocious persecution to which they are subjected by the Nazi regime, intend to emigrate to Cuba.
results.title: St. Louis

results.original_title: Conclave
results.overview: After the unexpected death of the Pope, Cardinal Lawrence is tasked with managing the covert and ancient ritual of electing a new one. Sequestered in the Vatican with the Catholic Church’s most powerful leaders until the process is complete, Lawrence finds himself at the center of a conspiracy that could lead to its downfall.
results.title: Conclave

results.original_title: Öl - Die Wahrheit über den Untergang der DDR
results.title: Öl - Die Wahrheit über den Untergang der DDR

results.original_title: Broadway Melody of 1940
results.overview: Johnny Brett and King Shaw are an unsuccessful dance team in New York. A producer discovers Brett as the new partner for Clare Bennett, but Brett, who thinks he is one of the people they lent money to, gives him the name of his partner.
results.title: Broadway Melody of 1940

results.original_title: Tea for Two Hundred
results.overview: Donald is preparing a little picnic when he sees some ants passing by. He decides to tease one, ultimately by piling lots of food onto it. The ant eventually stumbles, but realizes Donald is sitting on a veritable gold mine. He rallies his fellow ants, and while Donald is napping, they cart him to a cliff and drop him into the river. When he returns to the raid in progress, he finds himself powerless to stop it. He dynamites the ant hill, but that only separates the ledge he's standing on, and he finds himself in the river again as the ants finish off a cupcake.
results.title: Tea for Two Hundred

results.original_title: Behind the Tunes: Tish Tash - The Animated World of Frank Tashlin
results.overview: A documentary about Frank Tashlin's cartoons.
results.title: Behind the Tunes: Tish Tash - The Animated World of Frank Tashlin

results.original_title: Garage Sale Mysteries: Murder In D Minor
results.overview: Jennifer wins the bid on a vintage self-playing piano at an estate auction. The piano was owned by the late Carl Deats and Jennifer discovers that this wealthy philanthropist has a dark history.
results.title: Garage Sale Mysteries: Murder In D Minor

results.original_title: 英雄
results.overview: During China's Warring States period, a district prefect arrives at the palace of Qin Shi Huang, claiming to have killed the three assassins who had made an attempt on the king's life three years ago.
results.title: Hero

results.original_title: At the Heart of Gold: Inside the USA Gymnastics Scandal
results.overview: A look inside the USA gymnastics sexual abuse scandal that shook the sports world in 2017 depicting a landscape in which women spend their youth seeking victory on a world stage, juxtaposed against a culture where abuse prevails and lives are damaged forever.
results.title: At the Heart of Gold: Inside the USA Gymnastics Scandal

results.original_title: Fracking the System: Colorado's Oil and Gas Wars
results.overview: Fracking the System is a political thriller documentary from the front lines of climate justice activism in Colorado. When a fracking mega-site gets moved from a White neighborhood to a BIPOC neighborhood, a concerned mother fights to try and stop it. This is an investigative exposé about the harms of fracking, the lengths to which the government is complacent with industrial pollution, and the nefarious tactics that the oil and gas industry uses to undermine democratic elections.
results.title: Fracking the System: Colorado's Oil and Gas Wars

results.original_title: Sedia Elettrica: il making of del film Io e Te
results.overview: Making of documentary of Bernardo Bertolucci's Io e Te.
results.title: Sedia Elettrica: il making of del film Io e Te

results.original_title: Sedia Elettrica: il making of del film Io e Te
results.overview: Making of documentary of Bernardo Bertolucci's Io e Te.
results.title: Sedia Elettrica: il making of del film Io e Te

results.original_title: En cualquier lugar fuera de este mundo
results.title: En cualquier lugar fuera de este mundo

results.original_title: Monsters University
results.overview: A look at the relationship between Mike and Sulley during their days at Monsters University — when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.
results.title: Monsters University

results.original_title: The Time, The Place and The Girl
results.overview: The stuffy manager of lovely opera singer Vicki Cassel and her uncle, a classical conductor, is determined to close down the noisy nightclub next door to the Cassels' home. The club's owners--Steve, a handsome ladies' man, and Jeff, his clownish sidekick--hatch a plan to keep the club open. Steve arranges to meet--and woo--Vicki and then invite her and her uncle to the club. When Vicki's snobbish aunt and the manager discover that Vicki now favors popular music over the classics, they arrange to get the club closed. But that doesn't keep Steve and Jeff down. Instead, they decide to put on a Broadway show if they can get a backer. They find their "angel" in Vicki's uncle who agrees to finance the show only if Vicki is the leading lady. But again, Vicki's aunt and manager may be the spoiler in everyone's plans.
results.title: The Time, The Place and The Girl

results.original_title: De Superman à Spider-Man: L'aventure des super-héros
results.overview: The historical saga of American superheroes. Born in the period between the Great Depression and the World War II to combat the hobgoblins of the modern world, these mutant human beings with superhuman powers colonized the funny papers, radio dramas, television and films, to become a truly national industry in the United States: they gave expression to the fears and obsessions of the twentieth century and bolstered American ideals.
results.title: Once Upon a Time: The Super Heroes

results.original_title: Better Watch Out
results.overview: On a quiet suburban street tucked within a 'safe neighborhood', a babysitter must defend a twelve-year-old boy from strangers breaking into the house, only to discover that this is far from a normal home invasion.
results.title: Better Watch Out

results.original_title: ペンギン・ハイウェイ
results.overview: A fourth-grader investigates the mysterious reason behind the sudden appearance of penguins in his village, which is somehow related to a power from a young woman working at a dental clinic.
results.title: Penguin Highway

results.original_title: Je règle mon pas sur le pas de mon père
results.overview: Sauveur (Savior) needs someone to save him, and so he begins to look for his father, a fast- talking ladies' man. The son becomes attached to his misanthropic father, and soon a crippled woman photographer and a gigolo with a killer smile also enter the scene, and the situation becomes more and more impossible.
results.title: Je règle mon pas sur le pas de mon père

results.original_title: Die Revolution entläßt ihre Kinder
results.title: Die Revolution entläßt ihre Kinder

results.original_title: Cirque du Soleil: A Thrilling Ride Through Kooza
results.overview: Cirque du Soleil presents A thrilling ride through Kooza, a captivating documentary that looks at the creative process of Kooza, the latest and critically acclaimed touring show from Cirque du Soleil. Embark on a journey that starts at the humble beginnings of some of Cirque's creative pioneers as they share their personal voyage - and a few revealing anecdotes - that highlight the multiple stages of the creation of a live show.
results.title: Cirque du Soleil: A Thrilling Ride Through Kooza

results.original_title: Ivan Koloff the Most Hated Man in America
results.overview: Documentry about "The Russian Bear" Ivan Koloff
results.title: Ivan Koloff the Most Hated Man in America

results.original_title: Masters of Illusion: The Wizards of Special Effects
results.overview: Documentary focused on the creation of movie and television special effects, hosted by Roy Scheider and Jonathan Brandis, featuring behind the scenes look at how the visual effects were created for popular films of the era.
results.title: Masters of Illusion: The Wizards of Special Effects

results.original_title: Diana Vreeland: The Eye Has to Travel
results.overview: This intimate and loving portrait of the legendary arbiter of fashion, art and culture illustrates the many stages of Vreeland's remarkable life. Born in Paris in 1903, she was to become New York's "Empress of Fashion" and a celebrated Vogue editor.
results.title: Diana Vreeland: The Eye Has to Travel

results.original_title: Taint of Greatness: The Journey of Beavis and Butt-Head
results.overview: A documentary about the creation of Beavis and Butt-Head.
results.title: Taint of Greatness: The Journey of Beavis and Butt-Head

results.original_title: Al sur de la inocencia
results.overview: After returning to the Dominican Republic, Vera finds out that her stepbrother, Andres, has dropped out of his MBA and that her stepfather has not been seen around the house for a few days. She also meets Santiago, a charming photographer, who quickly invites her to the south of the country: a region she longs to see. Andres stumbles upon a devastating reality about his father that forces him to flee along with Vera and Santiago to the south to avoid facing the truth.
results.title: Al sur de la inocencia

results.original_title: Det jeg ønsker du hadde sagt til meg, som du aldri kommer til å si
results.overview: A meeting between a young woman and her dad at a hotel in Oslo.
results.title: The Things I Wish You Had Told Me, But Never Will

results.original_title: La captura de Chucho el Roto
results.overview: "Gentleman bandit" and his gang execute a series of elaborate heists. #3 of 4 in a series.
results.title: La captura de Chucho el Roto

results.original_title: Liebesgrüße aus der Lederhose 5. Teil: Die Bruchpiloten vom Königssee
results.overview: Sepp and Willy inherit a remote mountain farm. When they find an old biplane in the barn, they come up with the idea of opening a flying school, but meet with resistance from the mayor.
results.title: Liebesgrüße aus der Lederhose 5. Teil: Die Bruchpiloten vom Königssee

results.original_title: Two Sevens Clash: Dread Meets Punk Rockers
results.overview: Documentary about reggae music and culture in London in 1977. Filmed in Super 8 camera by Don Letts. With participation of Richard Branson, Neneh Cherry, Paul Cook, Sly Dunbar, Paul Weller, John Lydon, Joe Strummer, Siouxsie Sioux, Lee ‘Scratch’ Perry and others. Released in 2017.
results.title: Two Sevens Clash: Dread Meets Punk Rockers

results.original_title: ¿Por qué pecamos a los 40?
results.overview: Alejandro Quesada, an eminent doctor successful with women, drives his old friends Federico and Enrique to change their attitude towards life. The death of a common friend, Luis, reaffirmed in the attempt to enjoy their existence and seek the association of younger women than their wives.
results.title: ¿Por qué pecamos a los 40?

results.original_title: Anniversary
results.overview: When Ellen and Paul’s son introduces his new girlfriend one lovely afternoon at their 25th anniversary party, no one suspects that it is the beginning of the end for this happy family. The new girlfriend is Liz, Ellen’s former student, who left the university, some years before, after Ellen called her out in class for her radical ideology.
results.title: Anniversary

results.original_title: Mil millones para una rubia
results.overview: A seductive blonde makes a theft of jewelry unprecedented in the history of crime, nothing less than a billion.
results.title: One Billion for a Blonde

results.original_title: Uncle Buck
results.overview: Buck Russell, a lovable but slovenly bachelor, suddenly becomes the temporary caretaker of his nephew and nieces after a family emergency. His freewheeling attitude soon causes tension with his older niece Tia, loyal girlfriend Chanice and just about everyone else who crosses his path.
results.title: Uncle Buck

results.original_title: Don't Say No Until I Finish Talking: The Story of Richard D. Zanuck
results.overview: A look at the life and work of legendary film producer Richard D. Zanuck.
results.title: Don't Say No Until I Finish Talking: The Story of Richard D. Zanuck

results.original_title: La verdad sobre el caso Savolta
results.overview: Barcelona between 1917 and 1923. Is the era of gangsterism, during which gunmen clash between anarchists and thugs paid by The Patronal showed a shocking number of deaths. The confrontation between anarchists and workers of the factory owners Savolta arms worsens when Savolta family decides to end the rebellion hiring murderers hired and plotting to hide their illegal transactions with Germany. Adapted from the novel by Eduardo Mendoza.
results.title: The Truth on the Savolta Affair

results.original_title: Odilo Fabian or (the Possibility of Impossible Dreams)
results.overview: On the outskirts of a town called Doubt, Odilo Fabian uses wishes and nature to grow himself a real chance at love.
results.title: Odilo Fabian or (the Possibility of Impossible Dreams)

results.original_title: Die Jägerin - Nach eigenem Gesetz
results.overview: The committed public prosecutor Judith Schrader is once again fighting against organized crime in Berlin. She is not only investigating two opposing rocker clans, but also against vigilante justice in the ranks of the police. During an operation in the rocker environment, a young woman is kidnapped as a hostage and murdered, which is why public prosecutor Judith Schrader requests a prison sentence for the two defendants in court.
results.title: Die Jägerin - Nach eigenem Gesetz

results.original_title: A Thin Line Between Love and Hate
results.overview: Nightclub manager Darnell Wright is a perpetual playboy who is almost as devoted to his job as he is to the pursuit of beautiful women. After he sets his sights on the ultra-classy Brandi Web, he launches an all-out assault to win her heart. Ultimately, charm, lust and passion prevail, but Darnell learns the hard way that when you play, you pay. Brandi is much harder to get rid of than she was to get--especially when she realizes that she has a rival vying for Darnell's affection. When he finally decides to call it quits, Brandi becomes an obsessed femme fatale stalking the new love of her life.
results.title: A Thin Line Between Love and Hate

results.original_title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
results.overview: Animal pals Alex, Marty, Melman, and Gloria are still trying to make it back to New York's Central Park Zoo. They are forced to take a detour to Europe to find the penguins and chimps who broke the bank at a Monte Carlo casino. When French animal-control officer Capitaine Chantel DuBois picks up their scent, Alex and company are forced to hide out in a traveling circus.
results.title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted

results.original_title: Creed
results.overview: The former World Heavyweight Champion Rocky Balboa serves as a trainer and mentor to Adonis Johnson, the son of his late friend and former rival Apollo Creed.
results.title: Creed

results.original_title: I ragazzi di Torino sognano Tokyo e vanno a Berlino
results.overview: Vincenzo and Luciano, after having witnessed the successful performance of a Japanese ensemble in Rome, return to Turin with the firm intention of putting on a concert, baptizing it "Electronic Granita" and producing themselves as dancers.  It’s the story of two friends, Vincenzo and Luciano, who want to set up a show centred around Japanese allures. But Cristina's aggressive love threatens to divide them. Luckily, they run away together to Berlin, escaping the strength of femininity and re-establishing, at least ideologically, a virile and homosexual domination.
results.title: I ragazzi di Torino sognano Tokyo e vanno a Berlino

results.original_title: Reservoir Dogs
results.overview: A botched robbery indicates a police informant, and the pressure mounts in the aftermath at a warehouse. Crime begets violence as the survivors -- veteran Mr. White, newcomer Mr. Orange, psychopathic parolee Mr. Blonde, bickering weasel Mr. Pink and Nice Guy Eddie -- unravel.
results.title: Reservoir Dogs

results.original_title: Torrente, el brazo tonto de la ley
results.overview: A former policeman enlists his nerdy friend to help bust drug traffickers moving heroin through a Chinese restaurant.
results.title: Torrente, the Dumb Arm of the Law

results.original_title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates: Battle for the Book
results.overview: Set sail for an epic saga stretching from London, all the way to Never Land and back. Before you can say, "Pixie dust, away!" -- Wendy, John and Michael Darling join JAKE AND THE NEVER LAND PIRATES for a soaring, swashbuckling, full-length adventure. Captain Hook -- fed up with being portrayed as a bumbling fool in Wendy's magical storybook -- flies the Jolly Roger to London and snatches the book away, so Peter Pan calls on Jake and his crew to help save the day. But there's no time to lose, because the longer Hook has the book, the faster everyone's memories of Pan and Never Land will fade away... forever! BATTLE FOR THE BOOK is an unforgettable celebration of teamwork and the magical power of storytelling.
results.title: Jake and the Never Land Pirates: Battle for the Book

results.overview: The Edo Murders: Sasachi’s Greatest Triumph | Two bodies have been found on Tsukuda Island, hacked to death with an axe. Detective Sasachi suspects a man he saw skulking around the night before, only to find that the man is Juzo, a thief once captured by his late father.

results.original_title: Amerika oder der Verschollene
results.overview: Young Karl Roßmann emigrates to the USA, meets a rich man whose money Karl initially lives off, but who soon throws him out again.

results.original_title: A través de mi ventana
results.overview: Raquel's longtime crush on her next-door neighbor turns into something more when he starts developing feelings for her, despite his family's objections.

results.original_title: Para que dure no se apure
results.overview: The bureaucrat Victor manages to acquire an apartment and, by lending it to his bosses for their affairs, earns money and promotions, though he suffers inconveniences by leaving the apartment at inconvenient hours, enduring robberies and colds. The office director also asks for the apartment to take Patricia, the elevator girl Victor loves. He is disappointed in her but discovers she attempted suicide. The director rewards him by appointing him manager, but he refuses the position, disgusted by the rampant corruption.
results.title: Para que dure no se apure

results.original_title: Into the Arms of Strangers: Stories of the Kindertransport
results.overview: In the nine months prior to World War II, 10.000 innocent children left behind their families, their homes, their childhood, and took the journey... to Britain to escape the Nazi Holocaust.
results.title: Into the Arms of Strangers: Stories of the Kindertransport

results.original_title: Troubles of a Manager of a Burlesque Show
results.overview: Facing a stationary camera, sitting at a desk, a man works busily. Posters of burlesque queens are on the wall behind him. A single woman, followed later by later two others, comes into the office seeking a job. The manager hands each a box with a costume in it and points to dressing rooms. Each of the women has a different reaction when she discovers the nature of her costume, and the busy manager has a distinct response to each of the women as well.
results.title: Troubles of a Manager of a Burlesque Show

results.original_title: Die verlorene Ehre der Katharina Blum
results.overview: After a chance encounter with a wanted man, a woman is harassed by the police and press until she takes violent action.
results.title: The Lost Honor of Katharina Blum

results.original_title: 忍風戦隊ハリケンジャー 10 YEARS AFTER
results.overview: A space ninja group initiate mysterious bombings around the world - from Paris, to Egypt, China, and many others. Nanami and Kouta followed the series of incidents, but were surprised to see a familiar figure appearing before them! It was mentioned that a mistake was made from a battle 10 years ago. This is a V-Cinema, direct to video, movie to commemorate the 10th anniversary of Ninpu Sentai Hurricaneger.
results.title: Ninpuu Sentai Hurricaneger: 10 YEARS AFTER

results.original_title: Un garçon, une fille. Le 17ème ciel
results.overview: The brave and moody François, a window washer by trade, has fallen head over heels in love with a delicious woman he spotted while working on the 17th floor of a building. From that moment on, all his dreams turn to the woman he doesn't dare approach. Fortunately, he finally meets her in Perros-Guirec, after following her on a train journey. She calls herself a chatelaine; he introduces himself as a writer. Will love triumph over these pious lies?
results.title: Seventeenth Heaven

results.original_title: Sniper: G.R.I.T. - Global Response & Intelligence Team
results.overview: When an international terrorist cult threatens global political stability and kidnaps a fellow agent, Ace Sniper Brandon Beckett and the newly-formed Global Response & Intelligence Team – or G.R.I.T. – led by Colonel Stone must travel across the world to Malta, infiltrate the cult, and take out its leader to free Lady Death and stop the global threat.
results.title: Sniper: G.R.I.T. - Global Response & Intelligence Team

results.original_title: Ray Alexander: A Menu for Murder
results.overview: Ray investigates the murder of a judge.
results.title: Ray Alexander: A Menu for Murder

results.original_title: Goodnight Sweet Wife: A Murder in Boston
results.overview: Dramatic recounting of the true story of Bostonians Charles and Carol Stuart and the events before and after October 23, 1989, the night of the latter's murder, supposedly, as the husband related to police, by a young black man out to rob them while they were spending a night on the town.
results.title: Goodnight Sweet Wife: A Murder in Boston

results.original_title: Même les anges ont le coeur brûlé
results.title: Même les anges ont le coeur brûlé

results.original_title: L'uomo che guarda
results.overview: At a college in Rome, a professor, nicknamed "Dodo" is in a deep depression. His stunningly beautiful wife has just left him for another man. Dodo wants her back very badly and has erotic daydreams about her. A beautiful young student in his class asks him for a ride home and seduces the lucky man, but still he wonders about his wife and her lover.
results.title: The Voyeur

results.original_title: Why Not Choose Love: A Mary Pickford Manifesto
results.overview: Biopic following the life of the first "America's Sweetheart" Mary Pickford, one of the most popular actresses of silent era in the 1910s and 1920s.
results.title: Why Not Choose Love: A Mary Pickford Manifesto

results.original_title: Atomic: Living in Dread and Promise
results.overview: Using only archive film and a new musical score by the band Mogwai, Mark Cousins presents an impressionistic kaleidoscope of our nuclear times – protest marches, Cold War sabre-rattling, Chernobyl and Fukishima – but also the sublime beauty of the atomic world, and how x-rays and MRI scans have improved human lives. The nuclear age has been a nightmare, but dreamlike too.
results.title: Atomic: Living in Dread and Promise

results.original_title: ...e vennero in quattro per uccidere Sartana!
results.overview: Seven masked bandits, whose chief calls himself "Mormon", kidnap young Susy, cousin of the mayor of Clayton City, Frank Clonny. Frank accepts the $15,000 ransom requested by the bandits and thinks of a plan which will permit him, with the help of Benson, the sheriff, to free his cousin, recover the money and capture the outlaws. The plan, though, is destined to fail, because one of the mayor's men, Donovan, allows the bandits to escape the trap. Benson then decides to call in Sartana, who the Mormon immediately tries to eliminate with the help of four killers: Buffalo, who kills with a bullwhip; Martinez, an expert knife thrower; Sullivan, a giant of incredible strength and Silky, a sly and fast gunslinger.
results.title: Four Came to Kill Sartana

results.original_title: Riusciranno i nostri eroi a ritrovare l'amico misteriosamente scomparso in Africa?
results.overview: A rich businessman is fed up with work, family, society, and goes with his accountant to Africa, in search of his brother-in-law who had vanished there in mysterious circumstances. They will find him alright - as a tribal chief, surrounded with lots of topless, shapely wives. They are going to return to civilisation, but will their friend come with them?
results.title: Will Our Heroes Be Able to Find Their Friend Who Has Mysteriously Disappeared in Africa?

results.original_title: La inútil muerte de mi socio Manolo
results.overview: Cheo visits his friend, Manolo, who he hasn't seen for many years. They drink to celebrate their reunion and fondly recall the times they spent together in years past. As they reminisce, the two friends confront the revolution, evaluate their lives, and bare their souls.
results.title: The Useless Death of My Pal, Manolo

results.original_title: 映画 聲の形
results.overview: Shouya Ishida starts bullying the new girl in class, Shouko Nishimiya, because she is deaf. But as the teasing continues, the rest of the class starts to turn on Shouya for his lack of compassion. When they leave elementary school, Shouko and Shouya do not speak to each other again... until an older, wiser Shouya, tormented by his past behaviour, decides he must see Shouko once more. He wants to atone for his sins, but is it already too late...?
results.title: A Silent Voice: The Movie

results.original_title: No One Will Save You
results.overview: A lonely woman battles extraterrestrials who threaten her future while forcing her to face her past.
results.title: No One Will Save You

results.original_title: Crazy, Stupid, Love.
results.overview: Cal Weaver is living the American dream. He has a good job, a beautiful house, great children and a beautiful wife, named Emily. Cal's seemingly perfect life unravels, however, when he learns that Emily has been unfaithful and wants a divorce. Over 40 and suddenly single, Cal is adrift in the fickle world of dating. Enter, Jacob Palmer, a self-styled player who takes Cal under his wing and teaches him how to be a hit with the ladies.
results.title: Crazy, Stupid, Love.

results.original_title: Minions: The Rise of Gru
results.overview: A fanboy of a supervillain supergroup known as the Vicious 6, Gru hatches a plan to become evil enough to join them, with the backup of his followers, the Minions.
results.title: Minions: The Rise of Gru

results.original_title: El lago de las vírgenes
results.overview: A man discovers an island covered in treasure. But when he attempts to fully explore island and collect the treasure, he ends up discovering some mysterious nymphs who seduce him.
results.title: El lago de las vírgenes

results.original_title: PyeongChang 2018 Olympic Opening Ceremony: Peace in Motion
results.title: PyeongChang 2018 Olympic Opening Ceremony: Peace in Motion

results.original_title: Callaghan: un rendez-vous dans les ténèbres
results.title: Callaghan: un rendez-vous dans les ténèbres

results.original_title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
results.overview: A representative of an alien race that went through drastic evolution to survive its own climate change, Klaatu comes to Earth to assess whether humanity can prevent the environmental damage they have inflicted on their own planet. When barred from speaking to the United Nations, he decides humankind shall be exterminated so the planet can survive.
results.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still

results.original_title: Una nuvola di polvere… un grido di morte… arriva Sartana
results.overview: Wily roving gunslinger Sartana arrives in a small town and tries to find a hidden fortune of half a million dollars in gold and two million dollars in counterfeit money. Naturally, a bunch of other treacherous folks who include conniving widow Senora Manassas, shrewd fellow gunslinger Grand Full, and the vicious and unhinged General Monk are also looking to get their greedy hands on said fortune.
results.title: Light the Fuse… Sartana Is Coming

results.original_title: How Not to Propose
results.overview: Travis plans the perfect romantic getaway to propose to longtime love Lena. As the carefully orchestrated weekend comically fails to go as planned, Travis may not get the answer he’s looking for.
results.title: How Not to Propose

results.original_title: The Odd Angry Shot
results.overview: A group of Australian SAS regiment soldiers are deployed to Vietnam around 1967/8 and encounter the realities of war, from the numbing boredom of camp life and long range patrols, raids and ambushes where nothing happens, to the the terror of enduring mortar barrages from an unseen enemy. Men die and are crippled in combat by firefights and booby traps, soldiers kill and capture the enemy, gather intelligence and retake ground only to cede it again whilst battling against the bureaucracy and obstinacy of the conventional military hierarchy. In the end they return to civilization, forever changed by their experiences but glad to return to the life they once knew.
results.title: The Odd Angry Shot

results.original_title: La mujer de a seis litros
results.overview: Anthology movie, three cynical "contes cruels."
results.title: La mujer de a seis litros

results.original_title: Lost and Found: Billkin & PP Krit First Worldwide Digital Performance
results.overview: Actors/singers Billkin & PP Krit, who have been gaining momentum, not only in Thailand but all over the world, present their first worldwide digital performance designed for Moment House Japan.
results.title: Lost and Found: Billkin & PP Krit First Worldwide Digital Performance

results.original_title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
results.overview: Centuries-old vampire Count Dracula travels to Victorian London, where he becomes obsessed with Mina Murray—the fiancée of his solicitor, Jonathan Harker—believing her to be the reincarnation of his long-lost love.
results.title: Bram Stoker's Dracula

results.original_title: Back in Action
results.overview: Fifteen years after vanishing from the CIA to start a family, elite spies Matt and Emily jump back into the world of espionage when their cover is blown.
results.title: Back in Action

results.original_title: La Vérité si je mens !
results.overview: Jobless loner Eddie Vuibert gets a lucky break when a rich Jewish entrepreneur mistakes him for a Jew and gives him a sweet job in the Parisian fashion district.
results.title: Would I Lie to You?

results.original_title: V6 ASIA TOUR 2010 in JAPAN READY?
results.overview: V6 ASIA TOUR 2010 in JAPAN READY?
results.title: V6 ASIA TOUR 2010 in JAPAN READY?

results.original_title: Rocco e i suoi fratelli
results.overview: When a impoverished widow’s family moves to the big city, two of her five sons become romantic rivals with deadly results.
results.title: Rocco and His Brothers

results.original_title: The Parent Trap
results.overview: Hallie Parker and Annie James are identical twins who were separated at a young age due to their parents' divorce. Unbeknownst to their parents, the girls are sent to the same summer camp, where they meet, discover the truth about their relationship, and come up with a plan to switch places in an effort to reunite their mother and father.
results.title: The Parent Trap

results.original_title: BET Presents Love & Happiness: An Obama Celebration
results.overview: A White House concert and celebration in honor of the 8-year Presidency of Barack Obama and the First Lady Michelle Obama.
results.title: BET Presents Love & Happiness: An Obama Celebration

results.original_title: La vendetta è un piatto che si serve freddo
results.overview: After witnessing the brutal murder of his entire family by Native Americans as a child, Jeremiah Bridger becomes a merciless Indian-killer and scalp hunter. After saving the life of a beautiful Native American girl named Tune, however, the lone and silent gunman slowly reconsiders his hatred. He starts to doubt his former persuasion, that it was really Indians, who killed his family, and soon has to find out that a greedy and unscrupulous landowner usually blames Native Americans for his own crimes.
results.title: Vengeance Is a Dish Served Cold

results.original_title: Lo Mejor del Chavo del 8, Vol. 1
results.overview: A cap, a barrel, and an eight year old boy surrounded by his friends from the neighborhood have been the essential elements for the entertainment for millions of views around the world. Created by comic actor Roberto Gomez Bolanos, El Chavo del 8 made its mark on Mexican Television and has left us with everlasting memories of entertainment for our families. Its sketch comedy format appeals to young and old alike. El Chavo del 8 still airs in syndication all over Latin America.
results.title: Best of El Chavo, Vol. 1

results.original_title: The Brotherhood of the Bell
results.overview: A successful professor has his life disrupted by a secret from his past — in his college days he became a member of a powerful secret society, and now the society has a job for him.
results.title: The Brotherhood of the Bell

results.original_title: The Night That Changed America: A Grammy Salute to the Beatles
results.overview: In celebration of the 50th anniversary of The Beatles' first appearance on The Ed Sullivan Show, this magnificent star-studded tribute salutes the Fab Four. Appearing with Paul McCartney and Ringo Starr were guest musicians Joe Walsh, Gary Clark, Jr., Stevie Wonder, The Eurythmics, John Legend, Alicia Keys, Maroon 5, Dave Grohl, Katy Perry, Peter Frampton, and more.
results.title: The Night That Changed America: A Grammy Salute to the Beatles

results.original_title: Reliving Our Fast Times at Ridgemont High
results.overview: This documentary is featured on the Collector's Edition, High School Reunion Edition, and Awesome Special Edition DVDs for 'Fast Times at Ridgemont High'.
results.title: Reliving Our Fast Times at Ridgemont High

results.original_title: La Prière aux étoiles (80min cut)
results.title: La Prière aux étoiles (80min cut)

results.original_title: Heaven in Hell
results.overview: Olga and Maks are 15 years away. She is a successful woman with an established position, the mother of an adult daughter, he is a handsome young man who enjoys his life in a handful and lives only in the moment. It might seem that these two different worlds will never meet, and yet fate put them in the way.
results.title: Heaven in Hell

results.original_title: Breaking the Silence: The Making of Hannibal
results.overview: Several aspects of Ridley Scott's masterpiece Hannibal (2001) are examined through interviews with the cast and crew, and behind the scenes footage. We are even taken to two premieres and get to see some of the audience's reactions while they're watching the film.
results.title: Breaking the Silence: The Making of Hannibal

results.original_title: Sechse kommen durch die ganze Welt
results.overview: Gaspard is menestrel at the court of King Wilbur. He and Princess Ella love each other and want to get married and discover the world together. But Ella's father King Wilbur does not accept it. He traps Gaspard in a dungeon and makes his daughter believe that he has gone around the world.  In prison, Gaspard meets Lucas "The Strong", who is stronger than 10 men, and Flora "The Witch", who orders plants. Thanks to Lucas, they escape from prison, and on their way they meet Marcus "The Runner", who carries an anvil in his bag to prevent himself from running faster than the wind; Benjamin "The Marksman", who has a view that carries further than that of an eagle; and Lisa "The Icy", who has a breath of ice.
results.title: Sechse kommen durch die ganze Welt

results.original_title: Without Warning: Terror in the Towers
results.overview: Massive rescue efforts are mobilized to save occupants of New York City's World Trade Center after a terrorist bombing. Based on the events surrounding the bombing of the World Trade Center towers in February 1993.
results.title: Without Warning: Terror in the Towers

results.original_title: Gourmet Detective: A Healthy Place to Die
results.overview: When Henry is invited as a guest speaker at a luxury resort spa, he quickly finds himself at the center of another murder. With Maggie at his side, our favorite duo must not only find the killer but be careful they don't become his latest victim.
results.title: Gourmet Detective: A Healthy Place to Die

results.original_title: Agence Matrimoniale
results.overview: Noël is a bachelor who inherits a matrimonial agency.  After contemplating selling it, he chooses to manage it.
results.title: Matrimonial Agency

results.original_title: Den Tüchtigen gehört die Welt
results.overview: This film combines two very different styles: an atmospheric psycho thriller about the ice-cold hired gun (masterfully played by Frank Gorschin), and the bizarre satire of the Austrian TV serial "Kottan ermittelt".
results.title: The Uppercrust

results.original_title: ゴジラ-1.0
results.overview: In postwar Japan, Godzilla brings new devastation to an already scorched landscape. With no military intervention or government help in sight, the survivors must join together in the face of despair and fight back against an unrelenting horror.
results.title: Godzilla Minus One

results.original_title: Una banda di matti in vacanza premio
results.title: Una banda di matti in vacanza premio

results.original_title: Bar-Cel-Ona (Pasaje a Ibiza)
results.overview: This is the sotry about the young Quim and Ona, and what happens one day. the 23 th of June in San Juan´s Night
results.title: Bar-Cel-Ona (Pasaje a Ibiza)

results.original_title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves
results.overview: A charming thief and a band of unlikely adventurers undertake an epic heist to retrieve a lost relic, but things go dangerously awry when they run afoul of the wrong people.
results.title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves

results.original_title: Men in Black 3
results.overview: Agents J and K are back...in time. J has seen some inexplicable things in his 15 years with the Men in Black, but nothing, not even aliens, perplexes him as much as his wry, reticent partner. But when K's life and the fate of the planet are put at stake, Agent J will have to travel back in time to put things right. J discovers that there are secrets to the universe that K never told him - secrets that will reveal themselves as he teams up with the young Agent K to save his partner, the agency, and the future of humankind.
results.title: Men in Black 3

results.original_title: Me, Myself & Irene
results.overview: Rhode Island State Trooper Charlie Baileygates has a multiple personality disorder. One personality is crazy and aggressive, while the other is more friendly and laid back. Both of these personalities fall in love with the same woman named Irene after Charlie loses his medication.
results.title: Me, Myself & Irene

results.original_title: J'veux pas que tu t'en ailles
results.overview: Paul may be a successful psychoanalyst but he fails to realize that his own marriage to Carla is failing. One of his patients, Raphaël, confides in him that he is in love with a married woman. In the course of the discussion, Paul understands that the woman in question is his own wife, Carla.  Rather than end the consultation, Paul decides to manipulate his patient in an attempt to win back his wife. But Raphaël is not as stupid as he looks...
results.title: Please Don't Go

results.original_title: The Black Waters of Echo's Pond
results.overview: Nine friends take a holiday at a Victorian home on a private island and uncover a game that when played brings out the worst in each of them. Jealously, greed, hatred, lust, all of the things they keep buried deep inside themselves rise to the surface and come to a boil.
results.title: The Black Waters of Echo's Pond

results.original_title: Paul Simon and Friends | The Library of Congress Gershwin Prize for Popular Song
results.overview: The Library of Congress Gershwin Prize for Popular Song will honor either a songwriter, interpreter, or singer/songwriter whose career reflects lifetime achievement in promoting the genre of song as a vehicle of artistic expression and cultural understanding. Paul Simon, one of America's most respected songwriters and musicians, was the recipient of the first annual Library of Congress Gershwin Prize for Popular Song. Named in honor of the legendary George and Ira Gershwin, the award recognizes the profound and positive effect of popular music on the world's culture.
results.title: Paul Simon and Friends | The Library of Congress Gershwin Prize for Popular Song

results.original_title: The Man Who Had Power Over Women
results.overview: A successful talent agent enjoys the good life until his wife leaves him. Moving in with his friend and igniting an affair with the man's wife, he also acquires a difficult new client whose public image must be preserved at any cost.
results.title: The Man Who Had Power Over Women

results.original_title: Split
results.overview: Though Kevin has evidenced 23 personalities to his trusted psychiatrist, Dr. Fletcher, there remains one still submerged who is set to materialize and dominate all the others. Compelled to abduct three teenage girls led by the willful, observant Casey, Kevin reaches a war for survival among all of those contained within him — as well as everyone around him — as the walls between his compartments shatter apart.
results.title: Split

results.original_title: Two for the Money
results.overview: A former college athlete joins forces with a sports consultant to handicap football games for high-rolling gamblers.
results.title: Two for the Money

results.original_title: Aopção ou As Rosas da Estrada
results.overview: The Option centers on a group of rural women who cut sugar cane and live in ramshackle highway neighborhoods. For many, their only escape to a potentially better life is through prostitution, often with truck drivers.
results.title: The Option

results.original_title: Arcadian
results.overview: In the near future, on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.
results.title: Arcadian

results.original_title: Wie kommen wir da wieder raus?
results.overview: Christmas – usually not the favourite holiday of the atheist Wanda, a surgeon and feminist mother of teenage Nina. And most certainly not in times of a pandemic.
results.title: How do we get out of this?

results.original_title: Amori che non sanno stare al mondo
results.overview: Claudia and Flavio were once passionately in love, but all of that is over. Now, in their fifties, they must venture anew into the world of love and dating once more but for Claudia confronting the end and accepting a new beginning isn’t so easy. Claudia is unwilling to let go and forget the life she’s built with Flavio, while Flavio, eager to move on, soon finds himself in a relationship with a much younger woman. Claudia soon reconnects with Nina, a student from her days as a professor.
results.title: Stories of Love That Cannot Belong to This World

results.original_title: Apple Music Presents: Little Mix - Live from London
results.overview: Jade, Jesy, Leigh-Anne and Perrie join Beats 1’s Julie Adenuga and some of their most dedicated fans for a thrilling live show and a revealing, empowering Q&A session. “It’s really important for us to write about things we’re passionate about,” Jade tells their audience. The girls present acoustic renditions of their biggest hits and tear through new favourites from fifth album, LM5. Dancing along: unavoidable.
results.title: Apple Music Presents: Little Mix - Live from London

results.original_title: ドクター・デスの遺産-BLACK FILE-
results.overview: A series of suspicious death cases take place. All the victims were terminal patients. Detective Hayato Inukai (Gou Ayano) and Detective Asuka Takachiho (Keiko Kitagawa) investigate the case. Through their investigation, they learn of a person known as "Dr. Death." He performs euthanasia by request. Meanwhile, Detective Hayato Inukai’s daughter Sayaka requests the help of Dr. Death. Sayaka suffers from a severe kidney disease.
results.title: The Legacy of Dr. Death: Black File

results.original_title: J-ok'el
results.overview: An unworldly and closed-minded American travels to a small village in exotic Chiapas, Mexico; at the behest of his estranged mother when his half-sister disappears during a local epidemic of kidnappings attributed to the legendary J-ok'el, the weeping woman, who drowned her own babies, centuries ago and whose spirit has returned to claim more children as her own.
results.title: Curse of the Weeping Woman: J-ok'el

results.original_title: Ma Rainey's Black Bottom: A Legacy Brought to Screen
results.overview: Viola Davis, Denzel Washington, George C. Wolfe and more share the heart, soul and history that brought August Wilson's timeless play to the screen.
results.title: Ma Rainey's Black Bottom: A Legacy Brought to Screen

results.original_title: Cada um Dá o Que Tem
results.overview: Comedy anthology in three segments, each one involving beautiful and uninhibited women.
results.title: Cada um Dá o Que Tem

results.original_title: J-ok'el
results.overview: An unworldly and closed-minded American travels to a small village in exotic Chiapas, Mexico; at the behest of his estranged mother when his half-sister disappears during a local epidemic of kidnappings attributed to the legendary J-ok'el, the weeping woman, who drowned her own babies, centuries ago and whose spirit has returned to claim more children as her own.
results.title: Curse of the Weeping Woman: J-ok'el

results.original_title: Ma Rainey's Black Bottom: A Legacy Brought to Screen
results.overview: Viola Davis, Denzel Washington, George C. Wolfe and more share the heart, soul and history that brought August Wilson's timeless play to the screen.
results.title: Ma Rainey's Black Bottom: A Legacy Brought to Screen

results.original_title: Cada um Dá o Que Tem
results.overview: Comedy anthology in three segments, each one involving beautiful and uninhibited women.
results.title: Cada um Dá o Que Tem

results.original_title: Les Durs à cuire (Comment supprimer son prochain sans perdre l'appétit)
results.overview: A playwright has to murder if he does not want to be murdered.
results.title: Hard Boiled Ones

results.original_title: Terrorist on Trial: The United States vs. Salim Ajami
results.overview: There is no question that the Arab terrorist portrayed by Robert Davi is guilty of killing five US citizens in Barcelona. Even his lawyers have zero respect for the rabidly sociopathic Davi. But Jewish defence attorney Ron Leibman is obsessed with the concept of Due Process, and has vowed that Davi will receive a scrupulously fair trial when the terrorist is extradited to America. The defence mounted by Leibman confounds and aggravates government prosecutor Sam Waterston--but he, like Leibman, remains a man of judiciary integrity.
results.title: Terrorist on Trial: The United States vs. Salim Ajami

results.original_title: The Mages of Rage and the Desecration of the House of Mimicry
results.title: The Mages of Rage and the Desecration of the House of Mimicry

results.original_title: Bienvenue chez les Ch'tis
results.overview: Although living a comfortable life in Salon-de-Provence, a charming town in the South of France, Julie has been feeling depressed for a while. To please her, Philippe Abrams, a post office administrator, her husband, tries to obtain a transfer to a seaside town, on the French Riviera, at any cost. The trouble is that he is caught red-handed while trying to scam an inspector. Philippe is immediately banished to the distant unheard of town of Bergues, in the Far North of France...
results.title: Welcome to the Sticks

results.original_title: Seminò morte... lo chiamavano il castigo di Dio!
results.overview: A man, after being accused of a robbery and escaping from jail with a bandit leader, seeks revenge for his brother and his family.
results.title: Death Is Sweet From the Soldier Of God

results.original_title: The Matrix Revolutions
results.overview: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.
results.title: The Matrix Revolutions

results.original_title: The People's Command Performance: '77
results.overview: A celebrity lineup selected by a “specially conducted nationwide survey” entertains.
results.title: The People's Command Performance: '77

results.original_title: அமரன்
results.overview: A heroic true story of Major Mukund Varadarajan, an Indian Army officer who displayed extraordinary bravery during a counterterrorism mission in Kashmir’s Shopian district. The film captures his courage in protecting his nation and the devotion of his wife Indhu Rebecaa Varghese.
results.title: Amaran

results.original_title: Money, Power, Respect: Hip Hop Billion Dollar Industry
results.overview: Who of the icons Jay-Z, Diddy, 50 Cent and Dr. Dre becomes the first dollar billionaire?
results.title: Money, Power, Respect: Hip Hop Billion Dollar Industry

results.original_title: La chica más rara del mundo
results.overview: A 15-year-old imaginative yet lonely girl assures that her drawings come to life.
results.title: La chica más rara del mundo

results.original_title: On the Red Carpet Presents: The Banshees of Inisherin
results.overview: On The Red Carpet presents an in-depth look at the making of The Banshees of Inisherin.
results.title: On the Red Carpet Presents: The Banshees of Inisherin

results.original_title: Palmer
results.overview: After 12 years in prison, former high school football star Eddie Palmer returns home to put his life back together—and forms an unlikely bond with Sam, an outcast boy from a troubled home. But Eddie's past threatens to ruin his new life and family.
results.title: Palmer

results.original_title: Célestine... bonne à tout faire
results.overview: The story opens with Celestine eluding arrest with a friend as the police raid a brothel. While hiding out in the hayloft of the Count de la Braquette's estate, she meets the hayseed handyman Sébastien and the butler Malou, who reward her favors with the offer of employment. In a manner recalling Terence Stamp's effect on the household in TEOREMA, Celestine's open and relaxed attitude toward sexuality has a transformative effect on the isolated, moribund inhabitants of the mansion, imbuing them with gift of renewed life for the men and women alike, that remains even after a third act twist that forces her to betray them.
results.title: Celestine

results.original_title: The Art of Self-Defense
results.overview: Casey is attacked at random on the street and enlists in a local dojo led by a charismatic and mysterious Sensei in an effort to learn how to defend himself. What he uncovers is a sinister world of fraternity, violence and hypermasculinity and a woman fighting for her place in it.
results.title: The Art of Self-Defense

results.original_title: The Unlikely Pilgrimage of Harold Fry
results.overview: Harold Fry is an unremarkable man who has made mistakes with all the important things: being a husband, a father and a friend. And now, well into his 60s, he is content to fade quietly into the background of life. Until, one day – Harold learns his old friend Queenie is dying. Harold leaves home, walking to his post office to send her a letter. And out of the blue, Harold decides to keep walking, all the way to her hospice, 450 miles away.
results.title: The Unlikely Pilgrimage of Harold Fry

results.original_title: Un vampiro para dos
results.overview: A Spanish couple emigrates to Germany looking for employment, in a desperate attempt to reconcile their marriage. The only work they can find, however, is in a castle inhabited by a strange baron, who is actually a vampire.
results.title: Un vampiro para dos

results.original_title: Sisi... und ich erzähle euch die Wahrheit
results.overview: September 11, 1898: The imperial family’s personal physician, Dr. Herman Widerhofer, is deeply shocked by the news that an anarchist has assassinated Empress Elisabeth in Geneva. He then shuts himself up in his private rooms and recalls the empress’ fateful life. We learn the truth about Elisabeth, as the doctor knew more about her than anyone else.
results.title: Sisi... und ich erzähle euch die Wahrheit

results.original_title: El año que trafiqué con mujeres
results.title: El año que trafiqué con mujeres

results.original_title: How to Deter a Robber
results.overview: In a desolate town in Northern Wisconsin, a stubborn young woman and her naïve boyfriend face off against a pair of amateur burglars.
results.title: How to Deter a Robber

results.original_title: The Tangerine Bear: Home in Time for Christmas!
results.overview: When Tangie, a teddy bear goes into the Smile-erator on his head, his smile is put on upside down, causing him to end up on the bargain bin on Christmas Eve with other misfit toys, then onto Winkle's Emporium, a discount store. There, Tangie does his level best over the coming year to become a part of some family. He spends his time in Winkle's front window with Jack, a Jack-in-the-box with claustrophobia and Bird, a cuckoo clock bird with agorophobia.
results.title: The Tangerine Bear: Home in Time for Christmas!

results.original_title: LEGO DREAMZzz Z-Blob Rescue Rush 4D
results.overview: Join Mateo and Izzie on an exclusive 4D adventure as they learn to use the power of imagination to journey into the dream world and create fantastic creations to protect sleeping children from being terrorized by the evil Nightmare King who is bent on conquering the dream world and invading the waking world.
results.title: LEGO DREAMZzz Z-Blob Rescue Rush 4D

results.original_title: La pelota vasca: la piel contra la piedra
results.overview: An attempt to create a bridge between the different political positions that coexist, sometimes violently, in the Basque Country, in northern Spain.
results.title: The Basque Ball: Skin Against Stone

results.original_title: Is this the Age of the Creative Machine?
results.overview: Tricking Midjourney to produce animation. Director Alex Proyas uses AI with controlled human guidance or "curation"... in an attempt to find a place for the human in machine creation.
results.title: Is this the Age of the Creative Machine?

results.original_title: La Nozze di Figaro
results.overview: Charming, light-hearted and fizzing with subversive wit, Neil Armfield's sparkling production of the marriage of Figaro captures Mozart's most popular Opera.  In this classic performance, recorded live at the Sydney Opera House, Patrick Summers conducts a energetic fresh-voiced cast, headed up by baritone Teddy Tahu Rhodes and Taryn Fiebig who make  a vivacious, appealing pairing as Figaro and Susanna, while Peter Coleman-Wright triumps as the lascivious Count Almaviva.
results.title: The Marriage of Figaro

results.original_title: Monster by Moonlight! The Immortal Saga of 'The Wolf Man'
results.overview: Starting with "The Wolf Man" (in 1941), Universal Studios made five movies featuring The Wolf Man, a character portrayed by Lon Chaney, Jr. Monster by Moonlight! explores these movies. Rick Baker explains how the make-up was done on Chaney's character. Screenwriter Curtis Siodmak took very little from earlier werewolf legends, providing his own story for some of the films. This documentary displays clips from several other movies, including "Abbott & Costello Meet Frankenstein" (1948) and "House of Dracula" (1945).
results.title: Monster by Moonlight! The Immortal Saga of 'The Wolf Man'

results.original_title: Eden
results.overview: A group of disillusioned outsiders abandon modern society in search of a new beginning. Settling on a remote, uninhabited island, their utopian dream quickly unravels as they discover that the greatest threat isn’t the brutal climate or deadly wildlife, but each other.
results.title: Eden

results.original_title: De Sade 70
results.overview: A young woman is lured to an island paradise, where she is drawn into a dark world of pleasure, pain, and murder under the control of a sinister figure.
results.title: Eugenie

results.original_title: Curious Caterer: Dying for Chocolate
results.overview: Goldy is a spirited single mom who’s thrust into the role of town sleuth to help solve a friend’s mysterious death. With the clock ticking to find the culprit, Goldy strikes up an unlikely partnership with Detective Tom Schultz, who leans into Goldy’s local knowledge. As their relationship shows signs of becoming something more, the suspect list rises. Will Goldy narrow in on the killer before the killer narrows in on her?
results.title: Curious Caterer: Dying for Chocolate

results.original_title: Backstage With Disney on Broadway: Celebrating 20 Years
results.overview: For the first time, viewers have unprecedented access to the fast pace and high stakes world of Broadway. Cameras are backstage during a performance of "Aladdin," and the cast of the North American tour of "Newsies" takes viewers on the road.
results.title: Backstage With Disney on Broadway: Celebrating 20 Years

results.original_title: Roy Chubby Brown: Chubby Goes Down Under And Other Sticky Regions
results.overview: The helmet's off! Get the beers in and lie back and think of England as Britain's finest fat b***ard takes his sell out stand-up tour across Australia and Hong Kong.  Chubby Goes Down Under features over an hour of outrageous stand-up martial never seen before on DVD, as well as behind the scenes footage of Chubby playing around in the bush.  Filmed in front of packed audiences who know that no one comes near our own Chubby Brown for obscene comedy, watch the man at his best - proving that he's the funniest, filthiest comedian in the world.
results.title: Roy Chubby Brown: Chubby Goes Down Under And Other Sticky Regions

results.original_title: Inside The Fountain: Death and Rebirth
results.overview: A behind-the-scenes documentary about the making of Darren Aronofsky's ‘The Fountain’.
results.title: Inside The Fountain: Death and Rebirth

results.original_title: The Hunt for Eagle One: Crash Point
results.overview: The Strike Force team is back in this action-packed sequel to "The Hunt For Eagle One"! Terrorists have stolen a Ground Control Encoder...
results.title: The Hunt for Eagle One: Crash Point

results.original_title: Hidden Hollywood: Treasures from the 20th Century Fox Film Vaults
results.overview: Documentary featuring more than one dozen musical outtakes from classic 20th Century-Fox films.
results.title: Hidden Hollywood: Treasures from the 20th Century Fox Film Vaults

results.original_title: Toi non plus tu n'as rien vu
results.overview: Who has never heard of pregnancy denial? This condition, often caused by miscellaneous circumstances, escapes our understanding and even science. How can the mind of a pregnant woman hide a child growing in her body?
results.title: And Yet We Were All Blind

results.original_title: La Mort du duc d'Enghien en 1804
results.overview: Directed by Albert Capellani.
results.title: The Death of the Duke of Enghien in 1804

results.original_title: 101 Reasons Not To Be A Pro Wrestler
results.overview: 101 Reasons Not to be a Pro Wrestler is by far the most talked about pro wrestling movie since Beyond the Mat. Wrestling fans always want to know what pro wrestler really think about being fired, being held down, the creative process,ribs, mixed martial arts, setting up a match, backyard wrestling, forming a union, the monopoly of the pro wrestling industry, drugs and Vince McMahon.  101 Reasons Not to be a Pro Wrestler is a 3 hour long documentary filled with the biggest names in pro wrestling today such as New Jack, Vampiro, Diamond Dallas Page, Tylene Buck, Predator from Zero-One and MMA fame,Joanie Laurer (formerly known as Chyna), Psichosis, Nozawa, Babi Slymm,Sean O'Haire,Fatu (formerly known as Rikishi), Konnan and more...  Much of what the wrestlers have to say is shocking and surprising, so get ready to hear the truth about the pro wrestling industry directly from some of the biggest names in the wrestling industry today.
results.title: 101 Reasons Not To Be A Pro Wrestler

results.original_title: Dot and the Kangaroo
results.overview: An Australian girl gets lost in the Outback, but she's befriended by a kangaroo who gives her a ride in her pouch as they search for the girl's home. Aiding the pair are musically gifted koalas, platypuses, and kookaburras in this film based on Ethel Pedley's 1899 children's book, with animated humans and animals superimposed upon a live-action background.
results.title: Dot and the Kangaroo

results.original_title: CODA
results.overview: As a CODA (Child of Deaf Adults), Ruby is the only hearing person in her deaf family. When the family's fishing business is threatened, Ruby finds herself torn between pursuing her love of music and her fear of abandoning her parents.
results.title: CODA

results.original_title: Undisputed II: Last Man Standing
results.overview: Heavyweight Champ George "Iceman" Chambers is sent to a Russian jail on trumped-up drug charges. In order to win his freedom he must fight against the jailhouse fighting champ Uri Boyka in a battle to the death. This time he is not fighting for a title, he is fighting for his life!
results.title: Undisputed II: Last Man Standing

results.original_title: Come un gatto in tangenziale
results.overview: The story of an encounter between a bourgeois man and a poor woman, because their teenage children fall in love.
results.title: Like a Cat on a Highway

results.original_title: Années 80, les brunes comptent plus pour des prunes !
results.title: Années 80, les brunes comptent plus pour des prunes !

results.original_title: A World War II Fairy Tale: The Making of Michael Mann's 'The Keep'
results.overview: Exploring Michael Mann's 1983 film adapted from the F. Paul Wilson novel and its impact.
results.title: A World War II Fairy Tale: The Making of Michael Mann's 'The Keep'

results.original_title: El hijo de Santo en frontera sin ley
results.overview: Bad Italian guy is buying all the land in a Mexican border town, for some reason, and his henchmen are killing anybody who interferes with him. Most of the town's men have moved to USA to escape him, so four comic-relief guys and a truckload of children take down the real estate gangsters, with a little help from two wrestlers.
results.title: El hijo de Santo en frontera sin ley

results.original_title: Hard Target 2
results.overview: Forced into a deadly cat-and-mouse game, a disgraced mixed martial arts fighter is hunted through the jungles of Southeast Asia.
results.title: Hard Target 2

results.original_title: Through the Gauntlet: Inside the Walls of 'Driftwood'
results.overview: Making of documentary for the 2006 horror film 'Driftwood'.
results.title: Through the Gauntlet: Inside the Walls of 'Driftwood'

results.original_title: The Rockford Files: A Blessing in Disguise
results.overview: Angel's televangelical ministry launches a boycott against a movie entitled "Little Ezekial," and Rockford is hired to protect its star.
results.title: The Rockford Files: A Blessing in Disguise

results.original_title: Clown in a Cornfield
results.overview: Quinn and her father have just moved to the quiet town of Kettle Springs hoping for a fresh start. Instead, she discovers a fractured community that has fallen on hard times after the treasured Baypen Corn Syrup Factory burned down. As the locals bicker amongst themselves and tensions boil over, a sinister, grinning figure emerges from the cornfields to cleanse the town of its burdens, one bloody victim at a time.
results.title: Clown in a Cornfield

results.original_title: The Man Who Ruined the British Film Industry
results.overview: Documentary about John Davis, a businessman who as chairman oversaw the decline of the Rank Organisation.
results.title: The Man Who Ruined the British Film Industry

results.original_title: The Rage: Carrie 2
results.overview: A horrible massacre strikes up after an outcast teenage girl is taunted by a group of high school jocks, all of them unaware of her cutthroat telekinetic powers.
results.title: The Rage: Carrie 2

results.original_title: And the Oscar Goes To...
results.overview: The story of the gold-plated statuette that became the film industry's most coveted prize, AND THE OSCAR GOES TO... traces the history of the Academy itself, which began in 1927 when Louis B. Mayer, then head of MGM, led other prominent members of the industry in forming this professional honorary organization. Two years later the Academy began bestowing awards, which were nicknamed "Oscar," and quickly came to represent the pinnacle of cinematic achievement.
results.title: And the Oscar Goes To...

results.original_title: Hotel Transylvania: Transformania
results.overview: When Van Helsing's mysterious invention, the "Monsterfication Ray," goes haywire, Drac and his monster pals are all transformed into humans, and Johnny becomes a monster. In their new mismatched bodies, Drac and Johnny must team up and race across the globe to find a cure before it's too late, and before they drive each other crazy.
results.title: Hotel Transylvania: Transformania

results.original_title: How to Murder Your Wife
results.overview: Stanley Ford leads an idyllic bachelor life. He is a nationally syndicated cartoonist whose Bash Brannigan series provides him with a luxury townhouse and a full-time valet, Charles. When he wakes up the morning after the night before - he had attended a friend's stag party - he finds that he is married to the very beautiful woman who popped out of the cake - and who doesn't speak a word of English. Despite his initial protestations, he comes to like married life and even changes his cartoon character from a super spy to a somewhat harried husband.
results.title: How to Murder Your Wife

results.original_title: Nuremberg : les Nazis face à leurs crimes
results.overview: The documentary of the Nuremberg War Trials of 21 Nazi dignitaries held after World War II.
results.title: Nuremberg: The Nazis Facing their Crimes

results.original_title: El muerto falta a la cita
results.overview: On the night of his marriage a young man runs over a cyclist. He believes he is dead, he hides the body and a mysterious character appears.
results.title: The Corpse Breaks a Date

results.original_title: Safe Passage
results.overview: Recently estranged from her husband, and mother of seven sons, Mag Singer stands poised to pursue a whole new way of life. But when one of her children is involved in an explosion while on duty in the Middle East, Mag must rexamine everything she cherishes.
results.title: Safe Passage

results.original_title: Cómo Estar Muerto/Como Estar Muerto
results.overview: A young man decides to self-examine. He escapes from school and meets two friends who do not know his plan. They spend the whole day wandering around the center of Buenos Aires. Finally, the young man leaves his friends in a train while they sleep. The young man, alone, wanders through the city through the night. Security cameras monitor the city, but the young man disappears.
results.title: (How) To Be Dead

results.original_title: About Us
results.overview: A young couple revisit the location where they spent their honeymoon eight years earlier, in an effort to rekindle their troubled marriage. We watch as they navigate the beauty and the pain of love, culminating in a heartbreaking finale as truths are revealed.
results.title: About Us

results.original_title: El muerto falta a la cita
results.overview: On the night of his marriage a young man runs over a cyclist. He believes he is dead, he hides the body and a mysterious character appears.
results.title: The Corpse Breaks a Date

results.original_title: Safe Passage
results.overview: Recently estranged from her husband, and mother of seven sons, Mag Singer stands poised to pursue a whole new way of life. But when one of her children is involved in an explosion while on duty in the Middle East, Mag must rexamine everything she cherishes.
results.title: Safe Passage

results.original_title: Cómo Estar Muerto/Como Estar Muerto
results.overview: A young man decides to self-examine. He escapes from school and meets two friends who do not know his plan. They spend the whole day wandering around the center of Buenos Aires. Finally, the young man leaves his friends in a train while they sleep. The young man, alone, wanders through the city through the night. Security cameras monitor the city, but the young man disappears.
results.title: (How) To Be Dead

results.original_title: About Us
results.overview: A young couple revisit the location where they spent their honeymoon eight years earlier, in an effort to rekindle their troubled marriage. We watch as they navigate the beauty and the pain of love, culminating in a heartbreaking finale as truths are revealed.
results.title: About Us

results.original_title: Drug Free Kids: A Parents' Guide
results.overview: Ken Howard hosts a series of role-playing vignettes (featuring some of Hollywood's top stars) to help parents and children deal with typical family situations involving the use of illegal drugs.
results.title: Drug Free Kids: A Parents' Guide

results.original_title: 33 Days - Born to be wild
results.overview: In 1976 Niki Lauda survived one of the most famous crashes in Formula One history. Using previously unseen footage, LAUDA: THE UNTOLD STORY explains what happened on that fateful, and near fatal day at the Nurburgring, then follows Lauda’s courageous journey to recovery culminating in a miraculous comeback in Monza just weeks later. The film also investigates the impact that his crash had not just on his own life but on the sport as a whole, looking at the safety developments from the 1900s to the present day. Featuring exclusive access to Mercedes HQ and interviews with Lauda, his family, and motorsports legends past and present including Sir Jackie Stewart, David Coulthard, Mark Webber, Lewis Hamilton, Nico Rosberg, Hans-Joachim Stuck and Jochen Mass. LAUDA: THE UNTOLD STORY is a must-see for all motorsport fans.
results.title: Lauda - The Untold Story

results.original_title: Eine wen iig, dr Dällebach Kari
results.overview: Kari Tellenbach was born with a cleft palate. His mother takes care of him like a bird that has fallen out of the nest. As a young man Kari decides to become a barber and despite his handicap he wins the heart of Annemarie with his humour, charm and sensitivity. His happiness seems almost complete – but Annemarie’s middle class parents have already made other plans for their daughter.
results.title: Eine wen iig, dr Dällebach Kari

results.original_title: Superbad
results.overview: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.
results.title: Superbad

results.original_title: E. Nick: A Legend in His Own Mind
results.overview: In this spoof of Playboy, E. 'Nick' Vanacuzzi is a video magazine mogul who's invited several famous comedians to the premiere of the new issue. They get to meet his stars like the playmate of the month and the sex advice columnist.
results.title: E. Nick: A Legend in His Own Mind

results.original_title: Is Marriage the Bunk?
results.overview: Charley has in-laws that look down on him because he's not rich. So, to try to keep up, he rushes out to buy a car—but no matter, they still think he's a drip—as does his wife. Later, when he's given a simple job to do by his boss, he screws it up—and loses face once again with his family.
results.title: Is Marriage the Bunk?

results.original_title: The Court-Martial of George Armstrong Custer
results.overview: General Custer is on trial for the deaths of his men at the Battle of Little Bighorn.
results.title: The Court-Martial of George Armstrong Custer

results.original_title: Ein Leben lang kurze Hosen tragen
results.overview: A serial killer dispassionately discusses the nuts and bolts of his grisly avocation, as well as the youthful traumas which helped to mold him into a psychopath, in this disturbing independent drama from Germany, based on the true story of of Germany's most famous child murderer Juergen Bartsch who, between the ages of 15 and 19, abused, tortured and killed four schoolboys in the Ruhr region of Germany from 1962 to 1966.
results.title: The Child I Never Was

results.original_title: Kill Command
results.overview: Set in a near future, technology-reliant society that pits man against killing machines. Against this backdrop an elite army unit is helicoptered to a remote, off-the-grid island training facility. What starts out as a simple training exercise for Captain Bukes and his tight-knit unit, descends into a terrifying battle to the death, as the marines discover the island is overrun by an enemy that transcends the human concept of evil.
results.title: Kill Command

results.original_title: El Kárate, el Colt y el Impostor
results.overview: During a hold-up in the Wild West, Dakota kills a rich old Chinese man, Wang. Later, he is captured, sentenced, and is about to be hanged - and he never profitted from Wang's death, has he buried him with the photographs of his four widows, and a few worthless papers. Meanwhile, Ho comes to America in search of his uncle's fortune, and must get Dakota free, as he his the only man who can lead him to Wang's tomb. They open the tomb, retaking the pictures of Wang's widows. It happens he reads the papers and knows that Wang had one quarter of a map tattooed in each of his women's buttocks. Now, the difficult part will really start... Treasure hunt.
results.title: The Stranger and the Gunfighter

results.original_title: The Blood Pact: The Making of 'Blade II'
results.overview: Documentary about the making of the film 'Blade II'.
results.title: The Blood Pact: The Making of 'Blade II'

results.original_title: Sherman's Way: A Kid's Guide to Coping with Change
results.overview: Sherman must learn how to deal with his changing family situation with the help of his good friend Corny.
results.title: Sherman's Way: A Kid's Guide to Coping with Change

results.original_title: That's Brucesploitation! Making Fist of Fear, Touch of Death
results.overview: This retrospective featurette includes words from filmmaker Jim Markovic, producer Terry Levene, screenwriter Ron Harvey, director Matthew Mallinson, and actors Ron Van Clief and Fred Williamson. Topics include the sordid history of Aquarius Releasing and their other Bruce Lee knock-offs, assembling the film from lukewarm leftovers, shooting new scenes, filming at Madison Square Garden, the "guest stars", script re-writes, Adolph Caesar, creating a fake news station, and more. (Blu-ray.com)
results.title: That's Brucesploitation! Making Fist of Fear, Touch of Death

results.original_title: Last Of The Summer Wine: 30 Years Of Laughs
results.overview: This new special reveals the secrets of the long-running sitcom's extraordinary success. Helped by former cast and crew members, families of the stars no longer with us, and celebrity fans, we learn the secrets of this comedy classic and get to see previously unseen interviews and rare behind-the-scenes archive footage.
results.title: Last Of The Summer Wine: 30 Years Of Laughs

results.original_title: Cuando los maridos se iban a la guerra
results.overview: In the medieval Castile, Don Tello de Buinesa, the boastful feudal lord, lives with his three sons and their beautiful wives.
results.title: Cuando los maridos se iban a la guerra

results.original_title: Are We Winning, Mommy? America and the Cold War
results.overview: A history of America’s Cold War, beginning in 1945, and evoking the cultural milieu in which the significant political events of that era emerged.
