results.original_title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
results.overview: The classic story of English POWs in Burma forced to build a bridge to aid the war effort of their Japanese captors. British and American intelligence officers conspire to blow up the structure, but Col. Nicholson, the commander who supervised the bridge's construction, has acquired a sense of pride in his creation and tries to foil their plans.
results.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai

results.original_title: Piratas en el Callao y el Regreso de L'Hermite
results.overview: L'Hermite returns and will seek his revenge in the sequel to Piratas en el Callao
results.title: Piratas en el Callao y el Regreso de L'Hermite

results.original_title: Brother Bear
results.overview: When an impulsive boy named Kenai is magically transformed into a bear, he must literally walk in another's footsteps until he learns some valuable life lessons. His courageous and often zany journey introduces him to a forest full of wildlife, including the lovable bear cub Koda, hilarious moose Rutt and Tuke, woolly mammoths and rambunctious rams.
results.title: Brother Bear

results.original_title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
results.overview: Super-Hero partners Scott Lang and Hope van Dyne, along with with Hope's parents Janet van Dyne and Hank Pym, and Scott's daughter Cassie Lang, find themselves exploring the Quantum Realm, interacting with strange new creatures and embarking on an adventure that will push them beyond the limits of what they thought possible.
results.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania

results.original_title: Pour que rien ne change
results.overview: After a long absence, Marie decides to return to the family home to introduce the partner with whom she is expecting a child.
results.title: So That Nothing Changes

results.original_title: ¿Usted No Sabe Quien Soy Yo? 2
results.overview: Ricardo, Crist, and Valentino keep getting into trouble. Ricardo needs money and wants his career as a comedian to take off, but fame comes through a video that goes viral. To save his relationship with Margarita, he must solve three problems: his mother, his therapist, and his manager.
results.title: Do You Even Know Who I Am? 2

results.original_title: Freaky Friday
results.overview: Mother and daughter bicker over everything -- what Anna wears, whom she likes and what she wants to do when she's older. In turn, Anna detests Tess's fiancé. When a magical fortune cookie switches their personalities, they each get a peek at how the other person feels, thinks and lives.
results.title: Freaky Friday

results.original_title: Lost Moon: The Triumph of Apollo 13
results.overview: The making of the motion picture "Apollo 13", as well as the story of the space mission it details. Featuring interviews with director Ron Howard, astronaut Jim Lovell, his wife Marilyn Lovell, producer Brian Grazer, executive producer Todd Hallowell, visual effects supervisor Robert Legato, lead digital compositor Mark Forker, astronauts Fred Haise and Dave Scott, Apollo 13 flight director Gerald Griffin, command module systems controller Sy Lieberglot, Apollo 13 flight dynamics officer Jerry Bostick, mission control director Gene Krantz, Tom Kelly of Grumman, NASA mission operations director Christopher Kraft, daughters Susan Lovell Williams and Margaret Haise, command systems module controller John Aaron, and actors Tom Hanks, Bill Paxton, Kevin Bacon, Gary Sinise, Kathleen Quinlan, and Ed Harris.
results.title: Lost Moon: The Triumph of Apollo 13

results.original_title: Carmen, la que contaba 16 años
results.overview: Carmen is a beautiful woman working in a business that is dedicated to smuggling. One day, Carmen fights and hurts to a smuggler woman, so a sergeant in the National Guard, José Navarro, stops detain her. In doing so he also falls in love with her, but jealousy will destroy his passion.
results.title: Carmen

results.original_title: Luz, Câmera, 50 Anos: Lampião e Maria Bonita - O Filme
results.title: Luz, Câmera, 50 Anos: Lampião e Maria Bonita - O Filme

results.original_title: The Last Man(s) on Earth
results.overview: When inept, self-proclaimed survival experts Kaduche and Wynn discover the world's impending destruction, they pull their act off YouTube and enter Epic Mode to save the Earth. Teaming up with their nemesis, the girl of their dreams, and an eccentric visionary known as the Oracle, the group sets out to battle domestic terrorists, disenfranchised Russian communists and brain-eating zombies.
results.title: The Last Man(s) on Earth

results.original_title: De minder gelukkige terugkeer van Joszef Katús naar het land van Rembrandt
results.overview: The dutchified Hungarian Joszef Katús returns, after a months-long absence, to Amsterdam on 29 April 1966. The arrival of the Provos changed a great deal in the Dutch capital. The film follows Katús, mostly roaming the streets, in a loose documentary style. The events are set against the backdrop of four national occasions - The Queen's Birthday, Labour Day, Liberation Day and Remembrance Day.
results.title: Joszef Katús's Not Too Fortunate Return to the Land of Rembrandt

results.original_title: Half the Sky: Turning Oppression Into Opportunity for Women Worldwide
results.overview: PBS series documentary based on a book of the same name that argues the oppression of women worldwide is the "paramount moral challenge" of our time.
results.title: Half the Sky: Turning Oppression Into Opportunity for Women Worldwide

results.original_title: My Father's Murder in Greece
results.overview: When Allie’s father George takes her on a celebratory trip to Greece to discover her familial roots, George soon ends up murdered and Allie must uncover long-kept family secrets if she’s going to bring the killer to justice.
results.title: My Father's Murder in Greece

results.original_title: The Tattooist's Son: Journey to Auschwitz
results.overview: Filmed in Melbourne, Slovakia, and Poland, this poignant and intimate one-off documentary will follow Gary Sokolov, the only son of Gita and Lali Sokolov (one of the real-life tattooists of Auschwitz). Their incredible love story began when they met and fell in love as Slovakian Jewish prisoners at Auschwitz Concentration Camp, where the Nazi regime systematically murdered over a million Jews.  The film will chart Gary’s first visit to this most notorious German death camp.
results.title: The Tattooist's Son: Journey to Auschwitz

results.original_title: Cu Li Không Bao Giờ Khóc
results.overview: A woman tries to cling onto dimming links to her past after inheriting a pygmy slow loris from her long-estranged husband; meanwhile, her niece prepares for marriage as the young couple ponders their gloomy future together. The present and the complex echoes of Vietnamese history are entwined before a contemplative and poetic perspective.
results.title: Cu Li Never Cries

results.original_title: 70 Jahre Annemarie Moser-Pröll – Ein Leben als Wintermärchen
results.overview: In this documentary, the ski legend and her companions look back on their career as a glittering winter fairy tale.
results.title: 70 Jahre Annemarie Moser-Pröll – Ein Leben als Wintermärchen

results.original_title: LOMO: The Language of Many Others
results.overview: Karl, a 17-year-old boy who spends most of his time collecting pictures and videos for his blog, finds a new purpose when he falls in love with his fellow student Doro.
results.title: LOMO: The Language of Many Others

results.original_title: Dos policías con suerte 2
results.overview: The two most incompetent cops in the district are back, now with a new sexy member on the team.
results.title: Dos policías con suerte 2

results.original_title: Gatillero
results.overview: A former hitman accepts a minor job for his former boss. However, in a corrupt neighborhood, nothing is what it seems, and he quickly gets caught in a web of unexpected events. A race against time and his own destiny.
results.title: Gunman

results.original_title: Albert Schweitzer - Ein Leben für Afrika
results.overview: 1949 the early years of the Cold War. Albert Schweitzer has become one of the most admired men in the world. The "jungle doctor" Albert Schweitzer tells the story of a philosopher and physician who promoted peace during the Cold War, built a hospital in what is now Gabon and proved stronger than the CIA.
results.title: Albert Schweitzer

results.original_title: La distancia más larga
results.overview: Two sides of the same country: a chaotic and violent city contrasting against a natural paradise where the oldest mountains on the planet can be found. Two main characters that find each other at a crucial moment. Two fearless journeys, one that begins as a childlike adventure and ends up on the other side of the country and a one-way journey, free and determined. The same destiny will inevitably bond a woman with her grandson. Without knowing it they are part of an unbreakable family circle that deeply unites them. Second opportunities will arise while individual freedom of choice will become imposing. Everything comes together to tell us: there is only one destiny, the one you choose for yourself.
results.title: The Longest Distance

results.original_title: Envy: A Seven Deadly Sins Story
results.overview: Gabrielle seems to have it all - a devoted husband, a beautiful daughter, and a successful career in public relations. However, she soon stands to lose everything when she meets Keisha, her devious half sister who wants everything Gabrielle has.
results.title: Envy: A Seven Deadly Sins Story

results.original_title: Mulholland Drive
results.overview: Blonde Betty Elms has only just arrived in Hollywood to become a movie star when she meets an enigmatic brunette with amnesia. Meanwhile, as the two set off to solve the second woman's identity, filmmaker Adam Kesher runs into ominous trouble while casting his latest project.
results.title: Mulholland Drive

results.original_title: Dear Ms.: A Revolution in Print
results.overview: Three filmmakers dive deep into the storied and complex legacy of Ms. magazine through the lens of some of its most iconic covers, featuring never-before-seen archival footage and engaging interviews with the powerful women who shaped the magazine at its inception over fifty years ago
results.title: Dear Ms.: A Revolution in Print

results.original_title: Barbara Walters: Tell Me Everything
results.overview: Few American journalists have had a career as trailblazing and transformative as Barbara Walters, whose astonishing life and work are recounted in her own words in this raw, intimate, decades-spanning doc.
results.title: Barbara Walters: Tell Me Everything

results.original_title: The Secret of NIMH
results.overview: A widowed field mouse must move her family -- including an ailing son -- to escape a farmer's plow. Aided by a crow and a pack of superintelligent, escaped lab rats, the brave mother struggles to transplant her home to firmer ground.
results.title: The Secret of NIMH

results.original_title: Johnny Cash: The Redemption of an American Icon
results.overview: By the time Johnny Cash released his iconic “Man in Black” album in 1971, the international superstar was broken down, hollow-eyed, and wrung out - often torn between Jesus and the “Cocaine Blues.” This tells the true story of a music legend’s spiritual quest, and his ultimate return to an “unshakeable faith.”
results.title: Johnny Cash: The Redemption of an American Icon

results.original_title: Emmanuelle Through Time: Emmanuelle's Supernatural Sexual Activity
results.overview: Emmanuelle and her crew face sexual spirits. Let the spirit take you on a fascinating and erotic adventure.
results.title: Emmanuelle Through Time: Emmanuelle's Supernatural Sexual Activity

results.original_title: La sai l'ultima sui matti?
results.overview: Jokes, rough jokes and spicy adventures set in a psychiatric clinic, naturally managed by an experienced doctor.
results.title: Do you know the latest on the crazy ones?

results.original_title: Manchas de sangre en un coche nuevo
results.overview: Driving home in the brand new Volvo his wealthy wife gave him for his birthday, Ricardo comes upon a smoking, overturned auto with a man and boy trapped inside but, afraid he'd get bloodstains in his new car, he ignores their cries for help and drives away just before the wreck explodes. Soon after, blood begins pooling in his backseat and Ricardo comes to know how Lady Macbeth felt when he can't get the damned spots out no matter how many times he cleans the car...
results.title: Blood Stains in a New Car

results.original_title: 404: Error Not Found
results.overview: A brilliant student starts hallucinating after moving into a room that was occupied by another who committed suicide.
results.title: 404: Error Not Found

results.original_title: In the Shadow of the Vampire: The Making of Interview with the Vampire
results.overview: A behind-the-scenes documentary of the 1994 film, Interview with the Vampire.
results.title: In the Shadow of the Vampire: The Making of Interview with the Vampire

results.original_title: De "Matrix" à "Sense8", la révolution Wachowski
results.overview: From "Bound" to the queer series "Work in Progress", an exploration and deciphering of the artistic work and revolutionary career of Lana and Lilly Wachowski. "Matrix" is the soil in which all the seeds of the filmmakers' struggle were sown. Feminism, anti-capitalism, trans-identity and racial justice are encoded in trench-coat action scenes and symbol-laden metaphors. The two sisters, as uncompromising in their societal battles as they are in their experimental aesthetics, are a happy Hollywood anomaly, a real crack in the matrix it's time to rediscover.
results.title: De "Matrix" à "Sense8", la révolution Wachowski

results.original_title: Stand Alone: The Making of Halloween III: Season of the Witch
results.overview: Retrospective documentary on the making of Halloween III: Season of the Witch.
results.title: Stand Alone: The Making of Halloween III: Season of the Witch

results.original_title: Little Women
results.overview: Four sisters come of age in America in the aftermath of the Civil War.
results.title: Little Women

results.original_title: Three Dangerous Ladies
results.overview: Three unrelated horror shorts from 1975 UK horror anthology series "Classics Dark and Dangerous" edited together into one horror film anthology with three segments. Each story features a woman who willingly or unwillingly spreads evil.
results.title: Three Dangerous Ladies

results.original_title: What's Opera, Doc?
results.overview: Elmer Fudd is again hunting rabbits - only this time it's an opera. Wagner's Siegfried with Elmer as the titular hero and Bugs as Brunnhilde. They sing, they dance, they eat the scenery.
results.title: What's Opera, Doc?

results.original_title: El regreso de la suburban dorada
results.overview: A former judicial police officer, a former undercover agent and a former drug lord seek revenge against a commander-turned-drug trafficker.
results.title: El regreso de la suburban dorada

results.original_title: For Better and for Worse
results.overview: The Pope accepts when the friend of a young engaged couple jokingly sends him a wedding invitation.
results.title: For Better and for Worse

results.original_title: En Medio de la Nada
results.overview: A retired union leader runs a restaurant by the highway with the help of his wife and his young son. One day a wounded criminal, his lover and his brother, all fugitives from law and being pursued by the woman's husband, forcefully seek out a hiding place. They take the family hostage until the delinquents are confronted.
results.title: In The MIddle of Nowhere

results.original_title: Friday After Next
results.overview: Craig and his cousin Day Day have finally moved out of their parents' houses and into their own crib, working nights at a local mall as security guards. When their house is robbed on Christmas Eve they set out to track down the culprit.
results.title: Friday After Next

results.original_title: One Crazy Summer: A Look Back at Gravity Falls
results.overview: A look behind-the-scenes at the making of Gravity Falls, featuring interviews from numerous cast and crew members.
results.title: One Crazy Summer: A Look Back at Gravity Falls

results.original_title: Il était une fois... Walt Disney: Aux sources de l'art des studios Disney
results.overview: Talks about the iconographical sources that Walt Disney and his studio's designers drew on to create the films that are incontestably among the masterpieces of animation.
results.title: Walt Disney: Once Upon a Time

results.original_title: The Dream Palace: A People's History of Tyneside Cinema
results.overview: In 2017 Tyneside Cinema turned 80.
results.title: The Dream Palace: A People's History of Tyneside Cinema

results.original_title: The Hitcher: How Do These Movies Get Made?
results.overview: The making of 'The Hitcher'
results.title: The Hitcher: How Do These Movies Get Made?

results.original_title: How Wenjiel Spends His Days in Jail
results.overview: Short film about a prisoner.
results.title: How Wenjiel Spends His Days in Jail

results.original_title: Fuoco sacro – Suche nach dem heiligen Feuer des Gesangs
results.overview: Opera confronts us with extremes of emotion, sometimes delivering unforgettable, life-changing experiences. Fuoro sacro (‘Sacred Fire’) seeks out singers who have the power to pierce our hearts, presenting three of them at work in the most intimate details of their rehearsals and preparations. Ermonela Jaho, Barbara Hannigan and Asmik Grigorian are watched closely as some of their secrets are revealed: how they inhabit their roles and transform words and notation on a page into that intangible but powerful magic being communicated to audiences from the opera stage. Over 90 minutes of extras are included featuring vocal warm-ups and live performances accompanied by pianists Evgenia Rubinova, Reinbert de Leeuw and Francesco Piemontesi.
results.title: Fuoco Sacro - A Search for the Sacred Fire of Song

results.original_title: Who Killed the Electric Car?
results.overview: In 1996, electric cars began to appear on roads all over California. They were quiet and fast, produced no exhaust, and ran without gasoline... Ten years later, these cars were destroyed.
results.title: Who Killed the Electric Car?

results.original_title: Mga Kuwentong Barbero
results.overview: In the 1970s, a widow in a remote village takes over her husband’s barber shop. She becomes the laughing stock of the male-dominated community and in the process discovers freedom and liberation.
results.title: Barber's Tales

results.original_title: Tutti fratelli nel west... per parte di padre
results.overview: Young adventurer Gipo owns one fifth of a rock illustrating the location of a rich gold mine. Risking his life more than once and with the help of the beautiful hooker, Lulu Belle, our hero sets out to recover the missing pieces.
results.title: Where the Bullets Fly

results.original_title: The Less Than Perfect Daughter
results.overview: A demanding woman and her daughter knock heads when the daughter, aspiring to be less reliant on her family, moves in with a troubled friend.
results.title: The Less Than Perfect Daughter

results.original_title: Das verrückteste Auto der Welt
results.overview: Dudu, the craziest car in the world, takes part in the goofiest race in the world!
results.title: Superbug, the Craziest Car in the World

results.original_title: Dream Lover
results.overview: Not long after they cross paths at an art gallery, architect Ray Reardon and hypnotically sensual Lena are married with children. But as strange incidents occur, Ray begins to realize he may not really know the woman he married.
results.title: Dream Lover

results.original_title: Die großen und die kleinen Wünsche - David gegen Goliath
results.overview: The small Berlin shipping company Wünsche is a real family business: together with her daughter Claudia and her husband Mario, Astrid Wünsche has been offering sightseeing tours through the capital's canals for many years. Astrid's divorced husband Uwe, with whom she still gets on well despite a painful separation, takes care of the on-board catering and runs a small gourmet restaurant on one of the jetties.
results.title: Die großen und die kleinen Wünsche - David gegen Goliath

results.original_title: 風の谷のナウシカ
results.overview: After a global war, the seaside kingdom known as the Valley of the Wind remains one of the last strongholds on Earth untouched by a poisonous jungle and the powerful insects that guard it. Led by the courageous Princess Nausicaä, the people of the Valley engage in an epic struggle to restore the bond between humanity and Earth.
results.title: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind

results.original_title: Tour Eiffel, le rêve d'un visionnaire
results.overview: In 1889, Gustave Eiffel decides to attempt the impossible for the Universal Exhibition in Paris: to build the tallest tower in the world. Before this project, this pioneer and visionary had created more than 300 metal structures around the world.
results.title: Eiffel Tower: Building the Impossible

results.original_title: Don't Blame the Stork
results.overview: When Sir George Redway, a famous actor, makes the public boast that he loves babies, a baby is promptly abandoned on his doorstep, and he is forced to take it in. Katie O'Connor, an actress who has auditioned unsuccessfully for a part in a production featuring Redway, pretends to be the child's mother in order to be near the actor. Complications develop involving Lillian Angel, Redway's fiancée, her admirer Captain Fluffy Faversham, and Katie's father, who suspects the worst of Sir George and his daughter. Eventually, the real mother of the baby returns to collect her child, all is resolved, and romance blossoms between Katie and Sir George.
results.title: Don't Blame the Stork

results.original_title: Popeye's Revenge
results.overview: The legend of Popeye haunts a group of counsellors as they intend to open a summer camp.
results.title: Popeye's Revenge

results.original_title: V zahradě jsou s láskou svou don Perlimplin s Belisou
results.title: V zahradě jsou s láskou svou don Perlimplin s Belisou

results.original_title: Bob the Builder: Snowed Under - The Bobblesberg Winter Games
results.overview: Bob the Builder and his gang travel to a winter resort and have to help build the venues for the Bobblesberg Winter Games, since the original crew assigned the tasked gets snowed under.
results.title: Bob the Builder: Snowed Under - The Bobblesberg Winter Games

results.original_title: La rabbia 1, la rabbia 2, la rabbia 3... l'Arabia
results.overview: The story of La Rabbia by Pier Paolo Pasolini and Giovanni Guareschi, a movie lost in the archives of a laboratory in Rome, and recently re-discovered.
results.title: La rabbia 1, la rabbia 2, la rabbia 3... l'Arabia

results.original_title: How Come Nobody's on Our Side?
results.overview: Two unemployed stuntmen smuggle marijuana out of Mexico. Early embarassing roles by Reiner and Marshall!
results.title: How Come Nobody's on Our Side?

results.original_title: Chronique d'un été (Paris 1960)
results.overview: Paris, summer 1960. Anthropologist and filmmaker Jean Rouch and sociologist and film critic Edgar Morin wander through the crowded streets asking passersby how they cope with life's misfortunes.
results.title: Chronicle of a Summer

results.original_title: Swallowed Souls: The Making of Evil Dead 2
results.overview: A documentary about the making of Evil Dead 2.
results.title: Swallowed Souls: The Making of Evil Dead 2

results.original_title: Finding Love in Mountain View
results.overview: After learning she's been entrusted to take care of her deceased cousin's children, an architect is torn between focusing on her career and honoring her cousin's wish.
results.title: Finding Love in Mountain View

results.original_title: Saved by the Bell
results.overview: Herman the mouse installs a bell on a cat to help his mice friends.
results.title: Saved by the Bell

results.original_title: Death, Be Not Proud: The Making of "The Exorcist III"
results.overview: A 5-part making of documentary from Red Shirt pictures. It starts with a kind of general retrospective and then leads on into more individualized and expansion interviews with different key people in the production.
results.title: Death, Be Not Proud: The Making of "The Exorcist III"

results.original_title: Airplane!
results.overview: An ex-fighter pilot forced to take over the controls of an airliner when the flight crew succumbs to food poisoning.
results.title: Airplane!

results.original_title: Ozzy Osbourne: Thirty Years After The Blizzard
results.overview: “Thirty Years After The Blizzard” DVD chronicles Ozzy’s years with Randy Rhoads features previously unseen footage of Ozzy and Randy filmed in 1981 & 1982; it incorporates rare archival photos and films; along with new and revelatory interviews with Ozzy and Sharon Osbourne, Lemmy (Motorhead), Steve Vai, Nikki Sixx, Rob Halford, Zakk Wylde, Bill Ward and more.
results.title: Ozzy Osbourne: Thirty Years After The Blizzard

results.original_title: Everything I Ever Wanted To Tell My Daughter About Men
results.overview: A woman tells her daughter about every man she’s ever been with – in the hope her daughter won’t make the same mistakes.
results.title: Everything I Ever Wanted To Tell My Daughter About Men

results.original_title: When Harry Tries to Marry
results.overview: An Indian-American surprises his family when he announces his desire for an arranged marriage with an Indian woman, though his affection for a longtime American friend complicate his plan.
results.title: When Harry Tries to Marry

results.original_title: Big Shot: Confessions of a Campus Bookie
results.overview: Mother's good boy Benny Silman from Brooklyn becomes an economics student at Arizona State University for the sun and sexy girls- and the proximity of gambling paradise Las Vegas. Benny aces his studies, being a mathematical genius, but the one who earns money from him at sports is bookie Troy, who however recruits him as subcontractor, making a few thousand for himself. The next year Benny starts for himself, with a few dozen student vassals, and makes a hundredfold.
results.title: Big Shot: Confessions of a Campus Bookie

results.original_title: Survivre
results.overview: A couple celebrates their son’s birthday in the middle of the ocean on their boat. A violent storm hits and it brings up hungry creatures from the depths and they fight for their survival.
results.title: Survive

results.original_title: Die Magd von Heiligenblut
results.overview: The wealthy farm heir Toni loves the maid Maria, but is supposed to marry the wealthy neighbor's daughter Annerl. She only has eyes for a penniless woodcarver. Only when Toni's stubborn father dies does a future for the lovers begin.
results.title: Die Magd von Heiligenblut

results.original_title: Trump 2024: The World After Trump
results.overview: President Trump, the 45th President of the United States, the most polarizing figure to ever hold the office.  Some have called him the worst thing to happen to America. A racist, sexist, crazy, and unhinged. Others call him a man of integrity, a true patriot, appointed by God to lead the United States.  Love him or hate him this film answers the question; What will the world look like in 2024 after Trump as he battles to maintain the foundational values and the independence of the United States against a global community.
results.title: Trump 2024: The World After Trump

results.original_title: Gelap Mata
results.overview: A domestic worker finds cash belonging to her employer, who has been arrested for corruption. It turns out she's not the only one after the money.
results.title: Dark Eyes

results.original_title: Aqours Finale LoveLive! ～永久stage～
results.overview: Aqours Finale LoveLive! ~Eikyuu stage~ (Aqours Finale LoveLive! ～永久stage～) is Aqours' final one-man live concert that will take place in 2025.
results.title: Love Live! Sunshine!! Aqours Finale LoveLive! ~Eikyuu stage~

results.original_title: Trump 2024: The World After Trump
results.overview: President Trump, the 45th President of the United States, the most polarizing figure to ever hold the office.  Some have called him the worst thing to happen to America. A racist, sexist, crazy, and unhinged. Others call him a man of integrity, a true patriot, appointed by God to lead the United States.  Love him or hate him this film answers the question; What will the world look like in 2024 after Trump as he battles to maintain the foundational values and the independence of the United States against a global community.
results.title: Trump 2024: The World After Trump

results.original_title: Gelap Mata
results.overview: A domestic worker finds cash belonging to her employer, who has been arrested for corruption. It turns out she's not the only one after the money.

results.original_title: Aqours Finale LoveLive! ～永久stage～
results.overview: Aqours Finale LoveLive! ~Eikyuu stage~ (Aqours Finale LoveLive! ～永久stage～) is Aqours' final one-man live concert that will take place in 2025.
results.title: Love Live! Sunshine!! Aqours Finale LoveLive! ~Eikyuu stage~

results.original_title: La vergine, il toro e il capricorno
results.overview: Distressed that her wayward husband, Gianni (Alberto Lionello), forsakes her favors and seduces a series of other women, drop-dead gorgeous Gioia (Edwige Fenech) turns to handsome lothario Patrizio (Ray Lovelock) to help her get revenge. Will her enthusiastic affair help Gianni see the error of his ways? Luciano Martino directs this saucy comedy that also stars Aldo Maccione, Alvaro Vitali and Olga Bisera.
results.title: The Virgo, the Taurus and the Capricorn

results.original_title: Carrie
results.overview: Withdrawn and sensitive teenager Carrie White faces bullying from classmates and abuse from her fanatically pious mother. When she begins to suspect that she has supernatural powers, things take a dark and violent turn.
results.title: Carrie

results.original_title: If I Had a Million
results.overview: An elderly business tycoon, believed to be dying, decides to give a million dollars each to eight strangers chosen at random from the phone directory.
results.title: If I Had a Million

results.original_title: Passa Sartana... è l'ombra della tua morte
results.overview: Geoffredo Scarciofolo (using the pseudonym "Jeff Cameron") is the famed gunfighter Sartana, who is offered a chance at amnesty from the $12,000 bounty on his head if he wipes out Benny Randal, his brother Baby Face, and an equally nasty sheriff.
results.title: Sartana and His Shadow of Death

results.original_title: Class Dismissed: How TV Frames the Working Class
results.overview: Based on the forthcoming book by Pepi Leistyna, Class Dismissed navigates the steady stream of narrow working class representations from American television's beginnings to today's sitcoms, reality shows, police dramas, and daytime talk shows.
results.title: Class Dismissed: How TV Frames the Working Class

results.original_title: The Escape of Prisoner 614
results.overview: Two inept, small-town Sheriff's Deputies catch an escaped prisoner that they believe was wrongly convicted.
results.title: The Escape of Prisoner 614

results.original_title: Dreileben: Komm mir nicht nach
results.overview: The police psychologist Jo is supposed to help catch the sex offender Molesch. Since the hotel is fully booked, she stays with her old college friend Vera and her husband Bruno. It turns out that Vera and Jo used to be in love with the same man. The two women's musings are interrupted when Molesch suddenly appears in the garden.
results.title: Dreileben: Don’t Follow Me Around

results.original_title: RFK Must Die: The Assassination of Bobby Kennedy
results.overview: A new investigative documentary exploring the controversies surrounding the assassination of Bobby Kennedy on June 5, 1968 as he looked set to challenge Nixon for the White House. Munir Sirhan tells how his brother Sirhan has never been able to remember the shooting. Sandra Serrano speaks for the first time in forty years about the girl in the polka-dot dress fleeing the scene, yelling "We shot him! We shot him!" And Dr. Herbert Spiegel of Columbia University describes how Sirhan was hypnotically programmed to kill Robert Kennedy.
results.title: RFK Must Die: The Assassination of Bobby Kennedy

results.original_title: KNK: Santa Claus Dari Jakarta?
results.overview: Daniel is a father who loves his family but decides to move to Jakarta and leaves his wife and children with the intention that the welfare of the family will be better. However, Daniel is stuck in the habit of gambling and likes to cheat to make a profit in order to live in Jakarta, besides working as a Santa Klaus clown in a mall during the Christmas season, his life is always disturbed by debt collectors day and night, moreover he has a very large gambling debt to him. one of the most violent mafia families in Jakarta.
results.title: KNK: Santa Claus Dari Jakarta?

results.original_title: The Facts of Life Goes to Paris
results.overview: Mrs. Garrett and the girls travel to Paris, France. Mrs. Garrett takes a cooking class taught by a famous chef as the girls take classes at the sister school of Eastland.
results.title: The Facts of Life Goes to Paris

results.original_title: E noi come stronzi rimanemmo a guardare
results.overview: Arturo loses his tech job to an algorithm he created and ends up working as a delivery man, monitored by an unreasonably strict app. His only solace comes from Stella, a hologram-for-girlfriend whose free trial is running out. Unable to renew the subscription due to his financial uncertainty, Arturo decides to take a stand.
results.title: On Our Watch

results.original_title: La luz con el tiempo dentro
results.title: La luz con el tiempo dentro

results.original_title: Seven Years in Tibet
results.overview: Austrian mountaineer Heinrich Harrer journeys to the Himalayas without his family to head an expedition in 1939. But when World War II breaks out, the arrogant Harrer falls into Allied forces' hands as a prisoner of war. He escapes with a fellow detainee and makes his way to Lhasa, Tibet, where he meets the 14-year-old Dalai Lama, whose friendship ultimately transforms his outlook on life.
results.title: Seven Years in Tibet

results.original_title: Il medico... la studentessa
results.overview: Claudia, a perky eighteen year-old girl, is crushed when her step mother prevents her from going on a vacation to London. She discovers her step mother is having an affair with a doctor and so, with the help of her friends, sets about getting her revenge.
results.title: The Doctor...the Schoolgirl

results.original_title: Un Film E Basta: sul set di MIA MADRE accanto a Nanni Moretti
results.overview: A documentary on the making of Mia Madre (2015).
results.title: Just a Movie: On the Set of 'Mia Madre'

results.original_title: El carnaval de las bestias
results.overview: A hit man working for the Yakuza double crosses his employers and flees with a cache of diamonds from the latest heist. Injured and hiding in the mountain regions of Spain, with Japanese assassins in hot pursuit, he takes refuge in the home of a local doctor and his two daughters who nurse him back to health and hide him from his pursuers, taking drastic and murderous measures to protect him... for they have plans of their own in store for their current guest.
results.title: The Beasts' Carnival

results.original_title: Das Ist die wahre Liebe nicht
results.title: Das Ist die wahre Liebe nicht

results.original_title: NJPW New Japan Road in Anjo 2025
results.overview: NJPW New Japan Road in Anjo 2025 was a professional wrestling event promoted by New Japan Pro-Wrestling (NJPW) that took place on November 8, 2025, at Tosho Arena Anjo in Anjo, Aichi, Japan, headlined by Hiroshi Tanahashi vs. Yuto-Ice.
results.title: NJPW New Japan Road in Anjo 2025

results.original_title: Bar Sport
results.overview: Inside Bar Sport, a bar on the outskirts of Bologna managed by the histrionic Onassis, the adventures of regulars and casual patrons unfold. Searching for a pinball machine or a payphone, they encounter the omnipresent "technician," so called for his passion for soccer and always ready to chat or moderate other people's discussions. Thus, the ordeals of the handyman Bovinelli as he deals with the disasters at Muzzi's house, the diary of a provincial playboy's conquests, the sex life of the fiery prostitute Elvira, the search for a good restaurant during a dazed motorcycle trip with Cocosecco, or a trip to see Bologna play with the lawyer Della Lana become epic tales of tragicomic exploits.
results.title: Bar Sport

results.overview: An immersive documentary focusing on the story of the Apollo space program
results.title: The Moonwalkers: A Journey with Tom Hanks

results.original_title: Shake, Rattle and Roll 9
results.overview: This ninth installment in the classic horror series offers up a trio of spine-chillers from the Philippines. In Christmas Tree, a rampaging Christmas tree is out for blood as it terrorizes a family during the holidays; next, in Bangungot, three people in a love triangle find themselves ensnared in a supernatural nightmare. Finally, a teenage Goth band is cursed by a temptress's lethal spell in Engkanto.
results.title: Shake, Rattle and Roll 9

results.original_title: Dead Man's Party: The Making of Halloween 5
results.overview: In-depth Scream Factory documentary; one that doesn't sugarcoat any aspect of the production, from its rushed beginnings to the assembling of its cast and crew, its rocky production, and the many difficulties the filmmakers encountered along the way. Interviews with producer Malek Akkad, line producer Rick Nathanson, composer Alan Howarth and actors Danielle Harris, Ellie Cornell, Wedny Kaplan, Jeffrey Landman, Jonathan Chapin, Frankie Como, Tamara Glynn, Matthew Walker and Don Shanks (the fifth film's Michael Myers) are included. - blu-ray.com
results.title: Dead Man's Party: The Making of Halloween 5

results.original_title: The Trial of Lee Harvey Oswald
results.overview: The Dallas trial of Lee Harvey Oswald, President John F. Kennedy's alleged assassin, is enacted as it might have occurred. After the defense enters pleas of "not guilty" and "not guilty by reason of insanity," 23 witnesses for the prosecution testify. No verdict is returned.
results.title: The Trial of Lee Harvey Oswald

He also does art restoration work in Buckingham Palace, where he gets into an interesting conversation with HMQ.

results.overview: Feature documentary which profiles both the 1978 film and the career of director George A. Romero, including extensive interviews with all principle cast members and production personnel.

results.original_title: The Chuck Barris Story: My Life On The Edge
results.overview: The Chuck Barris Story: My Life on the Edge is a special documentary about the creator of The Dating Game and The Newlywed Game and creator and host of The Gong Show Chuck Barris. Chronicling the tragedies of his life including harsh criticisms from the press and his peers, a number of failed marriages, working for the C.I.A and the loss of his daughter due to a drug overdose.
results.title: The Chuck Barris Story: My Life On The Edge

results.original_title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh: The Story Behind the Masterpiece
results.overview: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh: The Story Behind the Masterpiece is a behind-the-scenes documentary narrated by Corey Burton on the making of The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh. It was originally made to commemorate the film's 20th anniversary, and was included with the film's subsequent home video releases. The special was made in 1996 by TV is OK Productions and was directed by Harry Arends.
results.title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh: The Story Behind the Masterpiece

results.original_title: The Name is not the Thing named
results.overview: In support of experiences that are essentially common, but to which language does not easily adhere, the video passes through places that are both themselves, and stand-ins for others. The title is taken from Aleister Crowley’s 1918 translation of the "Tao Te Ching."
results.title: The Name is not the Thing named

results.original_title: 가슴 큰 울 엄마 2
results.overview: Min-soo and Jae-hyeok is in a good father-and-son relationship. But one day, Min-soo brings Jae-hyeok's young stepmother, Da-hee. Jae-hyeok leaves home to wander around, ran into Da-hee's friend, Na-yeon, and had a little talk. Na-yeon calls Da-hee... Da-hee goes home with Jae-hyeok, and Min-soo doesn't care much. Jae-hyeok tells Da-hee how he feels. Meanwhile, Min-soo who disapproves Da-hee and Jae-hyeok's relationship, calls Na-yeon to kill some time. And Na-yeon who is worried about Da-hee and Min-soo crafts a new plan...
results.title: Bosomy Mom 2

results.original_title: Abraham's Boys: A Dracula Story
results.overview: Max and Rudy Van Helsing have spent their lives under the strict and overprotective rule of their father, Abraham. Unaware of his dark past, they struggle to understand his paranoia and increasingly erratic behavior. But when they begin to uncover the violent truths behind their father’s history with Dracula, their world unravels, forcing them to confront the terrifying legacy they were never meant to inherit.
results.title: Abraham's Boys: A Dracula Story

results.overview: This feature-length documentary on the eighth installment of the Saw franchise delves into some of the desires of the team to tether the film to its predecessors as well as find a new way forward. Featured on the Jigsaw (2017) Blu-ray special features.

results.title: The Boy Who Stole a Million

results.original_title: Murder, She Baked: A Plum Pudding Mystery
results.overview: A young bakeshop owner’s holiday season takes a surprising turn when she finds a body at a local Christmas tree lot and winds up involved in a dangerous murder investigation. With colorful characters popping up as suspects, shady business practices uncovered at the tree lot and holiday romance in the air, the young baker-turned-sleuth must race against time to track down the killer and save the Christmas season.
results.title: Murder, She Baked: A Plum Pudding Mystery

results.original_title: How to Dance in Ohio
results.overview: In Columbus, Ohio, a group of autistic teenagers and young adults role-play this transition by going through the deceptively complex social interactions of preparing for a spring formal. Focusing on several young women as they go through an iconic American rite of passage, we are given intimate access to people who are often unable to share their experiences with others. With humor and heartbreak, How to Dance in Ohio shows the daily courage of people facing their fears and opening themselves to the pain, worry, and joy of the social world.
results.title: How to Dance in Ohio
